anya-e1102n:2_0: Varadaṃ varadaṃ aggaṃ, diccaṃ diccaṃva vanajaṃ;
anya-e1102n:4_0: Santaṃ santaṃ sadā vaṭṭaṃ, pajaṃ’bhave sutaṃ;
anya-e1102n:6_0: Sutaṃ sutaṃ bhavane yaṃ, natanaṃ natanā’rahaṃ;
anya-e1102n:10_0: Vinaye sati ṭhite yaṃ, sāsanaṃ saṇṭhitaṃ bhave;
anya-e1102n:11_0: Vinaye sati naṭṭhe yaṃ, vinaṭṭhaṃ sāsanaṃ bhave.
anya-e1102n:16_0: Yadi me īdisaṃ cittaṃ, bhaveyyuṃ pāpasaṅkappā;
anya-e1102n:30_0: Buddhuppādo hi dullabho, tato pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca, vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e1102n:31_0: Buddho ca dullabho loke, saddhammasavanampi ca;
anya-e1102n:36_0: Imasmiñhi ṭhāne ṭhatvā buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttāya kathāya vuccamānāya sādhūnaṃ cittasampahaṃsanañceva,
anya-e1102n:36_4: Amhākaṃ kira bhagavā brahmadevabuddhamādiṃ katvā yāva porāṇasakyagotamā manopaṇidhivasena,
anya-e1102n:36_5: kaṭṭhavāhanajātakaṃādiṃkatvā yāva majjhimadīpaṅkarā vācaṅgavasena majjhimadīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya
anya-e1102n:36_6: kāyavācaṅgavasena sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā yāva vessantarattabhāvā vīsati asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūrentassa
anya-e1102n:36_7: sabbaññutaññāṇatthāya yeva alaṅkataṃ sīsaṃ chinditvā dentassa sabbaññubodhisattassa sīsaṃ jambudīpavāsīnaṃ
anya-e1102n:36_9: añjitanayanaṃ uppāṭetvā dentassa nayanaṃ ajaṭākāse gaganatale tārāgaṇatopi bahutaraṃ,
anya-e1102n:36_10: hadayamaṃsaṃ vā dakkhiṇabāhuṃ vā chinditvā dentassa maṃsaṃ chanahuta aṭṭhasa hassādhikasatasahassapamāṇasinerurājatopi bahutaraṃ,
anya-e1102n:36_11: lohitaṃ uppāṭetvā dentassa ruhiraṃ catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakatopi bahutaraṃ,
anya-e1102n:36_12: maddīsadise ca bhariye jālīkaṇhājinasadise ca putte paresaṃ dāsatthāya dentassa gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
anya-e1102n:39_0: Jātattakīsotattakiyā vuttanayena asūro hutvā buddhattaṃ cintentasseva sattaasaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni.
anya-e1102n:39_1: Atisūro ahutvā vācāmattameva nava asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni.
anya-e1102n:39_2: Atisūro hutvā kāyaṅgavācaṅgavasena pūrentassa cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni.
anya-e1102n:39_3: Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya veditabbāni.
anya-e1102n:39_5: Vessantarattabhāvena ca sattakamahādānaṃ datvā sattakkhattuṃ pathaviṃ kampetvā vaṅkapabbataṃ gantvā nayanasadise
anya-e1102n:39_6: dve putte brāhmaṇassa dāsatthāya datvā dutiyadivase brāhmaṇavaṇṇena āgatassa sakkassa devarañño attasamaṃ
anya-e1102n:39_7: maddiṃ nāma bhariyaṃ datvā tasmiṃ bhave aparimeyyāni puññāni katvā tato tusitapuraṃ gantvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
anya-e1102n:42_0: Yāciyamāno kālaṃ dīpañca desañca kulaṃ mātaramevacāti imāni pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā tusitapurato
anya-e1102n:42_1: cavitvā mahāsammatavaṃsajassa okkākarañño puttānaṃ kusalambhedabhayena bhaginīhiyeva saddhiṃ āvāhakaraṇaṃ
anya-e1102n:42_2: sutvā sakyā vata bho rājakumārāti okkākamahārājena vuttavacanaṃ pavattanimittaṃ katvā sakyāti laddhanāmānaṃ
anya-e1102n:42_3: rājūnamabbhantare pavattassa suddhodanamahārājassa jeṭṭhamahesiyā sirimahāmāyāya kucchimhi nibbattitvā
anya-e1102n:42_4: dasamāsaccayena devadahanagarassa kapilavatthussa ca majjhe lumbinīvane mātukucchito nikkhamitvā jātakkhaṇeyeva
anya-e1102n:42_5: uttarābhimukhaṃ sattapadavītihārena gantvā achambhivācaṃ nicchāretvā pitaraṃ vandāpetvā anukkamena soḷasavassuddesikakāle
anya-e1102n:42_6: rajjasiriṃ anubhavitvā rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase nikkhamitvā chabbassāni dukkaracariyaṃ caritvā vesākhapuṇṇamadivase
anya-e1102n:42_7: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā pañcacattālīsa vassāni devamanussānaṃ ratanadāmaṃ ganthento
anya-e1102n:42_8: viya dhammaratanavassaṃ vassāpetvā yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā katabuddhakicce kusinārāyaupavaṭṭane
anya-e1102n:42_9: mallānaṃ sālavane vesākhapuṇṇamadivase paccūsasamaye anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbute bhagavatilokanāthe
anya-e1102n:42_10: subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena “alaṃ āvuso mā socittha mā paridevittha,
anya-e1102n:42_12: upaddutā ca homa’idaṃ vo kappati idaṃ vo na kappatī’ti.
anya-e1102n:42_13: Idāni pana mayaṃ yaṃ icchissāma taṃ karissāma,
anya-e1102n:42_14: yaṃ na icchissāma na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttavacanaṃ sallakkhetvā gaṇapāmokkhānaṃ sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ
anya-e1102n:42_15: saṅghatthero āyasmā mahākassapo dhammasaṅgītiṃ katvā parisuddhe dhammavinaye tato aparabhāge vassasatassa
anya-e1102n:42_16: accayena vesāliyā vajjiputtakā dasavatthūni dassetvā sāsanavipattiṃ karonte disvā āyasmatā yasattherena
anya-e1102n:42_17: kākaṇḍakaputtena samussāhiyamāno dutiyasaṅgītiṃ katvā tato aparabhāge tathāgatassa parinibbānato dvinnaṃ
anya-e1102n:42_18: vassasatānaṃ upari aṭṭhārasame vasse dhammāsokonāma rājā sakalajambudīpatale ekarajjābhisekaṃ pāpuṇitvā
anya-e1102n:42_19: buddhasāsane mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattetvā parihīnalābhasakkārā titthiyā antamaso ghāsacchādanamattampi
anya-e1102n:42_20: alabhantā lābhasakkāraṃ patthayamānā sāsane pabbajitvā sakāni sakāni diṭṭhigatāni dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṃ
anya-e1102n:42_22: Tadā dhammāsokarañño pattābhisekato sattarasame vasse saṭṭhisatasahassa bhikkhūsu sahassabhikkhuṃ gahetvā
anya-e1102n:42_23: moggaliputtatisso nāma saṅghatthero mahāpavāraṇāya parappavādaṃ bhinditvā kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ desetvā
anya-e1102n:42_24: tatiyadhammasaṅgītiṃ katvā parisuddhe dhammavinaye sāṭṭhakathebuddhavacane dharanteva pāḷiyaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e1102n:42_25: atthacchāyaṃ gahetvā attano mativasena nānāganthavisesāni karonti,
anya-e1102n:42_26: tesu attanomativasena atthacchāyaṃ gahetvā kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ katvā vuttavacanaṃ sārato sallakkhetvā sutta-
anya-e1102n:42_28: aṭṭhakathāya ca pāḷiṃ tabbivaraṇabhūtaṃ sāratthadīpaniñca aññāni ca ganthavisesāni asaṃsanditvā attanomatiyāpi
anya-e1102n:42_29: pubbāparaṃ asamānetvā vādappakāsanamattameva ṭhapetvā garukalahukesu garukeyeva ṭhātabbepi garuke aṭṭhatvā
anya-e1102n:42_30: keci bhikkhū nadiyā udakukkhepaṃ akatvā karonti.
anya-e1102n:42_32: Idañca bhindanaṃ kosambakakkhandhake bhinnatopi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena balavatarameva sāsanassa vipattikāraṇattā,
anya-e1102n:42_33: tathā hi na idaṃ manussaloke bhikkhūnaṃyeva hoti,
anya-e1102n:42_37: tāsaṃ sahāyakānaṃ bhummanissitadevatānampi tāsaṃ sahāyakānaṃ rukkhanissitadevatānampi tāsaṃsahāyakānaṃ ākāsaṭṭhakadevatānampi,
anya-e1102n:42_40: evaṃ mittaparamparavasena chakāmāvacaradevatānampi tāsaṃ mittānaṃ brahmapārisajjānampīti evaṃ yāvaakaniṭṭhabrahmalokā
anya-e1102n:42_41: ariyapuggale ṭhapetvā sabbe puthujjanā devamanussā bhinnā honti,
anya-e1102n:42_42: tesaṃ bhinnattā bahu ca pāpaṃ pasavati,
anya-e1102n:42_44: aṭṭhakathāya ca pāḷiṃ saṃsanditvā tāni tāni ganthavisesāni ca ekato katvā gaṅgodake na yamunodakaṃ viya
anya-e1102n:42_45: missitvā ekībhāvaṃ katvā sīmavisodhaniṃ nāma karissāmi,
anya-e1102n:42_46: taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasikarotha dhammarājassa sāvakāti.
anya-e1102n:43_0: Tattha buddhuppādo dullabho ti buddhassa uppādakālo dullabho tathā hi anuppannakāle buddhe buddhoti saddampi
anya-e1102n:44_0: Tato pabbajā ca upasampadācā tiettha topaccayo lāmakatthe,
anya-e1102n:44_3: tamanupabbajjā ca upasampadā ca dullabhāyevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e1102n:44_4: Yathā ca loke kiñcideva mahagghaṃ alabhitabbaṃ labhitvā vā tena sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ appagghampi mahagghaṃ mahagghaṃ dullabhaṃ dullabhanti vuccati,
anya-e1102n:44_5: evameva atidullabhaṃ buddhuppādaṃ āgamma tamanupabbajitampi dullabhanti vuccati,
anya-e1102n:44_6: yathā ca nidiyā uparimabhāge sattāhavaṭṭalikādibhāvena udakapūraṇe heṭṭhā kismiñci ṭhāne tarituṃ avisahantā idameva ṭhānaṃ dukkaranti vuccati,
anya-e1102n:44_7: evameva buddhakāraṇassa dukkarabhāve na tamanupabbajjupasampadāpi dukkaraṃ dullabhanti vuccati.
anya-e1102n:44_8: Aññathā buddhabhagavato pi pabbajjupasampadabhāvoyeva seṭṭho bhaveyya.
anya-e1102n:44_10: yathā semhoguḷoti tathā hi guḷassa pi vanapaccayā semho ussanno,
anya-e1102n:44_11: taṃ jano guḷenasemhoti vattabbepi kāraṇasmiṃ guḷe phalabhūtaṃ semhaṃ ropetvā semho guḷoti vuccati,
anya-e1102n:44_12: evaṃ kāraṇassa dukkarattā dullabhe buddhuppāde tamanukriyā pabbajjāpi taṃ mūlakāraṇabhūte buddhuppāde ropetvā dullabhā pabbajjāti vuccati.
anya-e1102n:44_16: jāyamānesu vā majjhimadese jāyamānopi micchādiṭṭhibhūtā vā,
anya-e1102n:44_17: sammādiṭṭhikule jāyamānāpi cakkhusota vikalabhāvena aṅgavikalā vā buddhadassanaṃ na arahanti,
anya-e1102n:44_19: Supaṇṇanāgarājādīnaṃ tasmiṃ bhave maggaphalabhāgino na honti,
anya-e1102n:49_0: Pabbajjā ticettha sāmaññena vuttepi sāmaṇerāva adhippetā,
anya-e1102n:49_2: Sāmaṇerā ca nāma buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmityādinā tikkhattuṃ vatvā ubhatosuddhivaseneva sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n:49_4: Tāni pāḷivasena asakkonto atthavasena “idañca samādāya vattehī”ti ācikkhitumpi vaṭṭatiyeva.
anya-e1102n:49_14: Tattha bhagavā ehi bhikkhubhāvāya upanissayasampannaṃ puggalaṃ disvā rattapaṃsukūlantarato suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e1102n:49_15: dakkhiṇahatthaṃ nīharitvā brahmaghosaṃ nicchārento “ehi bhikkhu cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti vadati.
anya-e1102n:50_0: Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūcica bandhanaṃ;
anya-e1102n:52_0: Evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahiparikkhārehi sarīre paṭimuttoyeva vassasatikatthero viya iriyāpathasampanno buddhācariyako
anya-e1102n:52_3: Bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ etasmiṃ kāle ehi bhikkhupasampadāya eva upasampādeti.
anya-e1102n:54_0: Eko ca thero sappañño; Sabbe te ehi bhikkhukāti.
anya-e1102n:55_0: Ete vinayapiṭake niddiṭṭhaehibhikkhū nāma vinayapiṭake aniddiṭṭhā pana tisataparivāraselabrāhmaṇādayo.
anya-e1102n:57_0: Ete hi sabbe saṅkhātā, sabbe te ehibhikkhukāti.
anya-e1102n:58_0: Taṃ sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsasahassāni chasatāni ekacattālīsuttarāni ca honti.
anya-e1102n:59_0: Bhagavā hi anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā aṭṭhārasakoṭibrāhmaṇānaṃ amataṃ pāyetvā paṭhamavassaṃ vasi.
anya-e1102n:59_2: bhagavā hi āsāḷhinakkhattapuṇṇamiyaṃ bārāṇasiyā isipatane migadāye paṭhamavassaṃ vasitvā phagguṇamāse
anya-e1102n:59_3: phagguṇapuṇṇamiyaṃ rājagahaṃ patvā bimbisāraraññā kārite veḷuvana vihāre ekamāsamattaṃ vasitvā citramāse
anya-e1102n:59_4: vīsatikhīṇāsavasahassaparivuto kapilavatthuṃ gantvā asītiyā ñātisahassānaṃ majjhe vippaṭipannānaṃ rājūnaṃ
anya-e1102n:59_5: matthake paṃsurajaṃ okiritvā te vandāpetvā pokkharavassañca vassāpetvā tamāgamma asītiyā ñātisahassānaṃ
anya-e1102n:59_6: vessantara jātakaṃ kathetvā rāhulamātaramāgamma candakinnarījātakañca kathetvā pitaraṃ anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1102n:59_8: tena vuttaṃ dutiya tatiya catuttha vassesu rājagahe veḷuvanavihāre vassaṃ vasī”ti.
anya-e1102n:59_12: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā sunāparantaraṭṭhe kira ekasmiṃ vāṇijakagāme dve bhātaro.
anya-e1102n:59_13: Tesu kadāci jeṭṭho pañcasakaṭasatāni gahetvā janapadaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ āharati,
anya-e1102n:59_15: Imasmiṃ pana samaye kaniṭṭhaṃ ghare ṭhapetvā jeṭṭhabhātiko pañca sakaṭasatāni gahetvā janapadacārikaṃ
anya-e1102n:59_16: caranto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanassa avidūre pañcasakaṭasatāni ṭhapetvā bhuttapātarāso parijanaparivuto
anya-e1102n:59_18: Tena ca samayena sāvatthivāsino bhuttapātarāsā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya suṭṭhuttarāsaṅgā gandhapupphādihatthā yenabuddho,
anya-e1102n:59_21: tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbharā hutvā dikkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavanaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e1102n:59_22: So te disvā “kahaṃ ime gacchantī”ti ekaṃ manussaṃ pucchi.
anya-e1102n:59_25: icceva mahājano satthusantike dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ gacchatīti.
anya-e1102n:59_26: Tassa “buddho”ti vacanaṃ chavicammādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:59_27: Atha attano parijanaparivuto tāya parisāyasaddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthāmadhurassarena dhammaṃ desentassa
anya-e1102n:59_28: parisa pariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi.
anya-e1102n:59_29: Atha tathāgatena kālaṃ viditvā parisāya uyyojitāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā svātanāya nimantetvā
anya-e1102n:59_30: dutiyadivase maṇḍapaṃ karetvā āsanāni paññāpetvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne
anya-e1102n:59_32: Bhuttapātaraso uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya bhaṇḍāgārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “ettakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vissajjitaṃ ettakaṃ
anya-e1102n:59_33: pana na vissajjita”nti sabbaṃ ācikkhitvā “imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ mayhaṃ kaniṭṭhassa dehī”ti sabbaṃ niyyotetvā
anya-e1102n:59_34: satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhāna parāyaṇo ahosi.
anya-e1102n:59_35: Athassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e1102n:59_37: yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gaccheyya”nti.
anya-e1102n:59_38: Atha pubbaṇhasamaye piṇḍāya caritvā sāyanhasamaye paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1102n:59_40: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo sūnāparantaraṭṭhaṃ patvā sammatapabbataṃ nāma pavisitvā vāṇijakagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
anya-e1102n:59_41: Atha naṃ kaniṭṭhabhātā sagehaṃ netvā bhikkhaṃ datvā “bhante aññattha agantvā idheva vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā vasāpesi.
anya-e1102n:59_43: Tattha samuddavīciyo āgantvā ayakaṇṭapāsāṇesu paharitvā mahāsaddaṃ karonti.
anya-e1102n:59_44: Thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto na phāsuvihāro hotīti samuddaṃ nisaddaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:59_46: Tattha sakuṇasaṅgho ussanno rattiñca divā ca saddo eko baddho hoti.
anya-e1102n:59_47: Thero “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ aphāsukanti tato makuḷakārāmavihāraṃ nāma gato.
anya-e1102n:59_48: So vāṇijagāmassa nātidūro nāccāsanno gamanāgamanasampanno vivitto appasaddo.
anya-e1102n:59_49: Thero “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ phāsuka”nti tattha rattiṭṭhānadivāṭhāne caṅkamanādīni kāretvā vassaṃ upagacchati.
anya-e1102n:59_51: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃyeva antovasse pañca vāṇijakasatāni “parasamuddaṃ gacchāmā”ti nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:59_52: Nāvārohanadivase therassa kaniṭṭhabhātā theraṃ bhojetvā therassa santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā gacchanto
anya-e1102n:59_55: Nāvā ūmijavena gacchamānā aññataraṃ dīpaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e1102n:59_59: Atheko vā siyā rukkhaṃ ākoṭetvā lohitacandanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “bho mayaṃ lābhatthāya parasamuddaṃ gacchāma,
anya-e1102n:59_60: ito ca uttari lābhā nāma natthi,
anya-e1102n:59_63: Te tathā kariṃsu candanavane adhivatthā amanussā kujjhitvā imehi amhākaṃ candanavanaṃ nāsitaṃ,
anya-e1102n:59_64: ghātessāma ne”ti cintetvā na imesu ghāṭitesu sabbaṃ ekakuṇapaṃ bhavissati,
anya-e1102n:59_66: Atha tesaṃ nāvaṃ ārūyha muhuttaṃ gatakāleyeva uppādikaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā sayampi te amanussā bhayānakāni rūpāni dassayiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:59_68: Therassa kaniṭṭho cūḷapuṇṇakuṭumbiko “mayhaṃ bhātā avassayo hotū”ti therassa namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:59_69: Thero pi kira tasmiṃyeva khaṇe āvajjetvā tesaṃ byasanappattiṃ ñatvā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā abhimukho aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:59_70: Amanussā theraṃ disvāva “ayyapuṇṇatthero ehī” ti pakkamiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:59_72: Thero “mā bhāyathā”ti tesaṃ assāsetvāva kahaṃ gantukāmatthā”ti pucchi.
anya-e1102n:59_73: “Bhante amhākaṃ sakaṭṭhānameva gacchāmā”ti thero nāvaṃ phale akkamitvā “etesaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchatū”ti adhiṭṭhāti.
anya-e1102n:59_74: Vāṇijā sakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ puttadārassa ārocetvā “etha theraṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmā”ti pañcasatāni
anya-e1102n:59_75: attano attano pañcamātugāmasatehi saddhiṃ tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesuṃ.
anya-e1102n:59_76: Tato nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ otāretvā therassa ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā “ayaṃ bhante tumhākaṃ koṭṭhāso”ti āhaṃsu.
anya-e1102n:59_81: Evaṃ satthāraṃ passissathāti te sādhu bhante’ti tena ca koṭṭhāsena attano ca koṭṭhāsena maṇḍalamāḷaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:59_82: Satthā kirassa āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya paribhogaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1102n:59_83: Tatho manussā rattiṃ obhāsaṃ disvā “mahesakkhā devatā atthī”ti saññaṃkariṃsu.
anya-e1102n:59_84: Upāsakā maṇḍalamāḷañca bhikkhusaṅghassa senāsanāni ca niṭṭhapetvā dānasambhāraṃ sajjetvā “kataṃ bhante amhehi attanokiccaṃ,
anya-e1102n:59_86: Thero sāyanhasamaye iddhiyāsāvatthiṃ patvā “bhante vāṇijagāmavāsino tumhe daṭṭhukāmā,
anya-e1102n:59_89: Thero bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā sakaṭṭhānameva paccāgato.
anya-e1102n:59_90: Bhagavā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi “ānanda sve sūnāparante vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya carissāma,
anya-e1102n:59_92: Thero sādhu bhante’ti bhikkhusaṅghassa tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “cārikā salākaṃ gaṇhantū”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:59_93: Taṃ divasaṃ kuṇḍadhānatthero paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ aggahoti.
anya-e1102n:59_94: Vāṇijagāmavāsinopi “sve kira satthā āgamissatī”ti gāmamajjhe maṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaggaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:59_95: Bhagavā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdi.
anya-e1102n:59_97: So kiṃ idanti āvajjetvā satthu sūnāparantagamanaṃ disvā visukammaṃ āmantesi “tāta ajja bhagavā tīṇimattāni yojanasatāni piṇḍācāraṃ gamissati,
anya-e1102n:59_98: pañca kūṭāgārasatāni māpetvā jetavanadvāra koṭṭhamatthake gamanasajjāniṃ katvā ṭhapehī”ti,
anya-e1102n:59_103: satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapita kūṭāgāresu dhurakūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1102n:59_104: Dve aggasāvake ādiṃ katvā ekūnapañcabhikkhusatānipi kūṭāgāraṃ gantvā nisinnā ahesuṃ,
anya-e1102n:59_107: Satthā saccabandhapabbataṃ nāma patvā kūṭāgāraṃ ākāse ṭhapetvā tasmiṃ pabbate saccabandho nāma micchādiṭṭhi,
anya-e1102n:59_108: so mahājanaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ uggaṇhāpento lābhaggayasaggappatto hutvā vasati.
anya-e1102n:59_109: Abbhantare cassa antocāṭiyaṃ padīpo viya arahattassa upanissayo jalati,
anya-e1102n:59_110: taṃ disvā “dhammamassa kathessāmī”ti gantvā dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e1102n:59_113: ehi bhikkhu hutvā iddhimayapattacīvaro kūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1102n:59_114: Bhagavā kūṭāgāragatehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehisaddhiṃ vāṇijagāmaṃ gantvā kūṭāgārāni adissamānāni katvā vāṇijagāmaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1102n:59_115: Vāṇijā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā sasatthāraṃ makuḷakārāmaṃ nayiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:59_118: tāva pātarāsaṃ katvā uposathaṅgāni samādāya gandhañca pupphañca ādāya dhammasavanatthāya ārāmaṃ paccāgamāsi.
anya-e1102n:59_122: Satthā mahājanassa saṅgahatthaṃ katipāhaṃ tattheva vasi,
anya-e1102n:59_124: Tattha katipāhaṃ vasitvā vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya caritvā “tvaṃ idheva vasāhī”ti puṇṇattheraṃ nivattetvā antare nammadānadī nāma atthi,
anya-e1102n:59_126: Nammadānāgarājā satthu paccuggantvā nāgabhavanaṃ pavesetvā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sakkāraṃ akāsi.
anya-e1102n:59_127: Satthā tassa dhammaṃ kathetvā nāgabhavanā nikkhami.
anya-e1102n:59_130: Taṃ vīcīsu āgahāsu pidhiyati vīcīsu gatāsu vivarati,
anya-e1102n:59_132: Satthā tato nikkhamma saccabandhapabbataṃ gantvā saccabandhaṃ āha “tayā mahājano apāyamagge otārito.
anya-e1102n:59_133: Tvaṃ idheva vasitvā etesaṃ laddhiṃ vissajjāpetvā nibbānamagge patiṭṭhāpehī”ti.
anya-e1102n:59_135: Satthā ghanapiṭṭhipāsāṇe allamattikapiṇḍamhi lañchanaṃ viya padacetiyaṃ dassesi.
anya-e1102n:59_136: Evaṃ sūnāparantaraṭṭheyeva dve cakkaratanacetiyāni yāvasāsanantaradhānaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1102n:59_137: Sattame pana vasse sāvatthiyaṃ kaṇḍambarukkhamūle titthi maddanaṃ karonto yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā dasahi
anya-e1102n:59_138: cakkavāḷa sahassehi āgatānaṃ devatānaṃ mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā abhidhammaṃ desente tāvatiṃsabhavane
anya-e1102n:59_147: Dasame pana vasse pālileyyāgāme dakkhiṇavanasaṇḍe bhaddasālamūle pālileyyakena hatthinā upaṭṭhiyamāno phāsukaṃ vassāvāsaṃ vasi.
anya-e1102n:59_149: Dvādasame verañjāyaṃ ekavāsaṃ vasi duccaritassa vipākaṃ anubhavamāno,
anya-e1102n:59_150: bhagavatā kira phussassa bhagavato kāle sāvakānaṃ vacīduccaritavasena katupacitassa akusalakammassa tadā
anya-e1102n:59_151: laddhokāsavasena upaṭṭhitattā verañjabrāhmaṇena nimantitopi samāno mārāvaṭṭana vasena asallakkhetvā assavāṇijakānaṃ
anya-e1102n:59_152: nibaddhavattasaṅkhepena paññattaṃ patthapatthamūlakaṃ yavataṇḍulameva temāsaṃ bhuñjati,
anya-e1102n:61_0: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, māca bhuñjatha sālino.
anya-e1102n:64_0: Tena vuttaṃ “dvādasame verañjāyaṃ ekavāsaṃ vasi duccaritassa vipākaṃ anubhavamāno”ti.
anya-e1102n:64_2: Catuddasame sāvatthiyaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme jetavanavihāre paṭhamavāsaṃ vasitvā pannarasame vasse
anya-e1102n:64_3: ñātijanasaṅgahatthaṃ kapilavatthuṃ gantvā ekameva vāsaṃ kappesi.
anya-e1102n:64_4: Soḷasame vasse āḷavakayakkhadamanatthaṃ aggāḷavīnagare ekavāsaṃ vasi.
anya-e1102n:64_5: Sattarasame vasse rājagahameva nivattitvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
anya-e1102n:64_8: Vīsatime vasse rājagahassa avidūre bhīsanake bhesakalavanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ kappesī”ti imāni vīsati vassāni paṭhamabodhīti veditabbāni.
anya-e1102n:64_9: Etasmiṃ kāle ehibhikkhūpasampadāyaeva upasampādesīti yebhuyyena bhagavantaṃyeva uddissa ācariyupajjhāyaṃ
anya-e1102n:64_10: katvā ehibhikkhu bhāvamāpanne puññavantapuggaleyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:64_11: aññesampi ariyabhāvamanāpannānaṃ sudinnādīnaṃ vā yamakapāṭihāriye pasīditvā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa
anya-e1102n:64_12: santike pabbajitānaṃ pubbe kassapabuddhakāle vaggulibhūtapubbānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ therasseva
anya-e1102n:64_13: santike pabbajitabhāvassa dissanato tena vuttaṃ “bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ etasmiṃ kāle ehi bhikkhūpasampadāya
anya-e1102n:64_15: Ito paresu pana pañcavīsativassesu anāthapiṇḍikena kārite jetavanamahāvihāre ekūnavīsativassā vāsaṃ vasi.
anya-e1102n:64_16: Visākhāya sattavīsati koṭidhanapariccāgena kārite pubbārāme chabbassāni vasi.
anya-e1102n:64_17: Dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ guṇamahattaṃ paṭicca sāvatthiyaṃ nissāya pañcavīsati vassāni vāsaṃ vasi.
anya-e1102n:64_18: Antime pana vasse beḷuvagāme vasitvā maraṇantikā vedanā uppajji,
anya-e1102n:65_0: Saraṇagamanūpasampadā nāma “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi”tyādinā tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ bhinditvā vuttehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampanno.
anya-e1102n:66_0: Ovādapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā nāma “tasmā tiha te kassapa evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ tibbameva hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e1102n:66_2: evañhi te kassapa sikkhitabbaṃ tasmā tiha te kassapa evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci dhammaṃ sossāmi kusalūpasañhitaṃ
anya-e1102n:66_3: sabbantaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasikatvā sabbameva cetaso samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ sossāmīti,
anya-e1102n:66_4: evañhi te kassapa sikkhitabbaṃ tasmā tiha te kassapa evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ sātasahagataṃ me kāyagatā satiṃ na jahissatīti,
anya-e1102n:66_5: evañhi te kassapa sikkhitabbanti iminā ovādapaṭiggaṇena mahākassapattherassa anuññātaupasampadā nāma.
anya-e1102n:67_1: bhagavā kira pubbārāme anucaṅkamanto sopākasāmaṇeraṃ “uddhumātakasaññāti vā sopāka rūpasaññāti vā ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā,
anya-e1102n:67_2: udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”nti dasaasubhanissite pañhe pucchi.
anya-e1102n:67_4: Bhagavā tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “kativassosi tvaṃ sopākā”ti pucchi.
anya-e1102n:67_6: “sopāka tvaṃ mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā pañhe byākāsī”ti āraddhacitto upasampadaṃ anujānāti,
anya-e1102n:68_0: Aṭṭhavācikūpasampadā nāma bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghato ñatticatutthena bhikkhusaṅghato ñatticatutthenāti imehi dvīhi kammehi upasampadā.
anya-e1102n:68_5: Samaggena saṅghena ñatticatutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena uparibhāvaṃ samāpanno pattoti upasampanno,
anya-e1102n:68_6: seṭṭhabhāvaṃ pattotiattho tathā hi gihibhāvato sāmaṇerabhāvo seṭṭho nāma,
anya-e1102n:68_8: Tattha samaggena saṅghenāti sabbantimena pariyāyena pañcavaggakaraṇīye kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā,
anya-e1102n:68_10: sammukhībhūtānañca appaṭikkosanato etasmiṃ kamme samaggabhāvaṃ upagatena.
anya-e1102n:68_11: Ñatticatutthenāti tīhi anusāvanāhi ekāya ca ñattiyā kattabbena.
anya-e1102n:68_12: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ñatti sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttā,
anya-e1102n:68_13: tissannaṃ pana anusāvanānaṃ atthabyañjanabhedābhāvato atthabyañjanabhinnā ñatti tāsaṃ catutthanti katvā ñatticatutthanti vuccati.
anya-e1102n:68_16: Akuppenā ti vatthu ñatti anusāvana sīma parisasampatti sampannattā akopetabbataṃ appaṭikkositabbatañca upagatena.
anya-e1102n:68_20: Tattha sampattivipattivasena sambhavato ti vatthusampatti ñattisampatti anusāvanasampattisīmasampattiparisasampattivasena
anya-e1102n:68_22: Tattha vatthu sampattināma paripuṇṇavīsativassabhāvo idāni purisattabhāvo ca.
anya-e1102n:68_35: ti ime terasa puggalā upasampadāya avatthu.
anya-e1102n:68_36: Tattha ūnavīsativassanti sāmaññena vuttepi mātukucchito nikkhamanato paṭṭhāya ekūnavīsaparipuṇṇo purisapuggalo upasampadāya vatthu,
anya-e1102n:68_37: tato oraṃ na upasampadāya vatthu tatho hi ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare hemantagimhavassavasena tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ sambhavattā tayo utū honti,
anya-e1102n:74_0: Ettha ca kattikassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva phagguṇapuṇṇamā cattāro māsā hemautu nāma.
anya-e1102n:74_1: Phagguṇassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva āsāḷhīpuṇṇamā cattāro māsā gimhautu nāma.
anya-e1102n:74_2: Asāḷhakāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva aparakattikapuṇṇamā cattāro māsā vassautu nāma.
anya-e1102n:74_3: Evaṃ ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare tayo utū honti.
anya-e1102n:74_4: Tattha ekasmiṃ utumhi pakkhassa tatiyasattamesu dve dve katvā cha catuddasikā,
anya-e1102n:74_5: paṭhamadutiyacatutthapañcamachaṭṭhaaṭṭhamesu cha cha katvā aṭṭhārasa pannarasikāti evaṃ ekasaṃvacchare catuvīsati uposathā honti.
anya-e1102n:74_6: Imesu catuvīsatuposathesu cātuddasiyā ekūnatiṃsa divasā hontīti katvā ekasaṃvacchare cha ūnā divasā honti.
anya-e1102n:74_7: Iminā nayena ekūnavīsatime vasse chamāsādhikāni aṭṭhārasavassāni honti.
anya-e1102n:74_8: Tasmiṃ mātukucchimhi nibbattakāle dasamāse pakkhipitvā cattāri māsādhikāni ekūnavīsavassāni paripuṇṇāni.
anya-e1102n:74_9: Rājāno pana tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ accayena māsaṃ ākaḍḍhanti,
anya-e1102n:74_11: tasmā aṭṭhārasavasse yeva cha māsādhikāni honti.
anya-e1102n:74_12: Taṃ heṭṭhācatumāsādhika ekūnavīsatime vasse pakkhipitvā ekamāsādhikāni vīsativassāni sabbaso paripuṇṇāni honti.
anya-e1102n:74_13: Evaṃ ekūnavīsativassato paṭṭhāya gabbhavīso upasampadāya vatthūti veditabbo.
anya-e1102n:74_14: Idāni purisattabhāvo ti bhikkhuniyā abhāvato purisapuggalova idāni vaṭṭatīti adhippeto tathā hi mātugāmassa
anya-e1102n:74_16: paññattattā pana aparāni pañcavassasatāni ṭhassatīti evaṃ vassasahassameva paṭisambhidāppattasaddhammassa patiṭṭhitabhāvo vutto.
anya-e1102n:74_17: Mātugāmā ca nāma duppaññā tibbakilesā lāmakā ca.
anya-e1102n:74_18: Bhagavatā ca paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāyameva mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā aṭṭhagarudhammapaṭiggahaṇena
anya-e1102n:74_20: Duppaññattā itthiyo sāsane ciraṃ na tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e1102n:74_21: tibbakilesattā yathā paññatta sikkhāpadānurūpaṃ saṃvarampi rakkhituṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:74_22: Lāmakattāpi tā aṭṭhasamāpattiṃ labhantāpi brāhmapārisajjaṃ nātikkamanti,
anya-e1102n:74_23: evaṃ bhikkhuniyā abhāvato idāni purisapuggaloti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:74_24: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā cattāri khettāni veditabbāni tathā hi mātugāmassa pabbajitattā vassasahassameva
anya-e1102n:74_29: sotāpannavasena vassasahassanti evaṃ pañcavassasahassāni paṭivedhasaddhammo tiṭṭhati.
anya-e1102n:74_30: Pariyattisaddhammopi tāniyeva na hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho atthi.
anya-e1102n:74_31: Nāpi pariyattiyā sati paṭivedho na hoti.
anya-e1102n:74_32: Liṅgaṃ pana pariyattiyā antarahitāya ciraṃ pavattissati,
anya-e1102n:74_34: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “paṭisambhidāppattehi vassasahassaṃ aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e1102n:74_40: Aṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathāyampi buddhānaṃ parinibbānato vassasahassameva paṭisambhidā nibbattetuṃ sakkonti,
anya-e1102n:74_42: tato tāpi asakkontā tisso vijjā nibbattanti.
anya-e1102n:74_43: Gacchantekāle tānipi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sukkhavipassakā honti.
anya-e1102n:74_48: Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā pāpuṇituṃ na sakkhiṃsu,
anya-e1102n:74_50: Tato chapi abhiññā pattuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā pāpuṇiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:74_51: Idāni kāle gacchante tisso vijjā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā āsavakkhayaṃ pāpuṇissanti,
anya-e1102n:74_55: Gacchantekāle sotāpattiphalampi pattuṃ na sakkhissantī’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:74_57: tasmā tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ bhāṇakānaṃ matameva buddhaghosācariyena tattha tattha likhitanti gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:74_58: aññathā ācariyasseva pubbāparavirodhappasaṅgo siyā ācariyabuddhaghoseneva hi sīhaḷabhāsaṃ apanetvā māgadhabhāsāya
anya-e1102n:74_60: na aññena ācariyena tasmā aṭṭhakathāya vuttavacanameva pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:75_0: Antimavatthuajjhāpannapubbanti pārājikabhikkhu, so abhabbo sāsane upasampadakammassa laddhuṃ.
anya-e1102n:76_5: Tattha yassa paresaṃ aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gaṇhitvā asucinā āsittassa pariḷāho vūpasamati,
anya-e1102n:76_7: Yassa paresaṃ ajjhācāraṃ passato ussūyāya uppannāya pariḷāho vūpasamati,
anya-e1102n:76_11: Yo pana paṭisandhiyaṃ yeva abhāvako uppanno hoti,
anya-e1102n:76_13: Ekacco pana akusalavipākānubhāvena kāḷapakkhe paṇḍako hoti,
anya-e1102n:76_16: keci pana yo kāḷapakkhe itthī hoti,
anya-e1102n:76_20: Etesu āsittapaṇḍakassa ca ussūyapaṇḍakassa ca pabbajjā na vāritā.
anya-e1102n:76_22: Tesupi pakkhapaṇḍakassa yasmiṃ pakkhe paṇḍako hoti,
anya-e1102n:76_24: Ettha ca apaṇḍakapakkhe pabbajitvā paṇḍakapakkhe nāsetabboti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:76_28: paṇḍakassa kilesakkhayā sambhavato khīṇakilesassa ca paṇḍakabhāvānupapattito ahetuka paṭisandhikathāyañhi
anya-e1102n:76_33: jaccabadhirādayo viya paṇḍako jātisaddena visesetvā niddiṭṭho.
anya-e1102n:76_34: Catutthapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana abhabbapuggale dassentena paṇḍakatiracchānagataubhato byañjanakā tayo vatthuvipannā ahetukapaṭisandhikā,
anya-e1102n:76_36: evaṃ pañcavidhā paṇḍakā te paṇḍakasāmaññena avisesetvā “paṇḍakāti evameva vatvā paṇḍako bhikkhave na upasampādetabbo”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:77_0: Theyyasaṃvāsako ti yo sayameva pabbajjāliṅgaṃ gahetvā bhikkhuvassaṃ gaṇetvā bhikkhūti paṭiññaṃ sampaṭicchati,
anya-e1102n:77_2: so liṅgassa saṃvāsassa ca thenattā ubhayatthenako nāma.
anya-e1102n:77_3: Yo pana yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ na sādiyati,
anya-e1102n:77_5: Yo vā pana sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā musāvādena bhikkhuti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā bhikkhuvassaggena vandanādiṃ sādiyati,
anya-e1102n:77_6: so bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgattā liṅgatthenako na hoti,
anya-e1102n:77_8: Ettha ca ubhayatthenakopi asuddhacittena liṅgatthenakeeva paviṭṭhoti veditabbo.
anya-e1102n:77_13: Yo vā pana bhikkhupārājikamāpannova bhikkhuliṅge ṭhito yāva paṭijānāti,
anya-e1102n:77_16: tathā hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti,
anya-e1102n:77_18: omasavāde pācittiyañca na janeti teneva “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
anya-e1102n:77_19: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadati āpatti omasavādassā”ti omasavāde pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:77_21: Yo pana sāmaṇero sāmaṇeraliṅgeneva pāṇātipātādipañcavidhaṃ silavipattiṃ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e1102n:77_22: sopi āgato liṅganāsanāya nāsetvā saraṇasīlaṃ dātabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:77_24: Vikālabhojanādikaṃ karontassa pana “accayo maṃ bhante accāgamā”tyādinā saṅghamajjhe accayaṃ desāpetvā vā daṇḍakammaṃ vā katvā sīlaṃ dātabbameva.
anya-e1102n:78_0: Tiracchānagatoti yokoci amanussabhūto cattāro apāyikāpi upasampadāya avatthuyeva.
anya-e1102n:78_1: Te paṭisandhiyā lāmakattā abhabbā sāsane pabbajituṃ.
anya-e1102n:78_2: Yadi cattāro apāyikā upasampadāya avatthu bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:78_3: atha kasmā sese anapadisitvā tiracchānagatova avatthūti vuttanti.
anya-e1102n:78_5: tathā hi sambuddhakāle tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbatto eko nāgarājā nāgayoniyā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
anya-e1102n:78_6: Athakho tassa nāgassa etadahosi kenanukho ahaṃ upāyena nāgayoniyā parimucceyyaṃ khippañca manussattaṃ labheyyanti.
anya-e1102n:78_7: Athakho tassa nāgassa etadahosi “ime kho samaṇāsakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino
anya-e1102n:78_8: sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā sace kho ahaṃ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṃ,
anya-e1102n:78_9: evāhaṃ nāgayoniyā parimucceyyaṃ khippañca manussattaṃ paṭilabheyya”nti.
anya-e1102n:78_10: Atha kho so nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
anya-e1102n:78_12: Tena kho pana samayena so nāgo aññatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ paccantime vihāre paṭivasati.
anya-e1102n:78_13: Atha kho so bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccūṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati.
anya-e1102n:78_14: Atha kho so nāgo tassa bhikkhuno nikkhante vissaṭṭho niddaṃ okkamesi.
anya-e1102n:78_17: Athakho so bhikkhu “vihāraṃ pavisissāmī”ti kavāṭaṃ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṃ vihāraṃ ahināpuṇṇaṃ vātapānehi bhoge nikkhante.
anya-e1102n:78_19: Bhikkhū upadhāvitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocuṃ “kissa tvaṃ āvuso vissaramakāsī”ti.
anya-e1102n:78_20: Ayaṃ āvuso sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantāti.
anya-e1102n:78_21: Atha kho so nāgo tena saddena pabujjhitvā sake āsane nisīdi.
anya-e1102n:78_25: Atha kho so nāgo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesī.
anya-e1102n:78_27: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā taṃ nāgaṃ etadavoca “tumhe
anya-e1102n:78_30: tattheva cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa uposathaṃ upavasa,
anya-e1102n:78_31: evaṃ tvaṃ nāgayoniyā parimuccissasi khippañca manussattaṃ paṭilabhissasī”ti.
anya-e1102n:78_32: Atha kho so nāgo “avirūḷhadhammo kirāhaṃ imasmiṃ dhammavinayeti dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno vissaraṃ katvā pakkami.
anya-e1102n:78_33: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi “dve me bhikkhave paccayā nāgassa sabhāvapātukammāya.
anya-e1102n:78_34: Yadā ca sajātiyā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
anya-e1102n:78_36: Ime kho bhikkhave dve paccayā nāgassa sabhāva pātukammāya.
anya-e1102n:78_39: Ettha ca pavattiyaṃ abhiṇhaṃ sabhāvapātukammadassanavasena “dve paccayā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:78_40: Nāgassa pana pañcasu kālesu sabhāvapātukammaṃ hoti paṭisandhikāle,
anya-e1102n:78_46: atha kasmā cattāro apāyikāva upasampadāya avatthūti vuttanti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e1102n:78_47: tathāpi devānaṃ abhabbattā paṭivedhasāsanassa ṭhitattā te abhabbato visuṃ karaṇatthāya evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:78_48: Vakkhati hi samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya mahāvagge “tiracchānagato bhikkhaveti ettha nāgo vā hotu
anya-e1102n:78_49: supaṇṇamāṇavakādīnaṃ vā aññataro antamaso sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upādāya yo koci amanussajātiyo sabbova imasmiṃ
anya-e1102n:78_52: Ettha cāha yadi nāgasupaṇṇā paṭisandhiyā lāmakā bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:78_53: atha kasmā vidhurajātake cattāro janā nāgasupaṇṇasakkadhanañcayakorabyesu bhavanesu taṃ tadeva ṭhānaṃ patthentā dānādīni puññāni karonti,
anya-e1102n:78_54: tesu eko āyupariyosāne saputtadāro nāgabhavane nāgarājā hutvā nibbatti,
anya-e1102n:78_55: eko supaṇṇabhavane simbalivimāne supaṇṇarājā hutvā nibbatti,
anya-e1102n:78_57: eko dhanañcayakorabyarañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattīti catunnampi janānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ kusalakammeneva
anya-e1102n:78_59: “kusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti imissāpi paṭṭhānapāḷiyā
anya-e1102n:78_61: na panevaṃ vattabbaṃ atha kathañcidaṃ paccetabbanti. Vuccate,
anya-e1102n:78_62: nikantiyā balavattā sattavidhamethunasaṃyogattā ca aparisuddhā tesaṃ kusalacetanā,
anya-e1102n:78_64: Duggatibhūmiyaṃ pavattamānāpi kammā yūhanakāle taṃ taṃ bhūmipatthanā taṇhāsampayuttāpubbabhāgacetanā balena tesu tiracchānabhūmīsu nibbattanti,
anya-e1102n:78_69: Nikantica nāmesā balavajhānasampayuttacetanāpi paṭibāhituṃ sakkā tathā hi gopakadevadattassa ācariyasamaṇo
anya-e1102n:78_70: jhānabalena brahmabhūmīsu anibbattitvā jhānaṃ paṭibāhitvā aññakammena gandhabbadevesuyeva uppajjati “sīlavato
anya-e1102n:78_71: hi bhikkhave cetopaṇidhi samijjhati visuddhattā”ti tesaṃ vitthāro dīghanikāye āgato,
anya-e1102n:78_73: Sattavidhamethunasaṃyogavasenāpi sattā dukkhato na muccanti vuttañhi bhagavatā “idha brāhmaṇa ekacco
anya-e1102n:78_74: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā sammā brahmacārī paṭijānamāno na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvaya samāpattiṃ
anya-e1102n:78_76: api ca kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ nhāpanaṃ parimaddanaṃ sambāhanaṃ sādiyati,
anya-e1102n:78_79: Idampikho brāhmaṇabrahmacariyassa khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampi.
anya-e1102n:78_80: Ayaṃ vuccati brāhmaṇa aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati.
anya-e1102n:78_81: Saṃyutto methunasaṃyogena na parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena…pe…
anya-e1102n:78_85: Na heva kho mātugāmenasaddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e1102n:78_87: api ca kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkeḷāyati,
anya-e1102n:78_90: Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe…
anya-e1102n:78_91: na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ samāpajjati.
anya-e1102n:78_93: Napi mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkeḷāyati.
anya-e1102n:78_94: Apica kho mātugāmassa cakkhuṃ upanijjhāyati pekkhati,
anya-e1102n:78_97: Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇovā brāhmaṇo vā…pe…
anya-e1102n:78_101: Api ca kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃvā tiropākāraṃvā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā,
anya-e1102n:78_104: Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇo vā brahmaṇo vā…pe…
anya-e1102n:78_109: api ca kho yānitāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni anussarati.
anya-e1102n:78_112: Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇo vā brahmaṇo vā…pe…
anya-e1102n:78_115: na pi yāni tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni anussarati,
anya-e1102n:78_116: api ca kho gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi sahitaṃ samaṅgībhūtaṃ paricārayamānaṃ,
anya-e1102n:78_121: napi anussarati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā paricārayamānaṃ,
anya-e1102n:78_122: api ca kho aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapenavā
anya-e1102n:78_123: brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vāti,
anya-e1102n:78_127: Idaṃ kho brāhmaṇa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampī”ti evaṃ lābhādihetukena bhedena
anya-e1102n:79_0: Mātughātake pana yena manussitthibhūtāpi ajanikā posā vanikā mātā vā mahāmātā vā cūḷamātā vā janikāpi amanussitthibhūtā mātā ghātitā,
anya-e1102n:79_3: Tiracchānitthiyopi manussapurisamāgamma manussabhūtaṃ puttaṃ vijāyanti kontaputtā dvebhātikattherā viya tepi hi aṇḍajāyeva,
anya-e1102n:79_4: tathā hi petaloke tiracchāne manusse cāti imesu tīsu bhūmīsu catasso yoniyo sambhavanti.
anya-e1102n:79_11: sā hi rañño asokadhammarājassa kāle vanacarakena labhitvā manussasaṃvāsamāgamma dve putte vijāyitvā “idāni
anya-e1102n:79_12: dārake pahāya na gamissatī”ti saññāya vanacarako tassā potthaṃ adāsi,
anya-e1102n:79_13: sā potthaṃ labhitvā pakkhanditvā sakaṭṭhānameva gatā kinnariyo hi potthaṃ vinā pakkhandituṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e1102n:79_14: teneva tāpaso “mā potthaṃ assā adāsī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:79_17: tathā hi cakkavattino vehāsagamanādi puññavato iddhināma,
anya-e1102n:79_18: na tena cakkaratanaṃ vā hatthiassaratanaṃ vā vinā attano sabhāveneva gantuṃ sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:79_19: Tattha cakkaratanaṃ rañño cakkavattissa kammabalena nibbattattā samuddamajjhe jāyamānampi kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:79_22: Kinnariyo pana potthaṃ vinā attano sabhāvena pakkhandituṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e1102n:79_24: Keci pana devānaṃ alaṅkārā viya paṭisandhiyā saha āgatoti vadanti,
anya-e1102n:79_29: saṃsedajāpi padumagabbhevā veḷugabbhe vā nibbattā pokkharasātibrāhmaṇapadumavatīveḷuvatīdevīādayo viya.
anya-e1102n:79_31: Yena sayaṃ tiracchānabhūtena manussitthibhūtā mātā ghātitā,
anya-e1102n:79_32: sopi ānantariko na hoti tiracchānagatattā panassa pabbajjā paṭikkhittā,
anya-e1102n:79_36: seyyathāpi bhūridattassa mātā itthiyo hi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti -
anya-e1102n:79_44: Tattha ajjhācārena sudinnassa purāṇadutiyikā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā pacchimabhavikaṃ suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṃ bījakaṃ nāma puttaṃ vijāyi.
anya-e1102n:79_45: Kadāci ekaccā utusamaye chandarāgarattā purisānaṃ hatthagāhaveṇigāhaaṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanaṃ sādiyantiyopi gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e1102n:79_47: Udāyittherassa pana purāṇadutiyikā bhikkhunī taṃ asuciṃ ekadesaṃ mukhena aggahesi,
anya-e1102n:79_51: Migasiṅgatāpasassa mātā migī utusamaye tāpasassa passāvaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā sasambhavaṃ pivi,
anya-e1102n:79_52: sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā migasiṅgaṃ nāma tāpasadārakaṃ vijāyi.
anya-e1102n:79_54: Sāmassa pana bodhisattassa mātā utusamaye nābhiparāmasanena gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā sāmatāpasadārakaṃ vijāyi,
anya-e1102n:79_55: evaṃ maṇḍabyassa ca caṇḍapajjo tassa ca mātā utusamaye nābhiparāmasanavasena,
anya-e1102n:79_56: tattha ca diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya nābhiparāmasanena maṇḍabyassa nibbatti ahosi.
anya-e1102n:79_57: Caṇḍapajjotassa mātu nābhiyaṃ vicchiko pharitvā gato,
anya-e1102n:79_59: Idhekaccā itthī utusamaye purisasaṃsaggaṃ alabhamānā chandarāgavasena antogehegatāva purisaṃ upanijjhāyati,
anya-e1102n:79_64: tā utusamaye meghasaddaṃ sutvā gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e1102n:79_65: Gāvīeva vā kadāci usabhagandhena gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e1102n:79_67: Evaṃ aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi itthiyo gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e1102n:79_69: tasmā bhūridattādayo dhataraṭṭhaṃ nāgarājānaṃ paṭicca nāgāyeva honti.
anya-e1102n:79_70: Caṇḍapajjotassa pana vicchikaṃ paṭicca manusso jāto,
anya-e1102n:80_0: Arahantaghātako pana amanussa arahantadevataṃ vā manussajātiyaṃ vā avasesaṃ ariyapuggalaṃ ghātetvā anantariyo na hoti,
anya-e1102n:80_3: Tiracchāno pana amanussaarahantampi ghātetvā ānantariko na hoti,
anya-e1102n:80_4: kammaṃ pana bhāriyaṃ tiracchānagatattā panassa pabbajjā vāritā.
anya-e1102n:81_0: Lohituppādako pana yo tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya parūpakkamena cammaṃ chinditvā lohitaṃ paggharituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e1102n:81_1: sarīrassa pana antoyeva ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati,
anya-e1102n:81_7: Yo pana jīvako viya rogavūpasamanatthaṃ phāletvā pūtimaṃsañca lohitañca nīharitvā phāsuṃ karoti,
anya-e1102n:82_1: purisavasena duvidho tattha itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthinimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ,
anya-e1102n:82_5: Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthīsu purisattaṃ karontassa itthinimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:82_7: Purisaubhatobyañjanakassa purisānaṃ itthibhāvaṃ upagacchantassa purisanimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:82_11: Purisa ubhato byañjanako pana sayaṃ na gaṇhāti,
anya-e1102n:82_15: Ubhato byañjanaṃ assa atthīti viggahena “ubhatobyañja”nti vakkhatha,
anya-e1102n:82_22: tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatīti noti ekasmiṃ santāne indriya dvayassa paṭisevitattā.
anya-e1102n:82_32: tathā hi itthi ubhatobyañjanakassa yadā itthiyā rattaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:82_35: Yadi tesaṃ indriyadvayaṃ byañjanānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:82_36: sadā byañjana dvayaṃ ekato tiṭṭheyya na pana tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n:82_38: Byañjanakāraṇaṃ indriyaṃ pahāya rāgacittamevettha byañjanadvayassa kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:82_47: pavatte purisaliṅgaṃ nibbatī”ti paṭisandhiyaṃ liṅgasambhavo vutto,
anya-e1102n:82_54: yathā ca bīje sati rukkho sambhavati, nāsati,
anya-e1102n:82_55: evameva indriye sati liṅgādīni sambhavanti bījasadisañhi indriyaṃ,
anya-e1102n:82_56: rukkhasadisāni liṅgādīni evameva tesu puggalesu paṇḍakādayo ekādasapuggalā tasmiṃ yeva bhave niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ na arahanti,
anya-e1102n:82_59: upanissaye sati tasmiṃyeva bhave niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ arahanti,
anya-e1102n:86_0: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti.
anya-e1102n:87_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ apekkhitvā vā evaṃ asakkontenāpi sithiladhanita vimuttaniggahitavasena
anya-e1102n:87_1: vuttāni byañjanāni akopetvā vā duruttaṃ vā akatvā vuttaṃ ñattisampatti nāma.
anya-e1102n:87_2: Ñattivipatti nāma sabbaso ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā vā vatthusaṅghapuggalañattīnaṃ aparāmasanāni pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanañcāti ime tāva pañca ñattidosā.
anya-e1102n:87_3: Tattha ayaṃ itthanāmoti upasampadāpekkhassa api akittanaṃ vatthuaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:87_4: Suṇātu me bhante saṅghoti ettha suṇātu me bhanteti vatvā saṅghoti abhaṇanaṃ saṅghaaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:87_5: Itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkhoti upajjhāyassa akittanaṃ puggalaaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:87_6: Sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiyā anuccāraṇaṃ ñattiaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:87_7: Paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā esā ñattīti vatvā khamati saṅghassāti evaṃ ñatti kittanaṃ pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:87_8: Iti ime pañca ñattidosā ñattivipatti nāma.
anya-e1102n:87_9: Imehi dosehi vimuttāya ñattiyā sampannaṃ ñattisampatti nāma.
anya-e1102n:89_2: akāle sāvananti ime pañca anusāvanadose vajjetvā kathanaṃ anusāvanasampatti nāma.
anya-e1102n:89_4: Tīsu pana anusāvanāsu yattha katthaci etesaṃ aparāmasanaṃ aparāmasanameva.
anya-e1102n:89_5: Sabbena sabbaṃ pana kammavācaṃ avatvā catukkhattuṃ ñattikittanameva vā kammavācabbhantarepi cattāri byañjanāni
anya-e1102n:89_6: kopetvā vā akkharassa vā padassa vā duruccāraṇaṃ vā katvā sāvanaṃ sāvanāya hāpanaṃ nāma,
anya-e1102n:89_7: tathā hi sithiladhanitavimuttaniggahitavasena cattāri byañjanāni antokammavācāya kammaṃ kopenti.
anya-e1102n:89_8: Tattha “suṇātu me ti sithile vattabbe suṇāthu me”ti vacanaṃ sithile dhanitaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:89_9: “Bhante”ti vattabbe bhanteti vacanaṃ dhanite sithilaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:89_10: “Suṇātu esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “suṇantu esaṃ ñattī”ti vacanaṃ vimutte niggahitaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:89_12: Evaṃ imāni cattāri byañjanāni antokammavācāya kammaṃ dūsenti.
anya-e1102n:89_13: Imāni cattāri akopetvā vadantenāpi aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe aññaṃ akkharaṃ vadanto duruttaṃ karoti nāma.
anya-e1102n:89_14: Itaresu dīgharassādīsu chasu ṭhānesu dīghaṭṭhāne dīghaṃ,
anya-e1102n:89_15: rassaṭṭhāne rassamevāti evaṃ yathāṭhāne taṃ tadeva akkharaṃ bhāsantena anukkamāgataṃ paveṇiṃ avināsetvā kammavācā kātabbā.
anya-e1102n:89_16: Sace pana evaṃ akatvā dīghe vattabbe rassaṃ,
anya-e1102n:89_23: Imāni cha byañjanāni kammaṃ na kopenti.
anya-e1102n:89_25: Apare pana idāni byañjanāni antokammavācāya kammaṃ dūsentīti vadanti,
anya-e1102n:89_29: Sāvanāya anokāse paṭhamaṃ ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā anusāvanaṃ akāle sāvanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:89_30: Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya anusāvanāya sampannaṃ anusāvanasampattisampannaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:89_32: “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti anusāvanāya katattā kammakopo na hoti,
anya-e1102n:89_33: kārakasaṅgho pana sātisāro tenevāha vimativinodaniyampi pattacīvarānaṃ abhāvepi’paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara’nti
anya-e1102n:89_34: kammavācāya sāvitattā kammakopaṃ avatvā dukkaṭameva vuttanti.
anya-e1102n:89_40: Vakkhati hi vimativinodaniyaṃ “kammaṃ na kuppatīti idaṃ upajjhāyābhāvepi itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho
anya-e1102n:89_41: itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”ti matassa vā vibbhamantassa vā purāṇaupajjhāyassa vā yassa kassaci avijjamānassāpi
anya-e1102n:89_43: Yadi hi upajjhāyakittanaṃ na kareyya,’puggalaṃ na parāmasatī’ti vuttakammavipattieva siyā,
anya-e1102n:89_48: vakkhati hi vimativinodaniyaṃ “saṅghena upajjhāyenā”ti ayaṃ itthannāmo saṅghassa upasampadāpekkho,
anya-e1102n:89_50: Saṅghena upajjhāyenā”ti evaṃ kammavācāya saṅghameva upajjhāyaṃ kittetvāti attho.
anya-e1102n:89_51: Evaṃ’gaṇena upajjhāyenā’ti etthāpi ayaṃ itthannāmogaṇassa upasampadāpekkho’ti ādinā yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e1102n:89_52: Evaṃ vuttepi kammaṃ na kuppati eva,
anya-e1102n:89_54: aññathā so ca puggalo anupasampannoti vadeyyā’ti.
anya-e1102n:89_56: te vajjetvā pañcavaggādigaṇo hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā pūrati,
anya-e1102n:89_58: kārakasaṅgho pana sātisāro tena vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “paṇḍakādīhi upajjhāyehi kariyamānesu paṇḍakādikena vināva pañcavaggādigaṇo pūrati,
anya-e1102n:89_63: sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu dvīhi vā tīhi vā ācariyehi visuṃ visuṃ ekena ekassāti ekappahāreneva dve tisso vā kammavācā kātabbā.
anya-e1102n:89_70: natveva’nānupajjhāyenā’ti paṭikkhittattā na vaṭṭatīti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:89_71: Catunnaṃ pana janānaṃ vicāraṇakathāya nāpi kammavipattichāyā dissati,
anya-e1102n:89_76: pacchā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetuṃ vaṭṭati terasavatthuvimuttattā sampatti yevetthapamāṇattā ca.
anya-e1102n:91_0: Idāni sīmavisodhaniṃ nāma, nānāganthasamāhanti imissā gāthāya saṃvaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto.
anya-e1102n:95_0: Yaṃ sīmaṃ anujānāti, tattha pañho pavattati.
anya-e1102n:96_0: Dveḷhakā saṃsayā honti, dese sabbattha bhikkhavo;
anya-e1102n:98_0: Yadi me īdisaṃ vādaṃ, sutvāvupekkhako bhave;
anya-e1102n:106_0: Mā tvaṃ ānanda rodasi, mā tvaṃ ānanda socasi;
anya-e1102n:116_0: Tattha sīmavisodhani'nti sīmavipattijahanaṃ sīmavipattiṃ pahāya sampattilakkhaṇappakāsakaṃ pakaraṇaṃ karissanti attho.
anya-e1102n:116_16: Tattha khaṇḍasīmā nāma pabbajjupasampadādīnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ sukhakaraṇatthaṃ mahāsīmāya vā gāmakhette vā khaṇḍitvā paricchinditvā sammatā.
anya-e1102n:116_17: Tassāvitthāro ''paṭhamaṃ nimittā kittetabbā''ti ādinā dvāsattatippabhedāya samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya mahāvagge vutto,
anya-e1102n:116_21: Tattha sace pana heṭṭhā uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa parato anto leṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:116_23: Athāpi uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orato bahi leṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:116_24: antosīmā na otaratīti ime dve ekatthā byañjanameva nānaṃ.
anya-e1102n:116_25: Ayañhetthatthouparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orimabhāgato heṭṭhā pabbatapāde umaṅgasaṇṭhānena pabbatapasse vijjhitvā leṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:116_26: sīmāparicchedassa parato leṇe ca leṇassa bahibhūte heṭṭhā pabbate ca bhūmibhāge sīmā na otarati,
anya-e1102n:116_28: Tassa uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orimabhāgato bahibhūte heṭṭhā pabbatapāde umaṅgasaṇṭhānena vijjhitvā pabbatapasse leṇaṃ athāpi hoti,
anya-e1102n:116_29: leṇe ca leṇassa parabhūte heṭṭhā pabbate ca bhūmibhāge sīmā na otarati,
anya-e1102n:116_34: Tameva antosaddaṃ sīmāparicchedena visesetuṃ “uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa parato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:116_35: Pabbatapādaṃ pana apekkhitvā “orato”ti vattabbepi sīmānissayaṃ pabbataggaṃ sandhāya “parato”ti vuttanti
anya-e1102n:116_36: daṭṭhabbaṃ teneva bahileṇanti ettha bahisaddaṃ visesento “uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orato”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:116_37: Bahi sīmā na otaratīti ettha bahī ti pabbatapādeleṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:116_38: Leṇassa bahibhūte upari sīmāparicchedassa heṭṭhābhāge sīmā na otaratīti attho.
anya-e1102n:116_39: Antosīmāti leṇassa ca pabbatapādassa ca anto attano otaraṇārahaṭṭhāne na otaratīti attho.
anya-e1102n:116_41: sīmā na otaratī ti cettha attano otaraṇārahaṭṭhāne leṇabhāvena sīmā sabbathā “anotaraṇameva dassitanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:116_42: Tattha pi anotaraṇanti uparieva sīmā hotī”ti vimativinodanī.
anya-e1102n:116_43: Keci pana veḷususiro viya susirameva leṇanti vadanti,
anya-e1102n:117_0: Upacārasīmā nāma gāmāraññanigamādivasā yāva brahmalokā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ nivāsagehassa vā devavimānakapparukkhādīnaṃ
anya-e1102n:117_1: vā upacārārahaṭṭhānameva upacārasīmā te idha nādhippetā,
anya-e1102n:117_3: Yaṃ pana padesaṃ paricchinditvā pariveṇaṃ katvā pākārādiparikkhittaṃ vā katvā aparikkhittepi upacārārahaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1102n:117_4: paricchinditvā vā yasmiṃ padese bhikkhū vasanti,
anya-e1102n:117_9: Tatruppādenā bhatanti vihārasantakena khettavatthuādinā ābhataṃ kiñci saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ uppajjati,
anya-e1102n:117_10: taṃ tesaṃ kathinatthārakabhikkhūnaṃ yeva bhavissatīti yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e1102n:117_11: Khettavatthuādinā ti ettha ādisaddena matakacīvaraṃ vā hotu saṃghaṃ uddissa dinnaṃ vā saṅghikena vā ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:117_13: teneva “tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena saṅghaṃ uddissa vihāro kārito hoti,
anya-e1102n:117_14: so tassa vihārassa kate ubhatosaṅghassa akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmo hoti.
anya-e1102n:117_15: Tena kho pana samayena ubhatosaṅghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:117_16: Atha kho so upāsako saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṃ yācī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ānisaṃsapasambhanatthaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ bhagavatā paññattaṃ,
anya-e1102n:117_17: teneva thullanandā bhikkhunī ānisaṃsaṃ appaṭippassambhentā cīvaraṃ amhākaṃ bhavissatīti kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhi,
anya-e1102n:117_18: tasmā kathinatthatasīmāyaṃ anuddhaṭe kathine yāva phagguṇapuṇṇamā pañca māsā etthantare matakacīvaraṃ
anya-e1102n:117_19: vā hotu cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa matānaṃ ñātijanānaṃ vā,
anya-e1102n:117_20: bhikkhāpaññattiyā vā vihāramahādikiccena vā yenakenaci ākārena saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ dinnaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:117_22: Chinnavassānaṃ vā pacchimikāya upagatānaṃ vā tattha sampattānaṃ sīmaṭṭhakabhikkhūnaṃ vā na hoti.
anya-e1102n:117_27: Teneva gaṇapūraṇavasena sampattānaṃ chinnaṃ vassānaṃ vā pacchimikāya upagatānaṃ vā aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassanaṃ vā khādanīyabhojanīyādīni pāpuṇanti.
anya-e1102n:117_29: Tasmiṃ vihāre asati aññavihāre baddhasīmāya vā udakukkhepasīmādīsu vā kātabbameva.
anya-e1102n:118_1: tasmiṃ vihāre purimikāya upagatā kathinatthārakusalā na honti.
anya-e1102n:118_3: Kammavācaṃ sāvetvā kathinaṃ attharāpetvā dānañca bhuñjitvā gamissanti,
anya-e1102n:118_6: Chinnavassāvā pacchimikāya upagatā vā aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi vā purimikāya upagatānaṃ gaṇapūraṇamattameva labhanti,
anya-e1102n:118_11: Apare pana “kathinatthatasīmanti upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vuttattā upacārasīmāyameva kathinanatthāraka ñattiṃ karonti,
anya-e1102n:118_14: Tathā hi upacārasīmāyameva paviṭṭhagāmasīmāyaṃ tattha otiṇṇe bhikkhū tattha pāsānayanaṃ vā bahisīmakaraṇaṃ vā ko sakkhissati.
anya-e1102n:118_19: Tattha apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa
anya-e1102n:118_20: anumatiyā saṅghaṃ kittetvā “ruccati saṅghassā”ti tikkhuttuṃ anusāvetvā kattabbaṃ vuccati.
anya-e1102n:118_21: Ñattikammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ.
anya-e1102n:118_22: Ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā ekāya ca anusāvanāyāti
anya-e1102n:118_24: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā tīhi ca anusāvanāhīti
anya-e1102n:118_25: evaṃ ñatticatutthāhi tīhi anusāvanāhi kattabbaṃ kammaṃ.
anya-e1102n:118_27: Kathinatthatasāṭakadānepi anatthateyeva kathine tato bahuānisaṃsacīvarasāṭakaṃ labhitvā teneva sāṭakena attharitabbā,
anya-e1102n:118_28: puna kammavācāya dānakiccaṃ natthi apalokanakammena saṅghassa anumatiyā dātabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:118_31: Ñattikammaṃ pana dhammasaṅgāhakakāle mahākassapattherādīhi attanāva attānaṃ sammannanakāle lahukakammeyeva labbhati.
anya-e1102n:118_37: vihāravatthudesanāti imāni cha garukammāni apaloketvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n:118_39: Ito paresu cīvaravippavāsasammutiādīsu ñattidutiyakammesu apaloketvāpi kātabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:118_41: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ pana idāni upasampadākammaṃ idāni cattāri kammāni baddhasīmāya vā,
anya-e1102n:118_42: tasmiṃ asati udakukkhepasīmāya vā sodhetuṃ asakkonte sati abaddhasīmāya vā kātabbameva.
anya-e1102n:118_43: Apare evaṃ vadanti “kuṭivatthukāravihāravatthukārakāle tāni kuṭivihāravatthūni kathaṃ sīmaṭṭhā kātuṃ sakkhissanti,
anya-e1102n:118_48: tathā hi saṅghakuṭivatthuṃ olokentaṃ yācatityādinā vatthuparāmasanaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vatthuñattidose ca
anya-e1102n:118_49: vipatti lakkhaṇe ca vajjetvā ñattidutiyakammena sammatabhikkhūhi tattha kuṭivihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā oloketabbaṃ
anya-e1102n:118_50: teneva pāḷiyaṃ “tehi sammatehi bhikkhūhi tattha gantvā kuṭivatthu oloketabba”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:118_51: Aññathā pattacīvaravirahitaṃ puggalaṃ vā anupajjhāyakaṃ vā katvā upasampādentehi “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti vā “itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho,
anya-e1102n:118_52: itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”ti kammavācāya sāvitepi kammassa asijjhanaṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e1102n:118_54: tathā hi sīmāsammutikāle bhikkhū tasmiṃ yeva ṭhāne ṭhatvā kammavācaṃ sāventi,
anya-e1102n:118_57: sīmajjhottharaṇaṃ vā sīmasambhedo vā siyā”ti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e1102n:118_58: tathāpi taṃ sīmāsammutiṭṭhānaṃ bhujissaṃ katvā sīmasammutikammassakatattā visuṃgāme sammatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e1102n:118_59: gāmasīme ṭhitā bhikkhū kammaṃ kopetuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:118_60: Yadi sīmasammutiṭṭhānaṃ bhujissaṃ katvāva sīmaṃ sammanneyya,
anya-e1102n:118_61: kathaṃ bhagavato dharamānakāle chabbaggiyā bhikkhu yathāsukhaṃ sīmaṃ sammannissantīti na panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ
anya-e1102n:118_62: tathā hi vāsākhā migāramātāpi navakoṭīhi bhūmiṃ gaṇhitvā pubbārāmaṃ nāma mahā vihāraṃ kāresi,
anya-e1102n:118_63: tathā anāthapiṇḍiko kahāpaṇasanthatena jetassa rājakumārassa uyyānaṭṭhānaṃ kiṇāpetvā gaṇhitvā jetavanaṃ
anya-e1102n:118_64: nāma mahāvihāraṃ kāresi evaṃ puññakāmā pariveṇaṃ katvā vihāraṃ karonti tasmā chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yathāsukhaṃ
anya-e1102n:119_0: Samānasaṃvāsasīmā nāma diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅghātasaṅkhātehi bhikkhugaṇehi uposathādisaṅghakammena samānaṃ ekībhāvaṃ hutvā vasituṃ sammatā sīmā.
anya-e1102n:119_1: Avippavāsasīmā nāma ticīvarena vippavasituṃ sammatā sīmā,
anya-e1102n:119_2: etā dvesīmā tiyojanaparamatāyapi sambhavato mahāsīmā tipi nāmaṃ labhanti,
anya-e1102n:119_3: tāsaṃ vicāraṇā mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sabbaso paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vuttā,
anya-e1102n:119_4: tasmā idha na vakkhāma vuccamānampi avisesetvā vuttaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:120_0: Lābhasīmā nāma yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā pokkharaṇītaḷākavanādikaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ saṅghassa catuccappayatthāya
anya-e1102n:120_6: Mātikāṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsaniyampi lābhasīmāti yaṃ rājarājamahāmattādayo vihāraṃ kāretvā gāvutaṃ
anya-e1102n:120_7: vā aḍḍhayojanaṃ vā yojanaṃ vā samantā paricchinditvā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ vihārassa lābhasīmā,
anya-e1102n:120_9: taṃ sabbaṃ amhākaṃ vihārassa demā”ti ṭhapenti,
anya-e1102n:120_11: Imasmiṃ lābhasīmādhikāre rañño mahācetiyadāyakassa divaṅgatakālato ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare atīte tassa jeṭṭhaputtassa
anya-e1102n:120_13: Yadi hi rājarājamahāmattādīsu yo koci yassa vihārassa yāni taḷākakhettavatthādīni datvā taṃ sahitavihāraṃ puggalassa deti,
anya-e1102n:120_14: evaṃ sati kiṃ tassa puggalassa taṃ sahitavihāraṃ puggalikabhāvena paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n:120_15: udāhu saṅghikabhāvenevāti taḷākakhettavatthādivirahito pana kevalo puggalikavihāro aññesaṃ dammīti adatvā puggale mate saṅghiko hoti,
anya-e1102n:120_18: yadi hi rājarājamahāmattādīsu yokoci vihārassa taḷākakhettāvatthādīni deti,
anya-e1102n:120_19: evaṃ sati paṭikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatītidaṭṭhabbaṃ tena vuttaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “imaṃ taḷākaṃ,
anya-e1102n:120_21: imaṃ vatthuṃ vihārassa demāti vutte paṭikkhipituṃ na labbhatī”ti.
anya-e1102n:123_4: tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ vihārassa demāti saṅghikavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e1102n:123_5: “Pāsādassā”ti ca sāmaññena vuttepi “tena kho pana samayena visākhā migāramātā saṅghassa atthāya sāḷindaṃ
anya-e1102n:123_6: pāsādaṃ kārāpetukāmo hoti hatthinakhaka”nti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ pāsādaparibhogassa anuññātattā saṅghikaṃyeva
anya-e1102n:123_7: pāsādaṃ sandhāya vuttanti viññāyati tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga’nti.
anya-e1102n:123_8: Pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya vaṇṇanādhikāre “suvaṇṇarajatādivicitrānī”tiādi saṅghikasenāsanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:123_9: Puggalikaṃ pana suvaṇṇādivicitraṃ bhikkhussa sampaṭicchitumeva na vaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n:123_11: tenevettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vāti na vutta’nti.
anya-e1102n:123_12: “Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammavinayavaṇṇanaṭṭhāne”ti vuttattā saṅghikameva suvaṇṇādimayaṃ senāsanaṃ senāsanaparikkhārā ca vaṭṭanti,
anya-e1102n:123_16: Sace pana rājarājamahāmattādīsu yokoci taḷākakhettavatthādisahitaṃ vihāraṃ puggalassa taṃ sahitavihārabhāvamārocetvā deti,
anya-e1102n:123_17: evaṃ sati puggalassa saṅghikavihārabhāveneva paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n:123_19: vihārassa demā”ti vatvā dinnānaṃ taḷākakhettavatthādīnaṃ saṅghasseva vaṭṭamānattā.
anya-e1102n:123_20: Tenevāha vimativinodaniyaṃ “vihārassa demāti vuttaṃ saṅghassa vaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n:123_23: Tatrāyaṃ yojanā vihārassādemāti vatvā dinnaṃ khettādi saṅghassa vaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n:123_25: evaṃ vihārassa demāti vuttaṃ suvaṇṇādivicittaṃ akappiyamañcaṃ saṅghassa vaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n:123_28: tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “cattāropaccaye paribhuñjatūti deti vaṭṭatītiettha bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e1102n:123_29: catupaccayaparibhogatthāya taḷākaṃ dammīti vā bhikkhusaṅgho cattāro paccaye paribhuñjituṃ taḷākaṃ dammīti
anya-e1102n:123_30: vā ito taḷākato uppanne cattāro paccaye dammīti vā vuttampi vaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n:123_32: puggalassa pana evampi dinnaṃ taḷākakhettādi na vaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n:123_37: pāḷiyaṃ puggalikavasena gahetuṃ ananuññātattāti daṭṭhabba”nti ca.
anya-e1102n:123_38: Puggalassa pana puggalānañca khettavatthādīni kappiyavohārenāpi paṭiggahetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n:123_39: Evañcakatvā vimativinodaniyaṃ “khettavatthādīnipi kappiyavohārenāpi puggalānaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati,

anya-e1102n:123_41: puggalikavasena gahaṇe ananuññāte taditarānaṃ tathāgahetabbatā siddhāva hotī’ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:123_42: tasmā taḷākakhettavatthādisahitassa vihārassa saṅghikabhāveneva paṭiggahetabbatā siddhā hotīti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e1102n:124_0: Taḷākakhettavatthādivirahitaṃ pana vihāraṃ puggalikabhāvenāpi paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n:124_1: So ca vihāro tasmiṃ puggale jīvante puggaliko hoti.
anya-e1102n:124_2: Aññesaṃ dammīti adatvā mate avissajjanīyo avebhaṅgiyo,

anya-e1102n:124_9: Yaṃ tattha garubhaṇḍaṃgaruparikkhāraṃ taṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgiyanti.

anya-e1102n:125_0: Ettha ca yaṃ tattha garubhaṇḍa’nti ādīsu garubhaṇḍaṃ nāma rāsivasena pañcavidhaṃ,

anya-e1102n:129_9: Taṃ pana vihāraṃ attano rucitassa yassakassaci puggalassa “imaṃ vihāraṃ tuyhaṃ dammi,

anya-e1102n:129_13: “Khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”ti ādinā yaṃ khettādivatthupaṭiggahaṇaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ,

anya-e1102n:129_16: puggalassa paṭiggahaṇe vā paribhutte vā doso natthi,
anya-e1102n:129_20: Nanu ca visākhā migāramātā saṅghasseva atthāya sāḷindaṃ pāsādaṃ hatthinakhakanti. Saccaṃ,

anya-e1102n:129_22: Aññathā puggale antovihāre nisinnoyeva saṅgho tasmiṃ yeva vihārasīme kammaṃ karontopi kammakopo na bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:129_23: avaggārahattāti vakkhati ca sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “anujānāmi bhikkhave sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga”nti vacanato
anya-e1102n:129_24: puggalikepi senāsane se nāsanaparibhogavasena niyamitaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭādikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭamānampi
anya-e1102n:129_25: kevalaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti,
anya-e1102n:129_26: imināpi vacanena puggalikavihārassapi sabbakappiyabhāvo viññāyati “anujānāmi bhikkhave sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga”nti ñāpakassa dassanato.

anya-e1102n:129_32: tathā khettādivatthumpi bhikkhussa attano santakabhāvena paṭiggahetuṃ na vaṭṭanti,
anya-e1102n:129_34: sabbasaddassa dassanato tenevāha samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya “senāsane pana dvārakavāṭa vātapānakavāṭādīsu
anya-e1102n:129_36: Senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthi aññatra viruddhasenāsanā”ti,
anya-e1102n:129_37: iminā ṭhapetvā’gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā’ti ettha viruddhasenāsanaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbakappiyākappiyaṃ vihārassa kappati,
anya-e1102n:132_0: Nanuca vihārassa demāti saṅghikavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttanti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e1102n:132_1: Vuttaṃ ettha hi ācariyassaadhippāyena bhavitabbaṃ “khettavattādīnipuggalikavihārassa demā”ti vutte “na kappati upāsakā”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:132_4: evaṃ sati ca “khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”ti ādinā vuttasikkhāpadena kāretabbataṃ āpajjati.
anya-e1102n:132_6: Kasmā so puggalo tassa saṅghikavihārassa anissaro.
anya-e1102n:132_7: Cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnaṃ yaṃkiñci khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā padesaṃ acchinditvā gaṇhantassapi pārājiko na hoti,
anya-e1102n:132_8: sabbasseva cātuddisikassa saṅghassa dhuranikkhepassa asambhavato tasmā saṅghikavihārassa dinne paṭikkhitte saṅghassa lābhantarāyakaro hotīti.

anya-e1102n:132_18: tathā hi khettavatthādisahitassa vihārassa puggalikabhāvena akappiye sati.
anya-e1102n:132_20: evañca pana vadeyya “dhuraṃ nikkhipatīti ettha ekassa santake taḷāke khette cātiettha gihisantakameva sandhāya vutta”nti.

anya-e1102n:132_26: Tathā “anujānāmi bhikkhave sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga”nti vacanato puggalikepi senāsane senāsanaparibhogavasena
anya-e1102n:132_27: niyamitaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭādikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭamānampi kevalaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ
anya-e1102n:132_28: na vaṭṭatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vutta vacanenāpi avirodho siyā,
anya-e1102n:132_29: tathā “senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthi aññatra viruddhasenāsananā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanenāpi saṃsandameva.

anya-e1102n:135_1: Tāsaṃ pana viseso evaṃ veditabbo yasmiṃ pana padese āpaṇameva atthi,

anya-e1102n:138_4: Tattha yaṃ padesaṃ asammatāya bhikkhave sīmāya aṭhapitāya yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati,

anya-e1102n:139_0: Abbhantarasīmā nāma yaṃ paṭapadesaṃ agāmake bhikkhave araññe samantā sattabbhantarā,

anya-e1102n:139_2: Tattha samantā sattabbhantarāti yasmiṃ viñjhāṭavisadise araññe bhikkhu vasati,
anya-e1102n:139_3: athassa ṭhitokāsato samantā puratthimāya sattabbhantarā pacchimāya sattabbhantarā dakkhiṇāya sattabbhantarā
anya-e1102n:139_6: dakkhiṇuttaravasenapi cuddasabbhantarāti evaṃ nibbedhena cuddasa cuddasa katvā samantā aṭṭhavīsati abbhantarā honti.
anya-e1102n:139_7: Ettha ca ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ aṭṭhavīsati hatthappamāṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:139_9: evaṃ dakkhiṇuttarapacchimesupīti sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā caturāsītisattasatahatthappamāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:139_10: Parimaṇḍalavasena pana sabbaṃ chasattatiekasatuttarāni ca ekaṃ sahassañca hoti.
anya-e1102n:142_0: Vuttattā ayanavasena vinibbedhe cuddasabbhantare dvehatthādhikaaṭṭhasattati hoti.
anya-e1102n:142_1: Sabbaṃ aṭṭhavīsati abbhantaraṃ sampiṇḍetvā catuhatthādhikachappaññāsuttara ekasataṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:142_3: usabhavasena pana vinibbedhena cuddasa abbhantare dvehi ūnāni cattāri usabhāni ca dveratanañca honti.
anya-e1102n:142_4: Sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsatiyā abbhantare caturatanañca soḷasa ayanāni adhikāni satta usabhāni honti.
anya-e1102n:142_5: Parimaṇḍalavasena pana charatanañca cuddasaayanāni ca adhikāni ekādasa usabhāni honti.
anya-e1102n:142_7: Keci pana abbhantarasaddaṃ hattharatanavācakaṃ parikappetvā evaṃ vadanti majjhe ṭhitassa samantā satta
anya-e1102n:142_8: vinibbedhena cuddasā’ti vuttattā puratthimāya satta hatthā dakkhiṇuttarapacchimesupi satta satta hatthāti
anya-e1102n:142_9: katvā evaṃ nibbedhena cuddasa hatthā honti.
anya-e1102n:142_10: Sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsatihatthaṃ abbhantaranti taṃ tesaṃ matimattameva,
anya-e1102n:142_12: Kasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tattha ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ aṭṭhavīsatihattha’nti vuttattā.
anya-e1102n:142_13: Yadi tesaṃ matena sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsatihatthabbhantaraṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:142_14: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tattha abbhantaraṃ nāma aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:142_15: majjhe ṭhitassa samantā sattavinibbedhena cuddasā hontī’ti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:142_18: Tattha ayañhetthattho tattha tatthā’ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ.
anya-e1102n:142_22: Aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇanti paricchinditabbadhammasamudāyaniddeso tattha tesu samantā sattabbhantaresu
anya-e1102n:142_23: ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ nāma aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇaṃ hotīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e1102n:142_26: Tattha parimāṇa saṅkhyā evaṃ veditabbā catasso muṭṭhiyo eko kuḍuvo.
anya-e1102n:142_34: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana nava vāhasahassānīti ettha catasso muṭṭhiyo kuḍuvo,
anya-e1102n:142_41: Tadeva ekaṃ sakaṭanti suttanipātaṭṭhakathādīsu vutta’nti vatvā “idha pana dve sakaṭāni eko vāhoti vadantī”ti
anya-e1102n:142_42: likhitaṃ paccantavohārena minite pana saṭṭhisataṃ eko vāhoti rañño dhammāsokassa sūvakāhatasāliyā minite
