anya-e1102n:173_15: Nadīsamuddantaresupi macchabandhānaṃ agamanapatho dīpako vā pabbato vā,
anya-e1102n:173_17: tasmā ayaṃ sattabbhantarasīmā nimanusse kevalāraññe pathavīmaṇḍalepi devaloke vimānakapparukkhādīsupi labbhateva.
anya-e1102n:173_18: Pathaviyaṃ pana yasmiṃ gāmakhette heṭṭhā pathaviyā yattha vā suvaṇṇamaṇiādīni khaṇitvā gahetuṃ sakkonti,
anya-e1102n:173_20: Tato parā yāva pathavīsandhārakaudakā ajaṭākāsepi labbhateva.
anya-e1102n:173_22: Atha kasmā “araññā”ti kathitāti amanussā vā sattā jātibhinnattā ca te agāmāyeva,
anya-e1102n:173_24: Tiracchānavatthusmimpi “nāgo vā hotu supaṇṇamāṇavakādīnaṃ vā aññataro antamaso sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upādāya
anya-e1102n:173_25: yo koci amanussajātiko sabbova imasmiṃ atthe tiracchānagatoti veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:174_4: Nadiyā vā bhikkhave samudde vā jātassare vā yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepā,
anya-e1102n:174_7: Tattha “sabbā bhikkhave nadī asīmā”ti ettha asīmasadde akāro virahattho,
anya-e1102n:174_13: “asekkhā dhammā”ti yathā sikkhitasikkhā niṭṭhitasikkhāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:174_16: attano sabhāveneva gāmasīmā viya baddhasīmāsadisāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:174_17: Etena nadījātassarasamuddānaṃ baddhasīmāya akhettabhāvo dassito hoti.
anya-e1102n:174_18: Evaṃ “sabbā bhikkhave nadī asīmā”tiādinā nadīsamuddajātassarānaṃ baddhasīmābhāvaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tattha
anya-e1102n:174_19: lokavohārasiddhāsu etāsu nadīādīsu abaddhasīmāsu puna vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ vālikādīhi sīmaparicchindanaṃ
anya-e1102n:174_20: kattukāmo bhagavā “nadiyā vā bhikkhave samudde vā jātassare vā yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepā”ti ādimāha.
anya-e1102n:174_21: Tattha majjhimassa purisassati thāmamajjhimassa purisassa tenevāha samantapākādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “thāmamajjhimena purisenā”ti.
anya-e1102n:174_26: Tividhā hi purisā uttamapuriso majjhimapuriso pakatipurisoti.
anya-e1102n:174_28: so hi bhagavā sabbasattuttamo thāmayasasampattiissariyādīhi tathā hi tathāgatassa thāmo.
anya-e1102n:177_1: Tattha kāḷāvaka nti pakatihatthikulaṃ yaṃ dasannaṃ purisānaṃ kāyabalaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_25: tā bahū nānāvidhā tato uppajjantīti nārayanaṃ, vajiraṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_31: Majjhimapuriso nāma vaḍḍhakipuriso so hi tathāgatassa balaṃ paṭicca sinerupabbatarājaṃ sāsapabījena minanto
anya-e1102n:177_33: antamaso pādaṅguṭṭha so pādaṅguṭṭhakampi gaṇhetuṃ abhabbova.
anya-e1102n:177_34: Tassa pakatipurisato mahantabhāvena majjhe bhavattā majjhimapuriso nāma jāto,
anya-e1102n:177_35: tathā hi sugatavidatthi vaḍḍhakissa tisso vidatthiyo,
anya-e1102n:177_38: pakatipurisahatthena paripuṇṇahattho hoti tathā hi sugatavidatthi nāma idāni majjhimassa purisassa tisso vidatthiyo,
anya-e1102n:177_39: vaḍḍhakihatthena diyaḍḍho hattho hotīti kuṭikārasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_42: Pamāṇayutto mañcoti pakatividatthiyā navavidatthippamāṇo mañcoti vuccati yathā,
anya-e1102n:177_43: evaṃ majjhimapurisenā’ti idha avatvā’thāmamajjhimena purisenā’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā.
anya-e1102n:177_45: taṃ ekassa kāḷāvakassa hatthino bala’nti vuttapuriso pakatipuriso nāma.
anya-e1102n:177_46: Tattha kiñcāpi ekacce puññavantā rājā ajātasattu jīvako komārabhacco itthiyāpi visākhā migāramātāti evamādayo pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārenti,
anya-e1102n:177_47: na pana te majjhimapurisā nāma honti,
anya-e1102n:177_50: Idha pana pakatipurisoyeva thāma majjhimapurisoti adhippeto.
anya-e1102n:177_52: tenevāha mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ līnatthappakāsaniyaṃ udakukkhepāti karaṇatthe nissakkavacananti āha.
anya-e1102n:177_54: Nadīsamuddajātassaresu yaṃṭhānaṃ majjimassa purisassa samantā parisapariyantato udakukkhepena paricchinnaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_55: ayaṃ tattha nadīādīsu lokavohāra siddhāsu tāsueva abaddhasīmāsu aparāpi samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathāti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_56: pana yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepāti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ thāmamajjhimassa purisassa samantato
anya-e1102n:177_59: evaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā hatthena gahetvā majjhimena purisena sabbathāmena khipitabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_60: Yattha evaṃ khittaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikā patati,
anya-e1102n:177_63: ayaṃ tesu nadīādīsu udakukkhepaparicchinnā sīmā samānasaṃvāsāceva ekūposathācā’ti atthayojanaṃ katvā ayaṃ etesaṃ nadīādīnaṃ antoyeva labbhati, na bahi,
anya-e1102n:177_64: tasmā nadiyā vā jātassare vā yattakaṃ padesaṃ pakativassakāle catūsu māsesu udakaṃ ottharati,
anya-e1102n:177_65: samudde yasmiṃ padese pakativīciyo osaritvā saṇṭhahanti,
anya-e1102n:177_67: Dubbuṭṭhikāle vā gimhe vā nadījātassaresu sukkhesupi sāeva kappiyabhūmi.
anya-e1102n:177_68: Sace pana sukkhe jātassare vāpiṃ vā khaṇanti vappaṃ vā karonti,
anya-e1102n:177_73: tasmā tesaṃ antoparisapariyantato paṭṭhāya samantāudakukkhepa paricchedo kātabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_74: Gaṇṭhipade pana yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepāti pana etissā nadiyā catuvaggādīnaṃ saṅghānaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_76: ticīvarena vippavāsaparicchedadassanatthampi sattabbhantarasīmāya paricchedadassanaṃ viyāti ācariyā,
anya-e1102n:177_77: tasmā udakukkhepaparicchedābhāvepi antonadiyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti siddha’nti likhitaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_78: Tattha udakukkhepaparicchedābhāvepī’ti idaṃ padaṃ samantato udakukkhepena paricchinna’nti mahāaṭṭhakathāvacanena
anya-e1102n:177_79: vā samantā udakukkhepaparicchedo kātabbo’ti mātikāṭṭhakathāya kaṅkhā vitaraṇiyañca vuttavacanena vā,
anya-e1102n:177_82: “etadatthameva hi vālikādīhi sīmaparicchindana”nti vā vimativinodanīvacanehi vā na sameti.
anya-e1102n:177_83: Ganthakārenāpi parūpavādavivajjanatthaṃ “ayaṃ amhākaṃ khantī”ti avatvā’acariyā’ti aññakattāre nidassitvā
anya-e1102n:177_84: parato nigamane “idaṃ sabbaṃ suṭṭhu vicāretvā garukule payirupāsitvā gahetabbaṃ yuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_85: itaraṃ chaḍḍetabba”nti vuttaṃ tasmā aññesaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena likhitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_86: Aññathā tissopi saṅgītiyo ārūḷhe aṭṭhakathāvacane ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇī-
anya-e1102n:177_89: bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadampi sāvakānaṃ matena paṭisaṅkharitabbaṃ bhaveyya bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadaṃ pana na makkhetabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_90: yathā paññatteyeva vattitabbaṃ vakkhati hi vatthuṃ jānitvāpi majjaṃ pivato bhikkhussa pācittiyaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_92: na ajānitvāti vuttaṃ tattha kāraṇaṃ maggitabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_93: sikkhāpada paññattiyā buddhānameva visayattā na vā maggitabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_94: yathā paññatteyeva vattitabba’nti tasmā samantā udakukkhepāti paññattasikkhāpadānurūpaṃ samantato udakukkhepena
anya-e1102n:177_95: paricchinnanti vā udakaṃ ukkhipitabbanti vā udakukkhepena pi paricchinnā sīmātivā samantā udakukkhepaparicchedo
anya-e1102n:177_96: kātabboti vā vuttadhammasaṅgāhakattherānaṃ vacanameva pamāṇaṃ te hi buddhamataññuno,
anya-e1102n:177_97: idañca vacanaṃ bhagavato na paccakkhavacanaṃ nāpisaṅgāhakattherānaṃ vacanaṃ athavā “yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa
anya-e1102n:177_99: sattabbhantarasīmāya paricchedadassanaṃ viya sīmaparicchedadassanatthaṃ vutta’nti ācariyā yasmā vadanti,
anya-e1102n:177_100: tasmā udakukkhepaparicchedābhāvepi antonadiyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhanti imissā atthayojanāya na dhammasaṅgāhakattherāpi paviṭṭhā,
anya-e1102n:177_102: Kasmāti ce tissopi saṅgītiyo ārūḷhesu vinayaṭṭhakathāsuceva tabbivaraṇabhūtāsu silokaṭīkāsu ca “udakukkhepena paricchinnaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_104: udakukkhepaparicchedo kātabbo”ti ādinā bahūhi ākārehi udakukkhepaparicchedameva likhanti,
anya-e1102n:177_105: tasmā dhammasaṅgāhakattherāpi appaviṭṭhāti viññāyati ganthakāro pi parūpavādavivajjanatthaṃ “ācariyā”ti aññakattāre nidasseti,
anya-e1102n:177_109: sinerupabbatarājaṃ sāsapabījena minento viya sabbaññubuddhena paññattassa udakukkhepāti sikkhāpadassa
anya-e1102n:177_111: vacanaṃ ko nāma puggalo makkhetuṃ sakkhissati,
anya-e1102n:177_112: upasampadādikammassa ca garukammattā sāsanassa mūlattā ca garukeyeva ṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_113: “Yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepā”ti bhagavatā paññattaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_115: udāhu udakukkhepeneva udakukkhepasīmāti codanaṃ pariharanto aṭṭhakathācariyo kathaṃ pana udakaṃ ukkhipitabbantyādimāha.
anya-e1102n:177_117: kathaṃ kena kāraṇena udakaṃ ukkhipitabbaṃ udakāsiñcanasaṅkhepena ukkhipitabbaṃ atha kho leḍḍukhipanadāruguḷakhipanākārena ukkhipitabbanti attho.
anya-e1102n:177_119: sīho cāleti vāladhi”nti ettha viya dāruguḷaṃ khipanti saddantarasannidhānato atthavasena dāruguḷakīḷakā
anya-e1102n:177_120: dhuttajanāti viññāyati akkhasaddo hi jūtepi nirūḷho.
anya-e1102n:177_121: Dāruguḷanti bhamaṃ āropetvā āraggena katadāruvikati ayañhetthattho…
anya-e1102n:177_122: yathā akkhadhuttā dāruguḷakā dhuttajanā dāruguḷaṃ hatthena gahetvā attano balaṃ dassentā viya sabbathāmena attānaṃ onamitvā khipanti,
anya-e1102n:177_123: evameva thāmamajjhimena purisena udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā hatthena gahetvā attano balaṃ dassentāviya onamitvā
anya-e1102n:177_124: sabbathāmena nisinnassa vā ṭhitassa vā parisapariyantato anupariyāyitvā khipitabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_125: evaṃ cittaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā yattha yasmiṃ ṭhāne patati,
anya-e1102n:177_126: ayameko udakukkhepo nāmāti “ayameko udakukkhepo”ti iminā padena dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ kammakaraṇādhikāre
anya-e1102n:177_128: teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace pana dve saṅghā visuṃvisuṃ uposathādikammaṃ karonti,
anya-e1102n:177_129: dvinnaṃ udakukkhepānaṃ antare añño eko udakukkhepo upacāratthāya ṭhapetabbo”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_130: vimativinodaniyampi “tassa antoti tassa udakukkhepaparicchinnassa ṭhānassa anto na kevalañca tasseva anto,
anya-e1102n:177_131: tato bahipi ekassa udakukkhepassa anto ṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vacanaṃ udakukkhepaparicchedassa dubbijānato kammakopasaṅkā hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_132: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “tassa anto hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhito kammaṃ kopetīti iminā paricchedato bahi
anya-e1102n:177_133: yattha katthaci ṭhito kammaṃ na kopetīti dīpetī”ti vatvā mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanampi paṭikkhipi,
anya-e1102n:177_134: taṃ ekasaṅghaṃ sannipātaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_135: yathā ca mahāsīmāya khaṇḍitvā baddhānaṃ khaṇḍasīmānaṃ aññamaññasaṅkaravivajjanatthaṃ sīmantarikā ṭhapitā,
anya-e1102n:177_136: evameva attano sabhāvena gāmasīmā viya sayaṃ jātasīmāyaṃ nadīsamuddajātassarānaṃ atimahantabhāvena udakukkhepena udakukkhepasīmā bhagavatā anuññātā,
anya-e1102n:177_137: tathāpi dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānamiva aññamaññasaṅkaravivajjanatthaṃ dvinnaṃ udakukkhepasīmānaṃ antare sīmantarikatthāya
anya-e1102n:177_142: teneva vimativinodaniyaṃ “idañcettha sīmantarikāvidhānaṃ dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānaṃ sīmantarikāanujānanasuttānulomato siddhanti daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_143: ekasmiṃ saṅghasannipāte pana ekassa udakukkhepassa bahi tiṭṭhantopi kammaṃ na kopetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ vuttañhi
anya-e1102n:177_144: vimativinodaniyaṃ bhagavatā nidānavasena ekagāmasīmanissitānaṃ ekasabhāgānañca dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānameva
anya-e1102n:177_145: aññamaññaṃ sambhedajjhottharaṇaṃ sīmantarikaṃ vinā abyavadhāne ṭhānañca bhagavatā anumatamevāti ñatvā
anya-e1102n:177_146: aṭṭhakathācariyā idhāpi sīmantarikāvidhānamakaṃsu visabhāgasīmānampi hi ekasīmanissitattaṃ ekasabhāvattañcāti
anya-e1102n:177_147: dvīhaṅgehi samannāgate sati eva sīmantarikaṃ vinā ṭhānaṃ sambhedāya hoti,
anya-e1102n:177_149: Evaṃ nadīsamuddajātassaresu samantāudakukkhepāti paññattasikkhāpadānurūpaṃ udakukkhepena paricchedaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_150: dassetvā rassapabhave nadījātassarapadese udakukkhepena vināva attano sabhāvena gāmasīmāyamiva sabbathā
anya-e1102n:177_151: kappiyabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ sace pana nātidīghā hoti,
anya-e1102n:177_153: Tattha pabhavato paṭṭhāyāti yasmiṃ padese catumāsaparamā nadī sandati,
anya-e1102n:177_155: Yāva mukhadvārā ti yāva nadītīramevettha mukhadvārāti adhippetā.
anya-e1102n:177_156: Sabbatthā’ti sabbasmiṃ nadīpadese udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ natthī ti udakukkhepena pavattā sīmā udakukkhepasīmā.
anya-e1102n:177_161: tena kāyapayogena khipitabbaṃ uddhaṭaṃ kammanti vuccati paramatthavasena pana kāyapayogasaṅkhātāya cittaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_163: Udakukkhepasīmāya kammaṃ udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ taṃ ettha rassapabhavanadiyā natthīti attho.
anya-e1102n:177_164: Ayañhetthattho sace nadī nātidīghā hoti aḍḍhayojanaṃ vā gāvutaṃ vā aḍḍhagāvutaṃ vā,
anya-e1102n:177_165: tassā pavattanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nadītīrā sabbattha nadīpadese ajjhottharitvā saṅgho nisīdati,
anya-e1102n:177_166: tattha tasmiṃ nadīpadese samantato avasesanadiyā abhāvā vaggakammasaṅkābhāvena udakukkhepasīmā kammaṃ natthi,
anya-e1102n:177_167: kevalā nadī sīmāyevāti sāratthadīpaniyampi mātikāṭṭhakathāyalīnatthappakāsaniyampi etadeva sanniṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_168: vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ pana yattha khuddake araññe mahantehi vā bhikkhūhi paripuṇṇatāya vaggakammasaṅkābhāvena
anya-e1102n:177_171: kevalāraññasīmāyeva tattha saṅghena kammaṃ kātabbaṃ nadīādīsupi eseva nayo vakkhati hi sace nadī nātidīghā hoti,
anya-e1102n:177_172: pabhavato paṭṭhāya yāvamukhadvārā sabbattha saṅgho nisīdati,
anya-e1102n:177_173: udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ natthī’ti ādi ca ubhayatthāpi ca.
anya-e1102n:177_174: Yassaṃ disāyaṃ sattabbhantarassa vā udakukkhepassa vā okāso nappahoti,
anya-e1102n:177_175: tattha kathaṃ minanaṃ khipanaṃ vā bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:177_176: gāmakhettādīsu pavisanato akhette sīmā paviṭṭhā nāmātisīmā vipajjeyya,
anya-e1102n:177_182: ettha ca’sīmāpekkhāya sattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmā sayameva paripuṇṇā jāyantī’ti vuttattā udakukkhepaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_183: vināyeva apekkhāya sīmāya udakukkhepasīmā uppajjatī’ti atthaṃ vadanti,
anya-e1102n:177_185: Kasmāti ce pāḷinayavirodhato vimativinodaniyaṃ parato vuttavacanenāpi virodhato ca.
anya-e1102n:177_186: Idañca vacanaṃ ācariyassa kesañci puggalānaṃ vādappakāsanatthaṃ vuttaṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e1102n:177_187: Kasmā parato vuttavacanena aghaṭiyattā ca pāḷiyaṭṭhakathāṭīkāvacanehipi virujjhanato ca,
anya-e1102n:177_189: Yathā ca loke vatiṃ aparikkhipitvā “idaṃ vatiyā ṭhāna”nti ca yathā ca naṅgalakoṭiyā akasitvā “idaṃ kasikaṭṭhāna”nti
anya-e1102n:177_190: ca yathā ca vatthuṃ karontā manussā kudhārīpharasuādinā rukkhe acchinditvā “idaṃ mama kudhāripatanaṭṭhāna”nti
anya-e1102n:177_191: ca yathā ca dāttena alāyitvā “idaṃ mama lāyitaṭṭhāna”nti ca na sakkā vattuṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_192: evameva udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā hatthena akhipitvā “ayameko udakukkhepoti ca,
anya-e1102n:177_194: Ettha ca dve bhikkhū evaṃ vivādaṃ karonti vimativinodaniyaṃ “yattha khuddake araññe mahantehi bhikkhūhi
anya-e1102n:177_197: kevalāraññasīmāyeva tattha saṅghena kammaṃ kattabbaṃ nadī ādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e1102n:177_198: Vakkhati hi sace nadī nātidīghā hoti.
anya-e1102n:177_199: Pabhavato paṭṭhāya yāva mukhadvārā sabbattha saṅgho nisīdati,
anya-e1102n:177_201: iminā eva vacanena vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhāya sati eva udakukkhepasīmā sattabbhantarasīmā uppajjanti,
anya-e1102n:177_202: nāsatīti daṭṭhabba’nti vuttattā udakukkhepaṃ vināva parisapariyantato paṭṭhāya sīmāpekkhāya saheva udakukkhepasīmā
anya-e1102n:177_203: uppajjati tasmā udakukkhepena payojanaṃ natthevāti te evaṃ vattabbā “mā sappurisā evaṃ vadeyyātha ācariyavarañca
anya-e1102n:177_204: mā abbhācikkhatha idañca vacanaṃ ācariyavarassa neyyavacanaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_205: paratopi ācariyavaro sanniṭṭhānaṃ vakkhati vinayaṭṭhakathāsuceva sāratthadīpaniyañca vuttavacanehipi tava vacanaṃ asaṃsandeva,
anya-e1102n:177_209: nassatī”ti ettha sīmāpekkhāya vinā maggagamananhānādi atthehi bhikkhūhi araññe vā nadīādīsupivā paviṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva nuppajjati,
anya-e1102n:177_210: sīmāpekkhāya satieva araññe samantā sattabbhantarā’ti paññattasikkhāpadānurūpaṃ abbhantarasīmā uppajjati’
anya-e1102n:177_211: nadīsamuddajātassaresupi majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhe’pāti paññatta sikkhāpadānurūpaṃ udakukkhepena
anya-e1102n:177_214: Nāsatītiettha udakukkhepena vināti atthopi na labbhate.
anya-e1102n:177_215: Evañca sati vimativinodaniyaṃ yeva puna tatthāti lokavohārasiddhāsu etāsu nadīādīsu tīsu abaddhasīmāsu
anya-e1102n:177_216: punavaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sāsanavohārasiddhāya abaddhasīmāya paricchedaṃ dassentoti adhippāyo.
anya-e1102n:177_217: Pāḷiyaṃ “yaṃ majjhimassa purisassā”ti ādīsu udakaṃ ukkhipitvā khipiyati etthāti udakukkhepo,
anya-e1102n:177_221: “parisa pariyantato paṭṭhāya samantā yāva majjhimassa purisassa udakukkhepo udakapatanaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_223: ayaṃ tattha nadīādīsu aparā samānasaṃvāsā udakukkhepasīmā”ti vuttaatthapadehipi samānaṃ bhaveyya ācariyameva
anya-e1102n:177_224: hi kecipana samantā abbhantaraṃ minitvā paricchedakaraṇeneva sīmā sañjāyati,
anya-e1102n:177_226: taṃ na gahetabbhantyādinā kecivādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā minanakhipane dosaṃ dassetvā ca yaṃ panettha abbhantaraminanappamāṇassa
anya-e1102n:177_230: teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ sīmaṃ vā bandhanti udakukkhepaṃ vā pariccheda’nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_231: evaṃ katepi tassa paricchedassa pabhavato ñātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattena thūlato ñatvā antotiṭṭhantehi nirāsaṅkaṭṭhāne
anya-e1102n:177_232: ṭhātabbaṃ aññaṃ bahikarontehi atidūre nirāsaṅkaṭṭhāne pesetabbanti vā,
anya-e1102n:177_233: tasmā yathā vuttasīmāpekkhavaseneva tāsaṃ sattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmānaṃ uppatti,
anya-e1102n:177_234: tabbigamena vināso ca gahetabboti amhākaṃ khanti,
anya-e1102n:177_236: añño vā pakāro ito yuttataro gavesitabbo’ti āha.
anya-e1102n:177_238: Añño vā pakāro ito yuttataro gavesitabbo’ti iminā ācariyassa vacanena imassa vacanassa attanomatibhāvañca
anya-e1102n:177_243: nāpi aṭṭhakathāya saṃvaṇṇanācariyassa vādappakāsanameva tasmā asallakkhitabbameva sāratthadīpaniyampi
anya-e1102n:177_244: sace nadī nātidīghā hotīti imissā saṃvaṇṇanādhikāre udakukkhepasīmā kammaṃ natthīti yasmā sabbopi nadīpadeso
anya-e1102n:177_246: tasmā samantato nadiyā abhāvā udakukkhepena payojanaṃ natthī’ti vuttaṃ tathā hi samantato nadiyā abhāvā
anya-e1102n:177_247: udakukkhepena payojanaṃ natthī’tiimassa anvayavasena vā atthāpattivasena vā samantato nadiyā bhāve sati
anya-e1102n:177_248: udakukkhepena payojanaṃ attheva vaggakammaparihāratthanti attho labbhate mātikāṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsaniyampi
anya-e1102n:177_249: “samantā udakukkhepaparicchedo kātabboti pahonakaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ yattha pana kunnadiyaṃ nappahoti.
anya-e1102n:177_251: Udakukkhepaparicchedo kātabbo’ti iminā vacanena sīmāpekkhāya saha udakukkhepaṃ vinā attano sabhāveneva nuppajjatīti viññāyati,
anya-e1102n:177_252: tathā hi udakukkhepaparicchedake kattāre asati kathaṃ udakukkhepaparicchedo kātabbo bhaveyya tasmā “vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_254: nāsatī’ti idaṃ vacanaṃ sāratthadīpaniyañca mātikāṭṭhakathāyañca vuttavacanehi aññamaññaviruddhaṃ viya
anya-e1102n:177_255: dissati vimativinodaniyaṃyeva ca “mahoghena pana unnataṭṭhānato ninnaṭṭhāne patantena khato khuddako
anya-e1102n:177_256: vā mahanto vā lakkhaṇayutto jātassarova etthāpi khuddake udakukkhepakiccaṃ natthi samudde pana sabbathā
anya-e1102n:177_258: sodhetuṃ dukkarattā”ti vuttaṃ tathā hi ayamācariyavaro pubbe “vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhāya sati eva udakukkhepasattabbhantarasīmā uppajjanti,
anya-e1102n:177_259: nāsatī”ti vatvā parato kathamācariyavarena “etthāpi khuddake udakukkhepakiccaṃ natthi”tyādivacanamuccate,
anya-e1102n:177_260: tatthāyaṃ viggaho udakaṃ ukkhipitvā khipīyati etthāti udakukkhepo udakassa patanokāso kintuṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_261: ṭhānaṃ karitabbaṃ kiccaṃ kara karaṇeti dhātu riccapaccayo yaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_264: Samudde panā ti ettha pana saddo visesattho,
anya-e1102n:177_265: pakkhantaratthotipi apare visesatthe pana nadījātassaresu mahantesu udakukkhepasīmāyameva kātabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_266: khuddake pana kevale nadījātassarepi kātabbaṃ samudde pana visesato udakukkhepasīmāyameva kātabbanti ayaṃ pana saddassa visesattho.
anya-e1102n:177_272: khuddake nadījātassareyeva na kātabbanti ayaṃ attho sāmatthiyato labbhateva nadījātassaresu khuddakamahantabhāvena
anya-e1102n:177_273: nadījātassaraudakukkhepāti dve dve sīmā labbhanti samudde pana kasmā samuddaudakukkhepavasena dve na
anya-e1102n:177_274: labbhantīti samudde pana kasmā samuddaudakukkhepavasena dve na labbhantīti codanaṃ manasisandhāyāha “sodhetuṃ
anya-e1102n:177_276: Tattha sodhetuṃ dukkarattā ti samuddassa atimahantabhāvena samuddamotiṇṇe bhikkhū hatthapāsanayanaṃ vā
anya-e1102n:177_277: bahisamuddakaraṇaṃ vā kātuṃ atidukkaraṃ tasmā sabbathā sabbena sabbaṃ udakukkhepasīmāyameva kātabbanti
anya-e1102n:177_279: Yadi vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhāya sati eva udakukkhepasīmā uppajjeyya,
anya-e1102n:177_280: evaṃ sati samuddamotiṇṇe bhikkhusamūheva hatthapāsato bahi kareyya,
anya-e1102n:177_281: evañca sati sodhetuṃ dukkarattā’ti hetupadampi niratthakaṃ bhaveyya na panevaṃ sakkā vattuṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_283: Apica tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ adhippāyena “mayaṃ udakukkhepasīmāya na karoma,
anya-e1102n:177_284: kevalaṃ samuddeyeva karomā”ti icchamāne sati kathaṃ karissanti.
anya-e1102n:177_285: Tasmā tesaṃ matena sīmāpekkhāya saheva udakukkhepasīmāya sambhavato gatagataṭṭhāne udakukkhepasīmā bhaveyya
anya-e1102n:177_286: evañca sati “samudde pana sabbathā udakukkhepasīmāyameva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_287: sodhetuṃ dukkarattā”ti vacanampi niratthakaṃ bhaveyya evañca pana vadeyya…
anya-e1102n:177_288: sabbaso samuddasīmāya alabbhamānataṃ sandhāya “samudde panā”tyādivacanaṃ ācariyavarena vuttanti tathāpi
anya-e1102n:177_289: na vattabbaṃ kasmā evañca atthe icchamāne sati “samudde pana sabbattha udakukkhe pasīmāva labbhatī”ti
anya-e1102n:177_291: Athavā pakaraṇādivasena saddatthe vibhajjīyamānepi virujjhateva kathaṃ saṃyogavasena “savacchaṃ dhenumānehī”ti vutte “gāvī”ti viññāyati,
anya-e1102n:177_294: na vaḷavāti ettha viya kadācipi evasaddena nivattetabbassa samuddassa nadiyamiva nātidīghabhāve alabbhamāne
anya-e1102n:177_295: sati “samudde pana sabbathā udakukkhepasīmāyameva kammaṃ kātabba”nti evakārena avattabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e1102n:177_299: Vaḷavā ca nāma yonimaggassa atisambādhattā vijāyituṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e1102n:177_300: gabbhassa pariṇatakāle kucchiṃ phāletvā ājaññapotakaṃ gaṇhanti evaṃ ekagabbheneva maranti tasmā “vaḷavaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_301: savaccha”ntivā avaccha”nti vā vattuṃ nārahati evameva kadācipi nātidīghasamuddassapi anupalabbhamānattā
anya-e1102n:177_302: taṃ nivattāpakena evasaddena “samudde pana sabbathā udakukkhepasīmāyameva kammaṃ kātabba”nti apadisituṃ
anya-e1102n:177_303: nārahatiyeva tasmā udakukkhepena sīmā uppajjatīti niṭṭhametthāva gantabbaṃ tena vuttaṃ “evañca atthe
anya-e1102n:177_304: icchamāne sati samudde pana sabbathā udakukkhepasīmāva labbhatīti vattabbaṃ siyā na panevaṃ vutta”nti
anya-e1102n:177_305: tena ñāyati vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ vālikādīhi khipananti apica vimativinodaniyaṃyeva “gacchantiyā pana
anya-e1102n:177_308: taṃ nāvā sīghameva atikkameti evaṃ sati aññissā sīmāya ñatti,
anya-e1102n:177_309: aññissā anusāvanā hotī”ti imassa saṃvaṇṇanādhikāre tanti sīmaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_310: Sīghameva atikkametīti iminā taṃ anatikkamitvā anto eva parivattamānāya kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
anya-e1102n:177_312: Itarathā “bahiparivattā nukho no vā”ti kammakopasaṅkā bhaveyya.
anya-e1102n:177_313: Aññissā anusāvanāti kevalāya nadīsīmāya anusāvanā’ti ācariyavarena vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_314: Yadisī māpekkhāya saha attano sabhāvena udakukkhepasīmā uppajjeyya,
anya-e1102n:177_315: evaṃ sati nāvāya gatagataṭṭhāne samantato sabhā viya parikhipitvā udakukkhepasīmā uppajjeyya,
anya-e1102n:177_316: uppajjamānepi ca aññissā anusāvanāti ca aparāya udakukkhepasīmāya anusāvanāti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya na panevaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_321: tāva sīmāpekkhāya vinā asambhavato tena ñāyati “vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ udakukkhepaṃ vinā sīmāpekkhāya
anya-e1102n:177_322: saheva attano sabhāvena udakukkhepasīmā nuppajjatī”ti niṭṭhametthāva gantabbaṃ tasmā nāvāya kammaṃ karontehi
anya-e1102n:177_323: thirataraṃ katvā nāvaṃ agamanīyaṃ katvāva kātabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_324: Sāratthadīpaniyampi “gacchantiyā pana nāvāya kātuṃnavaṭṭatīti ettha udakukkhepaṃ anatikkamitvā parivattamānāya kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_326: tāva sīmāpi vaḍḍhati parisapariyantato udakukkhepoyeva pamāṇanti vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā parisavasena
anya-e1102n:177_327: vaḍḍhamānā udakakhipanaṃ vināyeva vaḍḍhati upacārasīmā viya tasmā udakukkhepena payojanaṃ natthevā”ti.  Taṃ nu,
anya-e1102n:177_329: udakukkhepasīmā nāmesā vaḍḍhamānā parisavaseneva vaḍḍhati baddhasīmāyaṃ pana vaḍḍhamānā samūhavasena vaḍḍhati.
anya-e1102n:177_330: Kasmā parisavasena vaḍḍhamānā parisapariyantato udakukkhepo kātabboti.
anya-e1102n:177_331: Apare evaṃ vadanti pubbe udakukkhepoyeva pamāṇaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_333: kathinatthatasāṭakadānakammavācāviya tathā hi kathinatthatasāṭakadānakāle vuttakammavācā ekāyevavaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n:177_334: atthateyeva kathine puna varasāṭakaṃ labhitvā kammavācāya dānakiccaṃ natthi evameva etthāpi pubbe udakukkhepoyeva pamāṇaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_335: puna udakukkhepakiccaṃ natthīti te upacārasīmāyamiva maññitvā vadanti upacārasīmāyañhi purisāya nisinnaṭṭhānameva
anya-e1102n:177_336: upacārasīmābhāvena vaḍḍhati idha pana parisapariyantato udakukkhepappamāṇena vaḍḍhatiyeva na udakukkhepaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_337: vināva ijjhate “kathaṃ pana udakaṃ ukkhipitabbaṃ yathā akkhadhuttā dāruguḷaṃ khipanti,
anya-e1102n:177_338: evaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā hatthena gahetvā thāmamajjhimena purisena sabbathāmena khipitabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_339: yattha evaṃ khittaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā patati,
anya-e1102n:177_344: te “atthi bhikkhave niraye nirayapālā”ti devadūtasuttaṃ bhindanti viyāti.
anya-e1102n:177_345: Evañcapana vadeyya ye udakukkhepena saha ijjhanti,
anya-e1102n:177_347: tassa ṭhitokāsassa bāhirantato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhāya uppannāya tāya
anya-e1102n:177_348: saha sayameva sañjātā sattabbhantarasīmā samānasaṃvāsakāti adhippāyo.
anya-e1102n:177_349: Yattha pana khuddake araññe mahantehi vā bhikkhūhi paripuṇṇatāya vaggakammasaṅkābhāvena sattabbhantarasīmāpekkhā natthi,
anya-e1102n:177_351: kevalāraññasīmāyameva tattha saṅghena kammaṃ kātabbaṃ nadīādīsupi esevanayo”ti vimati vinodaniyaṃ vuttavacanaṃ bhindanti nāmāti. Taṃ na,
anya-e1102n:177_352: tena no kā hāni evampi amhākaṃ vāde koci virodho na vijjateva.
anya-e1102n:177_354: ime dve saddaracanāpi asambandhāva bhinnalakkhaṇā bhinnavisayā cetā sīmā.
anya-e1102n:177_356: Yathā araññe tattha sattabbhantarasīmā na uppajjati,
anya-e1102n:177_359: udakukkhepasīmā nuppajjatī”ti avatvā “udakukkhepasīmā kammaṃ natthī”ti kriyāparāmasanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_364: nāsatī”ti ettha “nāsatī”ti imassa udakukkhepena vināpīti atthopi yujjateva.
anya-e1102n:177_365: Kasmāti ce “sīmāpekkhāya satievā”ti iminā anulomanayavasena “sīmāpekkhāya asati nuppajjatī”ti attho yujjateva.
anya-e1102n:177_366: Kecipana “samantā abbhantaraṃ minitvā paricchedakaraṇeneva sīmā sañjāyati,
anya-e1102n:177_367: na sayamevā”ti vadanti taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_370: evaṃ udakukkhepasīmāyapi nadīādīsupi tatthāpi hi majjhimapuriso na ñāyati,
anya-e1102n:177_371: tathā sabbathāmena khipananti imināpi vacanena ācariyavarassa udakukkhepena saheva sīmāpekkhāya sati udakukkhepasīmā uppajjati,
anya-e1102n:177_375: na pana samānalakkhaṇā tathā hi “asammatāya bhikkhave sīmāya aṭṭhapitāya yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati,
anya-e1102n:177_378: ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā”ti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade khuddako vā mahanto vā sabbopi gāmapadeso gāmasīmāti anuññātā,
anya-e1102n:177_379: na sattabbhantarasīmāya viya samantā leḍḍupātukkhepena anuññātā abbhantarasīmāyapi agāmake ce araññe yaṃ nissāya viharati,
anya-e1102n:177_380: tassa araññassa araññasīmāti nānuññātā tathā nadīsamuddajātassaresupi gāmasīmāyamiva sabbo nadīsamuddajātassarapadeso
anya-e1102n:177_381: nadīsamuddajātassa rasīmāti evameva na anuññātā tathā abbhantarasīmāyamiva samantā sattabbhantarāti vā
anya-e1102n:177_383: tasmā bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadānusāreneva gāmasīmāyapi khuddako vā mahanto vā sabbo gāmapadeso gāmasīmāva hoti,
anya-e1102n:177_385: sīmāpekkhāya saha sayameva uppajjatī”ti minanāminanavicāraṇā pana niratthakāva tathā udakukkhepasīmāyapi
anya-e1102n:177_386: “majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepā”ti paññattasikkhāpadānurūpaṃ udakukkhepena saheva uppajjatīti
anya-e1102n:177_390: evampi etā gāmasīmasattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmā bhinnavisayāva tasmā “nadīādīsu eseva nayo”ti vuttepi
anya-e1102n:177_391: sattabbhantarasīmā apekkhāya saheva attano sabhāveneva sattabbhantarasīmā uppajjati yathā.
anya-e1102n:177_392: Evameva udakukkhepasīmāyapi apekkhāya saha udakukkhepaṃ katvāva vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ udakukkhepasīmā uppajjati,
anya-e1102n:177_394: Nanu ca mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ paricchedabbhantare hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitopi,
anya-e1102n:177_395: paricchedā bahi aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopeti,
anya-e1102n:177_396: idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sinniṭṭhāna’nti vuttavacane navirujjhatīti ce. Taṃ na,
anya-e1102n:177_397: mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace pana dvesaṅghā visuṃvisuṃ uposathādikammaṃ karonti,
anya-e1102n:177_398: dvinnaṃ udakukkhepānaṃ antare añño eko udakukkhepo upacāratthāya ṭhapetabbo”ti dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ kammakaraṇādhikāre vuttattā.
anya-e1102n:177_399: Sāratthadīpaniyampi “tattha aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopetīti idaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ,
anya-e1102n:177_401: Yadi cetaṃ dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ uposathādikammakaraṇādhikāre vuttattā udakukkhepato bahi aññaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_403: Ṭhito saṅgho sīmāsambhedasambhavato kammaṃ kopetīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e1102n:177_405: teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ līnatthappakāsaniyaṃ aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedanti dutiyaṃ udakukkhepaṃ anatikkamantopi kopeti. Kasmā,
anya-e1102n:177_406: attano udakukkhepasīmāya paresaṃ udakukkhepasīmāya ajjhotthatattā sīmāsambhedo hoti,
anya-e1102n:177_407: tasmā kopetī’ti “idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhāna”nti ca iminā adhippāyena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_408: Sabbāsupi aṭṭhakathāsu sīmāsambhedassa anicchitattā teneva attano ca aññesañca udakukkhepaparicchedassa
anya-e1102n:177_409: antarā añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikatthāya ṭhapetabboti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_412: Tassa “antohatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhito kammaṃ kopetī”ti iminā paricchedato bahi yatthakatthaci ṭhito
anya-e1102n:177_413: kammaṃ na kopetīti dīpetīti sāratthadīpanīvacanenāpi ekasmiṃ saṅghasannipāte paricchedato bahi aññaṃ
anya-e1102n:177_414: tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ na kopetīti veditabbametaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃyeva
anya-e1102n:177_415: imamatthaṃ daḷhikaraṇavasena udakukkhepappamāṇā sīmantarikā suviññeyyatarā hoti,
anya-e1102n:177_416: sīmāsambhedasaṅkā ca na siyāti sāmicidassanatthaṃ añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikatthāya ṭhapetabbo’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:177_421: Khuddakaṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti idampi udakukkhepasīmāya parisavasena vaḍḍhanato sīmasambhedasaṅkā siyā.
anya-e1102n:181_0: Janapadasīmā nāma ekassa rañño vijite pavatto mahāmaccānaṃ nivāsabhūto ekameko padeso janapadasīmā nāma.
anya-e1102n:182_17: Ime soḷasamahājanapadā majjhimapadeseyeva pavattā mahāraṭṭhā nāma tadaññepi sunāparantaraṭṭhādikā bahutarāva.
anya-e1102n:182_18: Tathā paccantavisayepi rāmaññādikā anekappabhedā mahāraṭṭhā attheva tepi sabbe raṭṭhasīmā nāma.
anya-e1102n:182_19: Lokiyasatthesu pana yasmiṃ padese khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddavasena catuvaṇṇāni vasanti,
anya-e1102n:184_0: So milakkhudeso vutto, puññabhūmi tato para”nti.
anya-e1102n:185_0: Rajjasīmā nāma ekassa rañño āṇāpavattaṭṭhānaṃ rajjasīmā nāma.
anya-e1102n:186_0: Dīpasīmā nāma samuddantare vā nadimajjhe vā pavattā dīpā dīpasīmā nāma.
anya-e1102n:186_3: vakkhati hi sukkhe jātassare vāpiṃ vā khaṇanti vappaṃ vā karonti,
anya-e1102n:187_0: Cakkavāḷasīmā nāma “āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanānaṃ dvādasasatasahassāni tīṇisahassāni cattārisatāni paññāsañcayojanāni.
anya-e1102n:191_2: Tattha iddhimā puggalo yasmiṃ yasmiṃ vā sīme uposathādisaṅghakammaṃ karoti,
anya-e1102n:191_3: tattha tattha gate bhikkhū hatthapāsanayanaṃ vā bahisīmakaraṇaṃ vā kātuṃ chandārahānaṃ,
anya-e1102n:191_5: Evamasakkonte aniddhimapuggale sandhāya atimahantāraññe samantā sattabbhantarasīmā anuññātā.
anya-e1102n:191_6: Tattha sīmāpekkhāya saha samantā sattabbhantarasīmā attano sabhāveneva jātā tathā nadīsamuddajātassaresupi
anya-e1102n:191_7: majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepasīmā anuññātā tatthapi vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhaṃ katvā
anya-e1102n:191_8: udakukkhepena saha udakukkhepasīmā uppajjati tathā gāmanigamajanapadanagararaṭṭharajjasīmāsupi vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ
anya-e1102n:191_10: Tato paresu pana gāmasīmasattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmā nuññātasuttānulomanayasāmatthiyato khuddakesu
anya-e1102n:191_11: gāmanigamajanapadanagaresu tattha tattha gate bhikkhū sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa
anya-e1102n:191_12: saṅghassa anumatiyāva uposathādisaṅghakammaṃ kātabbameva tathā khuddake araññepi nadījātassarepi yathāsukhaṃ
anya-e1102n:192_17: cakkavāḷasīmātiekūnavīsappabhede pi sīme vipattilakkhaṇaṃ pahāya sampattilakkhaṇappakāsakaṃ sīmavisodhanīnāma pakaraṇaṃ samattaṃ.
anya-e1102n:202_0: Imesaṃ gāthāpadānaṃ attho sabbaso saṃvaṇṇito hoti.
anya-e1102n:204_0: Parisasampattināma ekavīsativajjanīyapuggale vajjetvā etarahi ñatticatutthakammena upasampannā bhikkhū paccantimesu janapadesu pañcavaggato paṭṭhāya,
anya-e1102n:204_1: majjhimesu janapadesu dasavaggato paṭṭhāya sabbe hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā nisinnā honti,
anya-e1102n:204_3: Tattha ekavīsati vajjanīyā nāma “na bhikkhave saga ṭṭhāya parisāyā”ti vacanato heṭṭhā “na bhikkhave bhikkhuniyā
anya-e1102n:204_4: nisinnaparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”nti ādinānayena vuttā bhikkhunī,
anya-e1102n:204_21: Yadi te hatthapāse vā sīmeyeva vā honti,
anya-e1102n:204_22: te avajjetvā pañcavaggādiko pakatattagaṇo hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā nisinno hoti,
anya-e1102n:204_25: Aparepana evaṃ vadanti antimavatthuajjhāpannassa avandanīyesu avuttattā,
anya-e1102n:204_26: tena saddhiṃ sayantassa sahaseyyāpattiyā abhāvato tassa ca paṭiggahaṇassa rūhanatoti tadeva yuttataranti viññāyati,
anya-e1102n:204_30: tadā na vanditabboti ayamettha viseso veditabbo.
anya-e1102n:204_33: Bhikkhubhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto hi anupasampannapakkhaṃ bhajatīti majjhimagaṇṭhipade sāratthadīpaniyañca
anya-e1102n:204_34: vuttattā antimavatthu ajjhāpannapubbo bhikkhu attano kāraṇaṃ ajānitvāva tena saha pañcavaggagaṇo uposathādisaṅghakammaṃ karoti,
anya-e1102n:204_38: Kasmā sahaseyyāpatti abhāvopi tassa bhikkhusaññāya patiṭṭhitattā,
anya-e1102n:204_39: paṭiggahaṇaruhaṇassa ca tasmiṃ puggale bhikkhūti saddahitattā tena puggalena sahaseyyāpattipi natthi,
anya-e1102n:204_41: ekavīsativajjanīyapuggalepi tathāvidhassa avicārikattā tena saha pañcavaggagaṇo uposathādisaṅghakammaṃ karonto kārakasaṅgho asañcicca anupavajjo.
anya-e1102n:206_0: Evaṃ vatthuñattianusāvanasīmaparisasampattivasena pañcahi aṅgehi sampannoti pañcaṅgoti vā samaggena saṅghena
anya-e1102n:206_1: ñatticatutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena uparibhāvaṃ samāpannoti vā dvīhi kāraṇehi laddhanāmo ñatti
anya-e1102n:207_1: tato pabbajjā ca upasampadā cā ti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ atto vuttoyeva hoti.
anya-e1102n:213_0: Saṅgho ca dullabho loke, sappurisāti dullabhā”ti.
anya-e1102n:214_1: Tattha imasmiṃ sattaloke okāsaloke vā sabbaññusammāsambuddho dullabhova tathā hesa loko saṅkhāraloko,
anya-e1102n:214_3: okāsalokoti tippabhedo hoti tesaṃ sampattivipatti ca evaṃ veditabbā tattha lujjati palujjatīti lokoti vacanatthena sattaloko veditabbo.
anya-e1102n:214_4: Lokiyanti patiṭṭhahanti ettha sattanikāyāti vacanatthena okāsaloko veditabbo.
anya-e1102n:214_5: Tathā hesa sattā avakasanti etthātiokāsoti vuccati so bhūmivasena apāyabhūmi,
anya-e1102n:214_17: paranimmitavasavattī ceti sattavidhā hoti kāmasugatibhūmi sāpanāyaṃ ekādasavidhāpi kāmataṇhā avacarati etthāti vacanatthena kāmāvacarabhūmi nāma.
anya-e1102n:214_20: mahābrahmā ca paṭhamajjhānabhūmi idaṃ agginā pariggahitaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e1102n:214_23: ābhassarā ca dutiyajjhānabhūmi idaṃ āpena pariggahitaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e1102n:214_26: subhakiṇhā ca tatiyajjhānabhūmi idaṃ vātena pariggahitaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e1102n:214_30: suddhāvāsā ca catutthajjhānabhūmiceti rūpāvacarabhūmi soḷasavidhā hoti. Avihā, atappā, sudassā, sudassī,
anya-e1102n:214_36: Ettāvatā ekatiṃsappabhedāpi bhūmi avakasanti ettha sattanikāyāti vacanatthena okāsoti vuccati.
anya-e1102n:214_38: Tiracchānaṃ pettivisayo asurakāyoti imesaṃ visuṃ bhūmi nāma natthi,
anya-e1102n:214_39: manussabhūmiyaṃyeva yattha katthaci araññavanapatthādīsu nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanti soyeva padeso tesaṃ bhūmi.
anya-e1102n:214_40: Manussabhūmito dvitālīsasahassayojano yugandharappamāṇo sineruno pañcamāḷindho cātumahārājikabhūmi.
anya-e1102n:214_43: Iminā nayena yāva vasavattibhūmi dvitālīsasahassayojane tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n:214_44: tasmā manussabhūmito yāva vasavattibhūmi dvesahassānipañcana hutāni duvesatasahassāni yojanāni honti,
anya-e1102n:218_0: Gaṇanā nāma bhūmīsu, saṅkhyā evaṃ pakāsitā”ti.
anya-e1102n:219_0: Tatupari brahmapārisajjādayo tayo brahmuno pañcapaññāsasatasahassa aṭṭhasahassayojane samatale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n:219_2: Catutthabhūmiyaṃ pana vehapphalaasaññasattā tappamāṇe samatale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n:219_3: Tatuparisuddhāvāsabhūmiyo taṃtaṃ pamāṇe ṭhāne uparūpari tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n:219_4: Catassopi arūpabhūmiyo tappamāṇe ṭhāne uparūpari tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n:219_5: Ettāvatā ca manussabhūmito yāva bhavaggā yojanānaṃ sattakoṭi ca aṭṭhārasalakkhā ca pañcanahutāni ca chasahassāni ca honti tenetaṃ vuccati porāṇehi.
anya-e1102n:234_0: Esā ca vicāraṇā ṭīkā cariyamatena katā;
anya-e1102n:237_0: Tāva sahassadhā loke, ettha te vattatī vaso”ti.
anya-e1102n:238_2: tesaṃ vitthāro apubbaṃ katvā kathetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā na vakkhāma imasmiṃ sattaloke okāsaloke ca sabbaññusammāsambuddhova dullabho,
anya-e1102n:238_7: Tattha bahussutaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasaṃsantena ca na so tumhākaṃ sāvako nāma,
anya-e1102n:238_8: buddhonāmesa cundāti bahussutassa bhikkhuno buddhabhāvaṃ anujānantena ca.
anya-e1102n:239_0: Dhammakāyo yato satthā, dhammo satthukāyo mato;
anya-e1102n:241_0: Vutte puthujjanopi upacāravasena vācanāmaggassa bodhattā anubuddho nāma.
anya-e1102n:241_1: Ariyasāvako pana parato yosavasena cattāri saccāni bujjhati bujjhanamattameva vāti vacanatthena bujjhanasabhāvattā sāvakabuddho nāma.
anya-e1102n:241_2: Yo pana khaggavisāṇakappo sayambhūñāṇena anaññabodhako hutvā sāmaṃ bujjhanatthena paccekabujjhattā paccekabuddho nāma.
anya-e1102n:241_4: Yo pana saṅkhatāsaṅkhatappabhedaṃ sakalampi dhammajātaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhavasena sammā pakārena
anya-e1102n:241_5: sayaṃ pacitupāramitāsayambhūtena sayambhūñāṇena sayameva anaññabodhito hutvā savāsanasammohaniddāya accantaṃ
anya-e1102n:241_6: vigato dinakarakiraṇasamāgamena paramarucirasirīsobhaggappattiyā vikasitamiva padumaṃ aggamaggañāṇasamāgamena
anya-e1102n:241_7: aparimitaguṇagaṇālaṅkatasabbaññutaññāṇappattiyā sabbadhamme bujjhi abujjhi aññāsīti sammāsambuddho, bhagavā,
anya-e1102n:241_8: sova loke dullabho paccekasambuddhānampi hi ekasmiṃ kāle satasahassādivasena ekato pavattattā te dullabhāpi
anya-e1102n:241_9: anacchariyajātattā paresaṃ maggaphalādhigamāya upanissayarahitattā ca sammāsambuddhova loke dullabho,
anya-e1102n:242_0: Kathaṃ lokassa vipatti veditabbā tathā hesa loko vinassamāno tejenapi āpenapi vāyunāpi vinassati.
anya-e1102n:242_1: Tassa vitthāro visuddhimaggādīsu vuccamānopi kesañci puggalānaṃ matena micchāgāhattā brahmūnaṃ āyunā minitepi asamānaṃ saṃvaṭṭasīmāpi viruddhā,
anya-e1102n:242_2: tasmā tesaṃ vādaṃ apanetvā ganthato samānetvā vakkhāma.
anya-e1102n:242_23: subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā yāva dutiyajjhānabhūmi udakena vilīyati.
anya-e1102n:242_25: vehapphalato heṭṭhā yāva tatiyajjhānabhūmi vātena saṃvaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n:242_26: Vitthārato pana jātikhetta āṇākhettavisayakhettavasena tiṇṇaṃ buddhakhettānaṃ āṇākhettaṃ vinassati.
anya-e1102n:242_31: Yattha ratanasuttaṃ khandhaparittaṃ dhajaggaparittaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ moraparittanti imesaṃ parittānaṃ ānubhāvo pavattati.
anya-e1102n:242_33: Tattha jātikhettaāṇākhettāvasena dve khettāni ekato vinassanti.
anya-e1102n:242_35: Tassa vināsoca saṇṭhahantañca evaṃ veditabbaṃ yasmiṃ samaye kappo agginā nassati,
anya-e1102n:242_36: tadā ādito kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ ekameghavassaṃ vasi,
anya-e1102n:242_38: sassesu gokhāyitamattesu jātesu gadrabharavaṃ viravanto ekabindupi na patati.
anya-e1102n:242_39: Yadā pacchinnameva hoti tadā vassūpajīvino sattā kālaṃ katvā parittābhesu brahmabhūmīsu uppajjanti puññaphalūpajīvinopi
anya-e1102n:242_41: evaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena tattha tattha udakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati,
anya-e1102n:242_42: macchakacchapādi udakanissitā pāṇā kālaṃ katvā manussadevalokesu nibbattitvā jhānaṃ uppādetvā brahmaloke nibbattanti.
anya-e1102n:242_45: tadā hi lokabyūhā nāma kāmāvacaradevā ukkhittasirā vikiṇṇakesā rudamukhā assūni hatthehi muñcamānā rattavatthanivatthā
anya-e1102n:242_46: ativiya virūpavesadhārino hutvā manussapathe vicarantā evaṃ ārocenti “mārisā bho ito vassasata sahassaccayena
anya-e1102n:242_47: kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati ayaṃ loko vinassissati mahāsamuddopisussissati ayañca mahāpathavī sinerupabbatarājā
anya-e1102n:242_48: ḍayhissati vinassissati yāvabrahmalokā vināso bhavissati mettaṃ mārisā bhāvetha. Karuṇaṃ, muditaṃ,
anya-e1102n:242_52: Tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññāni karitvā devaloke nibbattanti.
anya-e1102n:242_53: Tattha sudhābhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā vāyo parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ paṭilabhanti,
anya-e1102n:242_55: Ye pana niyatamicchādiṭṭhikā tesaṃ kammassa aparikkhayā aññacakkavāḷesu attano kammānurūpaṃ vipākamanubhonti.
anya-e1102n:242_56: Teneva ahosikamme micchādiṭṭhivasena akattabbaṃ nāma pāpaṃ natthi,
anya-e1102n:242_57: yato saṃsārakhāṇubhāvova nāma hotīti āha “diṭṭhi paramāni bhikkhave vajjānī”ti.
anya-e1102n:242_59: “Aparāpariyakammavasena yato micchādiṭṭhisamādānato sappurisūpanissayavasena virājetvā bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhaveyyāti amhākaṃ khanti.
anya-e1102n:242_60: Evaṃ devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena sabbepi brahmaloke nibbattanti.
anya-e1102n:242_61: Vassupacchedato pana uddhaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati.
anya-e1102n:243_0: Pakatisūriye sūriyadevaputto atthi kappavināsakasūriye pana natthi.
anya-e1102n:243_2: Kappavināsakasūriyobhāsena vigatadhūmavalāhakaṃ ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya nimmalaṃ hoti nabhaṃ ṭhapetvā gaṅgā, yamunā, sarabhū,
anya-e1102n:243_4: imā pañca mahānadiyo ṭhapetvā avasesapañcasatakunnadīādīsu udakaṃ sussati tato dīghassa addhuno accayena
anya-e1102n:243_5: tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati tasmiṃ pātubhūte pañca mahānadiyopi sussanti.
anya-e1102n:243_6: Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati.
anya-e1102n:243_7: Yassa pātubhāvā himavatī mahānadīnaṃ pabhavā sīhapatano,
anya-e1102n:243_15: Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati,
anya-e1102n:243_16: yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahāsamuddo aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na saṇṭhāti.
anya-e1102n:243_17: Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho sūriyo pātubhavati,
anya-e1102n:243_20: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo sūriyo pātubhavati,
anya-e1102n:243_21: yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ekajālaṃ hoti saddhiṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷehi yojanasatikādibhedā
anya-e1102n:243_24: tattha kanakavimānaratanavimānāni jhāpetvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gaṇhāti etenūpāyena yāva paṭhamajjhānabhūmi gaṇhāti.
anya-e1102n:243_25: Tattha tayopi brahmaloke jhāpetvā ābhassare āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:243_28: Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā pana sappitelajhāpanaaggisikhā viya chārikampi anavasesetvā nibbāyi.
anya-e1102n:243_29: Heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko hoti mahandhakāro.
anya-e1102n:243_30: Evaṃ kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāvajālaparicchedā saṃvaṭṭo nāma ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:243_31: Atha dīghassa addhuno accayena mahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhamaṃ sukhumaṃ vassati.
anya-e1102n:243_32: Anupubbena kumudanāḷayaṭṭhimusalatālakkhandhādippamāṇāhi dhārāhi vassanto koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu sabbaḍaḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā antaradhāyati.
anya-e1102n:243_33: Taṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vāto samuṭṭhahitvā ghanaṃ karoti.
anya-e1102n:243_38: Kathaṃ tāva mahantaṃ udakarāsiṃ vāto ghanaṃ karotīti ce.
anya-e1102n:243_39: Vivarasampadānato taṃ vā tena piṇḍiyamānaṃ ghanaṃ kariyamānaṃ parikkhayamānaṃ anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati.
anya-e1102n:243_40: Otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake pubbe brahmalokaṭṭhāne brahmapāri sajja-
anya-e1102n:243_42: Tato otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake catukāmāvacaradevalokaṭṭhāne anukkamena paranimmitavasavattī,
anya-e1102n:243_45: Tato purimapathaviṭṭhānaṃ otiṇṇe pana udake balavavātā uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n:243_46: Te taṃ pidahitadvāre dhamakaraṇe ṭhitaudakamiva nirussāsaṃ katvā nirujjhanti.
anya-e1102n:243_47: Madhurodakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchamānaṃ upari rasapathaviṃ samuṭṭhāpeti sā vaṇṇasampannāceva hoti gandharasasampannā ca,
anya-e1102n:243_48: nirudakapāyāsassa upari paṭalaṃ viya tadā ca ābhassarabrahmaloke paṭhamatarābhinibbattā sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vā tato cavitvā idhūpapajjanti.
anya-e1102n:243_49: “Puññakkhayā vā”ti iminā brahmūnaṃ āyuparicchedaṃ appatvāva kammakkhayena maraṇaṃ viññāyati.
anya-e1102n:243_51: Te aggaññasutte vuttanayena taṃ rasapathaviṃ sāyitvā taṇhābhibhūtā āluppakāraṃ paribhuñjituṃ upakkamanti.
anya-e1102n:243_53: andhakāro hoti te andhakāraṃ disvā bhāyanti.
anya-e1102n:243_54: Tato nesaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayantaṃ paripuṇṇapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ vā pātubhavati.
anya-e1102n:243_55: Te taṃ disvā “ālokaṃ paṭilabhimhā”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayanto uṭṭhito,
anya-e1102n:243_56: tasmā sūriyo hotū”ti sūriyo tvevassa nāmaṃ karonti.
anya-e1102n:243_57: Atha sūriye divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgate “yampi ālokaṃ labhimhā,
anya-e1102n:243_58: sopi no naṭṭho”ti puna bhītā honti.
anya-e1102n:243_59: Tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “sādhuvatassa aññaṃ ālokaṃ labheyyāmā”ti.
anya-e1102n:243_60: Tesaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā viya ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ pātubhavati.
anya-e1102n:243_61: Te taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā viya uṭṭhito,
anya-e1102n:243_62: tasmā cando hotū”ti candotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti.
anya-e1102n:243_66: te ca kho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva pātubhavanti.
anya-e1102n:243_67: Kathaṃ yathānāma kaṅgubhatte paccamāne ekappahāreneva bubbuḷakāni uṭṭhahanti.
anya-e1102n:243_70: eke samasamā evameva thūpathūpaṭṭhāne pabbatā honti,
anya-e1102n:243_72: samasamaṭṭhāne dīpāti evaṃ manussaloke saṇṭhite cātumahārājikā,
anya-e1102n:243_77: Atha tesaṃ sattānaṃ rasapathaviṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ kammena ekacce vaṇṇavanto,
anya-e1102n:243_78: ekacce dubbaṇṇā honti tattha vaṇṇavanto dubbaṇṇe atimaññanti.
anya-e1102n:243_80: Bhūmipappaṭako pātubhavati atha nesaṃ teneva nayena sopi antaradhāyati,
anya-e1102n:243_83: Akaṭṭhapāko sāli pātubhavati akaṇo athuso suddho sugandho taṇḍulapphalo.
anya-e1102n:243_84: Tato nesaṃ bhājanāni uppajjanti te sālī bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyā ṭhapenti,
anya-e1102n:243_87: na tassa sūpena vā byañjanena vā karaṇīyaṃ atthi.
anya-e1102n:243_90: Tesaṃ taṃ oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharataṃ tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ sañjāyati.
anya-e1102n:243_91: Atha nesaṃ tassa nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni pabhijjanti.
anya-e1102n:243_98: Te asaddhammapaṭisevanapaccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā tassa asaddhammassa paṭicchādanahetu agārāni karonti.
anya-e1102n:244_0: Te agāraṃ ajjhāvasamānā anukkamena aññatarassa alasajātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantā sannidhiṃ karonti.
anya-e1102n:244_1: Tato pabhuti kaṇopi thusopi taṇḍulaṃ pariyonaddhanti,
anya-e1102n:244_3: Te sannipatitvā anuṭṭhunanti “pāpakā vata bho dhammā sattesu pātubhūtā,
anya-e1102n:244_7: Athaññataro satto aññassa bhāgaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyati.
anya-e1102n:244_8: Taṃ dvikkhattuṃ paribhāsitvā tatiyavāre leḍḍudaṇḍehi paharanti.

anya-e1102n:244_15: Evaṃ katasanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmiṃ tāva kappe ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tena samayena
anya-e1102n:244_16: tesu sattesu abhirūpataro ca dassanīyataro ca mahesakkhataro ca buddhisampanno paṭibalo niggahapaggahaṃ
anya-e1102n:244_17: kātuṃ te taṃ upasaṅkamitvā yācitvā sammaniṃsu.
anya-e1102n:244_22: Yañhi loke acchariyaṃ ṭhānaṃ bodhisattova tattha ādi purisoti evaṃ bodhisattaṃ ādiṃ katvā khattiyamaṇḍale
anya-e1102n:244_24: Evaṃ candimasūriyapātu bhāvato yāva puna kappavināsakamahāmegho,
anya-e1102n:244_26: Tenetaṃ vuccati megho jālaparicchinno saṃvaṭṭoti jālā meghaparicchinno saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati.
anya-e1102n:244_31: Tathā hi imasmiṃyeva vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyiasaṅkhyayyakappe buddhapacceka buddhasāvakacakkavattino uppajjanti,
anya-e1102n:244_35: Tattha buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakacakkavattīhi puññavantapuggalehi asuññattā asuññakappo nāma.
anya-e1102n:244_42: tesu yasmiṃ kappe ekova buddho uppajjati,
anya-e1102n:244_52: Imāni pañcakappāniyeva saheva samodhānetvā jātattakīsotattakiyā nidāne.
anya-e1102n:273_0: Te sabbepi sammāsambuddhe yāva arimetteyyā samodhānetvā
anya-e1102n:279_0: Namassanagāthā pavattā sā ūnasaṅkhyāvaseneva katāva bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:279_1: tathā hi amhākaṃ bhagavā porāṇabrahmadevabuddhaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva porāṇasakyagotamā manasāva cintentassa
anya-e1102n:279_2: sattaasaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni porāṇasakyagotamabuddhaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva majjhimadīpaṅkarā vācāmattena
anya-e1102n:279_4: Majjhimadīpaṅkarato paṭṭhāya yāva padumuttarabuddhā kāyaṅgavācaṅgavasena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni.
anya-e1102n:279_6: Evamimesu vīsatiasaṅkhyeyyesu brahmadevaporāṇasakyagotamabuddhānamantare satta asaṅkhyeyye sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā
anya-e1102n:279_7: ekasatasahassañca vīsati sahassañca pañcasahassāni ca honti.
anya-e1102n:279_8: Porāṇasakyagotamamajjhimadīpaṅkarānamantare nava asaṅkhyeyye sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā tīṇisatasahassāni sattāsītisahassāni ca honti.
anya-e1102n:279_9: Majjhimadīpaṅkarato yāva metteyyā aṭṭhavīsāti sabbaṃ samodhānetvā aṭṭhavīsañca dvādasasahassañca pañcasatasahassāni
anya-e1102n:282_3: anuppannakappe pana suññakappotveva nāmaṃ labbhati tathā hi kappasaṇṭhahanakāle sabbapaṭhamaṃ mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhāneyeva paduminigabbhā uppajjati.
anya-e1102n:282_4: Sā yasmiṃ kāle eko buddho uppajjissati,
anya-e1102n:282_6: Taṃ disvā suddhāvāsabrahmuno nemittapāṭhakā arahanto imasmiṃ kappe eko buddho uppajjissatīti sañjātapītisomanassā
anya-e1102n:282_7: hutvā aṭṭhaparikkhāre gahetvā brahmaloke ṭhapenti “yadā buddho uppajjissati,
anya-e1102n:282_9: Evaṃ dve tayo cattāro pañca buddhā uppajjissanti,
anya-e1102n:282_10: tadā dve tīṇi cattāri pañca paduminigabbhā aṭṭhaparikkhārehi saha uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n:282_11: Tañca kho ekasmiṃ yeva nāḷekeka baddhā hutvā uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n:282_12: Evaṃ kappasaṇṭhahanakālato paṭṭhāyeva imāni pañca nāmāni labbhantīti veditabbāni.
anya-e1102n:282_13: Ettāvatā imasmiṃyeva vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyakappe buddhādayo mahesakkhā puññavanto cakkavattirājāno uppajjanti,
anya-e1102n:282_15: Tattha āyukappo nāma tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āyuparicchedo.
anya-e1102n:282_16: Antarakappo nāma tattha sattharogadubbhikkhānaṃ aññatarasaṃvaṭṭanena bahūsu vināsamupagatesu avasiṭṭhasattasantā
anya-e1102n:282_17: nappavattakusalakammānubhāvena dasavassato paṭṭhāya anukkamena asaṅkhyeyyāyukappappamāṇesu sattesu pana
anya-e1102n:282_18: adhammasamādānavasena kamena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukesu jātesu rogādīnamaññatarasaṃvaṭṭanena sattānaṃ
anya-e1102n:282_20: Evaṃ paricchinnaantarakappavasena catusaṭṭhiantarakappo eko asaṅkhyeyyakappo vīsati antarakappappamāṇoti apare vadanti.
anya-e1102n:282_21: Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyakappāni eko mahākappo nāma.
anya-e1102n:282_22: Evaṃ tejo saṃvaṭṭavasena tāva mahākappānaṃ antaraṃ aggināva vinassati.
anya-e1102n:282_23: Yasmiṃ pana samaye kappo udakena nassati,
anya-e1102n:282_24: tadā āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvāti pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ ayaṃ pana viseso yathā tattha dutiyasūriyo,
anya-e1102n:282_25: evamidhapi kappavināsako khārudakamahāmegho vuṭṭhāti so ādito sukhumaṃ vassanto anukkamena mahādhārāhi koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ pūrento vassati.
anya-e1102n:282_26: Khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā pathavīpabbatādayo vilīyanti taṃ udakaṃ vātena samantato dhāritaṃ pathavito
anya-e1102n:282_27: yāva parittābhā appamāṇābhā ābhassarāti tayopi dutiyajjhānabhūmi udakaṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e1102n:282_28: Tattha tayopi brahmaloke vilīyāpetvā subha kiṇhe āhacca tiṭṭhati yāva aṇumattaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ atthi,
anya-e1102n:282_30: Udakānugataṃ pana sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ abhibhavitvā sahasā vūpasamati antaradhānaṃ gacchati,
anya-e1102n:282_31: heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisameva.
anya-e1102n:282_32: Kevalaṃ panidha otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā lokapātubhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e1102n:282_33: Subhakiṇhato cavitvā ābhassaraṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti etthāpi kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva kappavināsakaudakaparicchedo
anya-e1102n:282_34: saṃvaṭṭo nāma paṭhamamasaṅkhyeyyakappo nāmāti cattāriasaṅkhyeyyakappāni vuttasadisāni evaṃ satta mahākappāni
anya-e1102n:282_35: sattakkhattuṃ agginā vilīyitvā aṭṭhame mahākappe udakenapi vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:282_36: evaṃ sattasattamahākappo sattasattavāraṃ agginā vilīyitvā aṭṭhame aṭṭhame vāre āpena vilīyitvā anukkamena
anya-e1102n:282_37: tesaṭṭhimahākappāni paripuṇṇāni tadā āpavāraṃ paṭibāhitvā catusaṭṭhime mahākappe vātena vinassati tadā
anya-e1102n:282_38: ādito kappavināsakamahāvāto vuṭṭhahitvāti sabbaṃ pubbe vuttanayameva.
anya-e1102n:282_39: Ayaṃ pana viseso yathā agginā vināsakappe dutiyasūriyo,
anya-e1102n:282_40: evamidhāpi kappavināsanatthaṃ vāto samuṭṭhāti so paṭhamaṃ sukhumarajaṃ uṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e1102n:282_41: tato thūlarajaṃ saṇharajaṃ sukhumavālikaṃ sakkharapāsāṇādayoti yāva kūṭāgāramatte pāsāṇepi visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkheca uṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e1102n:282_42: te pathavito nabhamuggatā na puna patanti,
anya-e1102n:282_44: Yathānukkamena heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā vāto samuṭṭhahitvā pathaviṃ parivattetvā uddhaṃmūlaṃ katvā ākāse
anya-e1102n:282_46: bhijjitvā te vegakkhittā ākāseyeva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṃ gacchanti cakkavāḷapabbatampi vāto ukkhipitvā
anya-e1102n:282_47: ākāse khipati te aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭayantā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti eteneva bhūmaṭṭhakavimānāni ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni
anya-e1102n:282_48: ca vināsento chakāmāvacaradevaloke nāsetvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷāni vināseti.
anya-e1102n:282_51: sinerū sinerūhi aññamaññaṃ samāgantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti.
anya-e1102n:282_54: subhaṇiṇhāti tayopi tatiyajjhānabhūmī vāto gaṇhāti tattha tayopi brahmaloke vināsetvā vehapphalaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:282_55: Evaṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ vināsetvā sayaṃ vinassati,
anya-e1102n:282_56: heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ.
anya-e1102n:282_57: Idha pana subhakiṇhabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati.

anya-e1102n:288_0: Tasmā tiṇṇampi paṭhamajjhānatalānaṃ ekakappepi avināsābhāvato sakalakappe tesaṃ sambhavo natthīti asaṅkhyeyya
anya-e1102n:288_2: Dutiyajjhānatalato paṭṭhāya pana paripuṇṇamahākappavasena āyuparicchedo daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e1102n:288_4: Yadi dutiyajjhānatalato paṭṭhāya paripuṇṇamahākappavasena āyuparicchedo siyā,
anya-e1102n:288_5: kathaṃ ābhassarādīsu brahmūnaṃ aṭṭhamahākappādivasena āyu paripuṇṇaṃ siyā,
anya-e1102n:288_6: tathā hi paṭhamajjhānatalaṃ sattasu vāresu agginā vinassati.
anya-e1102n:288_7: Aṭṭhame vāre yāva ābhassarā udakena vinassati puna sattavāresu agginā paṭhamajjhānatalaṃ,
anya-e1102n:288_8: puna aṭṭhamevāre udakena dutiyajjhānatalaṃ vinassatīti evaṃ aṭṭhame vāre āpavāraṃ paṭibāhitvā yāva subhakiṇhā
anya-e1102n:288_9: vātena vinassati evaṃ catusaṭṭhi paripuṇṇā hotīti saccaṃ,
anya-e1102n:288_10: heṭṭhāvivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena eko satta mahākappāni cāti aṭṭha kappāni ābhassarabrahmūnaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:288_11: Catusaṭṭhikappesupi vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyakappavasena eko te saṭṭhimahākappāni cāti catusaṭṭhikappāni
anya-e1102n:288_12: subhakiṇhānaṃ brahmūnaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti tena vuttaṃ porāṇehi.
