anya-e1102n:294_0: Imissā gāthāya “ābhassarāti”ca “subhakiṇhato”ti ca “vehapphalato”ti ca abhividhivasena vuttabhāvañca
anya-e1102n:294_1: samatalabhāvepi seṭṭhabhūmittā paṭṭhānavasena vuttabhāvañca amaññitvā suddhāvāsabhūmīsu viya uparūparivasena
anya-e1102n:295_0: “Pañcabhūmi naṭṭhā aggi, aṭṭha bhūmi naṭṭhā dakā;
anya-e1102n:296_0: Navabhūmi naṭṭhā vātā, lokanaṭṭhā tadā siyuṃ.
anya-e1102n:297_0: Paṭhame aggi dvattiṃsa, dutiye ādi soḷasa;
anya-e1102n:298_0: Dutiyabhūme majjhe aṭṭhamaṃ, taṃ chappaññāsa vārakaṃ.
anya-e1102n:301_0: Vadanti tesaṃ vāde ābhassarato heṭṭhā pañcabhūmi agginaṭṭhā,
anya-e1102n:301_2: Samataladīpanatthaṃ sandehacchedanatthaṃ evaṃ gahitāti ekabhavapariyosānaṃ sandhāya paṭisandhibhavañcāti ādi vuttanti.
anya-e1102n:301_3: Imissāpi atthaṃ duggahitena gahetvā paṭisandhibhavaṅgavasena sadisabhāvameva sandhāya vuttanti parikappenti
anya-e1102n:301_4: so ayuttarūpo viya dissati ativiya micchāgāho ca hoti aggaññasuttavisuddhimaggādīhi virujjhanato saṃvaṭṭasīmāpi
anya-e1102n:301_7: catutthajjhānatalaṃ upādāya vātena vinassatīti vuttavacanenāpi virujjhateva tasmā “ābhassarā”ti ca “subhakiṇhato”ti
anya-e1102n:301_9: Aññathā “upari pabbatā devo vassatī”ti ettha viya ābhassarasubhakiṇhavehapphalānaṃ tena tena saṃvaṭṭena vināsopi na bhaveyya.
anya-e1102n:301_11: Evaṃ buddho ca dullabho loke ti imassa attho vuttoyeva.
anya-e1102n:305_0: Idāni “saddhammasavanampi cāti imassa saṃvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto tattha saddhammasavanampi ca loke dullabhameva tathā hi saddhammo nāma tividho hoti.
anya-e1102n:305_5: Paṭipattisaddhammo nāma terasadhutaṅgāni asīti khandhakavattādayo abhisamācāravattādīni.
anya-e1102n:305_7: Tesu pariyattisaddhammo dvinnaṃ saddhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamoyeva padaṭṭhānañca.
anya-e1102n:305_8: Kasmā taṃmūlakattā tathā hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho nāma natthi.
anya-e1102n:305_11: Kiṃ kāraṇā ayañhi pariyatti paṭipattiyā paccayo hoti.
anya-e1102n:305_13: Tattha paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi nahotipi.
anya-e1102n:305_14: Ekasmiñhi kāle paṭivedhadharā bhikkhū bahū honti,
anya-e1102n:305_15: “esa bhikkhu puthujjano”ti aṅguliṃ paharitvā dassetabbo hoti.
anya-e1102n:305_16: Imasmiṃ yeva dīpe ekavāraṃ puthujjanabhikkhunāma nāhosi.
anya-e1102n:305_17: Paṭipattipūrakāpi kadāci bahū honti kadāci appā.
anya-e1102n:305_18: Iti paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi.
anya-e1102n:305_19: Sāsanassa ṭhitiyā pana pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ paṇḍito hi tepiṭakaṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti,
anya-e1102n:305_20: yathā amhākaṃ bodhisatto āḷārassa santike pañca abhiññā satta ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatana samāpattiyā parikammaṃ pucchi.
anya-e1102n:305_22: Tato udakassa santikaṃ gantvā adhigatavisesaṃ saṃsanditvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṃ pucchi.
anya-e1102n:305_24: tassa vacanasamanantarameva mahāsatto taṃ sampādesi evameva paññavā bhikkhu pariyattiṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti
anya-e1102n:305_25: tasmā pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti yathā mahātaḷākassa pāḷiyā thirāya udakaṃ na ṭhassatīti
anya-e1102n:305_26: na vattabbaṃ udake sati padumādīni pupphāni na pupphissantīti na vattabbaṃ evameva mahātaḷākassa thirapāḷisadise
anya-e1102n:305_27: tepiṭake buddhavacane sati mahātaḷāke udakasadisā paṭipattipūrakā kulaputtā natthīti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:305_28: Tesu sati mahātaḷākesu padumādīni pupphāni viya sotāpannādayo ariyapuggalā natthīti na vattabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:305_29: ekantato pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipaṭivedhānaṃ antaradhānato.
anya-e1102n:305_30: Tattha pariyattināma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sāṭṭhakathā pāḷiyāva sā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n:305_32: Gacchante kāle kaliyugarājāno adhammikā honti tesu adhammikesu rājāmaccādayo adhammikā honti tathā raṭṭhajanapadavāsinopi
anya-e1102n:305_33: adhammikā etesaṃ adhammikatāya na devo sammā vassati,
anya-e1102n:305_35: Tesu sampajjantesu paccayadāyakā bhikkhusaṅghassa paccaye dātuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:305_36: Bhikkhū paccayehi kilamantā antevāsike saṅgahetuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:305_40: Tato kāle gacchante pāḷimpi sakalaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkonti paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ parihāyati.
anya-e1102n:305_41: Parihāyamānaṃ matthakato paṭṭhāya pariyatti hāyati paṭhamañhi mahāpakaraṇaṃ parihāyati.
anya-e1102n:305_46: dhammasaṅgahoti evaṃ abhidhammapiṭake parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya suttantapiṭakaṃ parihāyati.
anya-e1102n:305_49: tato ekanipātoti evaṃ aṅguttare parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya saṃyuttanikāyo parihāyati,
anya-e1102n:305_54: sagāthāvaggoti evaṃ saṃyuttanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya majjhimanikāyo parihāyati paṭhamañhi uparipaṇṇāsako parihāyati.
anya-e1102n:305_56: tato mūlapaṇṇāsakoti evaṃ majjhimanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya dīghanikāyo parihāyati,
anya-e1102n:305_58: tato khandhakavaggoti dīghanikāye parihīne suttantapiṭakaṃ parihīnaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e1102n:305_61: Lābhakāmā pana suttante kathitepi sallakkhentā natthīti jātakameva dhārenti.
anya-e1102n:305_62: Gacchante kāle jātakampi dhāretuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:305_67: Gacchante kāle tampi matthakato parihāyati paṭhamañhi parivāro parihāyati,
anya-e1102n:305_68: tato khandhako bhikkhunīvibhaṅgo mahāvibhaṅgoti anukkamena uposathakkhandhakamattameva dhārenti,
anya-e1102n:305_72: Yadā saddho pasanno rājā hatthikkhandhe suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakamhi sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapāpetvā “buddhehi kathitaṃ
anya-e1102n:305_73: catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ jānanto imaṃ sahassaṃ gaṇhatū”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā gaṇhakaṃ alabhitvā ekavāraṃ
anya-e1102n:305_75: yāva tatiyaṃ carāpetvā gaṇhakaṃ alabhitvā rājapurisā sahassatthavikaṃ puna rājakulaṃ pavesenti,
anya-e1102n:305_77: Evaṃ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipi paṭivedhopi antarahitova hoti.
anya-e1102n:305_78: Saddhammasavanassa dullabhabhāvo dhammasoṇḍakavatthunā dīpetabbo amhākaṃ kira sammāsambuddho kassapasammāsambuddhassa
anya-e1102n:305_79: dhammarājassa sāsanantaradhānato nacireneva kālena bārāṇasirañño putto dhammasoṇḍakarājakumāro hutvā
anya-e1102n:305_80: pituaccayena rajje patiṭṭhāya kassapadasabalena desitaṃ dhammaṃ sotukāmo hutvā māsamattaṃ rajjaṃ katvā
anya-e1102n:305_81: amhākaṃ sammāsambuddho imasmiṃ yeva bhaddakappe rajjaṃ kāretvā devanagarasadise bārāṇasinagare cakkavattirajjasadisaṃ
anya-e1102n:305_83: “mayhaṃ evarūpaṃ rajjaṃ kiṃ vilāsaṃ rajjānubhāvaṃ saddhammaviyogena,
anya-e1102n:305_89: catuakkharaniyamitadhammadesanāviyogena mayhaṃ idaṃ rajjaṃ na sobhatī”ti cintetvā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena
anya-e1102n:305_90: sahassatthavikaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ susajjitaṃ maṅgalahatthikumbhe ṭhapetvā bārāṇasīnagare mahāvīthiyaṃ bheriṃ
anya-e1102n:305_91: carāpeti “ekapadikaṃ vā dvipadikaṃ vā tipadikaṃ vā catuppadikaṃ vā dhammapadaṃ jānantassa dammī”ti evaṃ
anya-e1102n:305_92: bheriṃ carāpetvā dhammajānanakaṃ alabhitvā punappunaṃ dvisahassaṃ tisahassaṃ yāva satasahassaṃ koṭi dve
anya-e1102n:305_95: Pariyosāne dhammadesakaṃ alabhitvā attano suvaṇṇapīṭhakaṃ setacchattaṃ cajitvāpi dhammadesakaṃ alabhitvā
anya-e1102n:305_96: rajjasiriṃ pahāya attānaṃ cajitvā “dhammadesakassa dāso hutvāpi dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti vatvā evampi dhamma
anya-e1102n:305_97: desakaṃ alabhitvā vippaṭisārī hutvā “kiṃ me saddhammaviyogena rajjenāti amaccānaṃ rajjaṃ niyyātetvā saddhammagavesako
anya-e1102n:305_98: hutvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā mahāvanaṃ pāvisi dhammasoṇḍakamahārājassa saddhammasavanaṃ sandhāya paviṭṭhakkhake
anya-e1102n:305_99: sakkadevamahārājassa vejayantapāsādo saheva kiṇṇikāya kampo ahosi,
anya-e1102n:305_101: Sakkodevarājā kenakāraṇena paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ ahosī”ti cintetvā attano sahassanettena devamanussesu
anya-e1102n:305_102: vitthāretvā olokento dhammagavesako hutvā vanaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ dhammasoṇḍakamahārājānaṃ disvā cintesi…
anya-e1102n:305_103: “ajja me attānampi jahāya rakkhasavesaṃ māpetvā etaṃ aniccaparidīpanaṃ jātijarābyādhimaraṇaṃ sakalasarīre
anya-e1102n:305_104: dosaṃ dassetvā dhammaṃ desetvā etaṃ sakarajjeyeva patiṭṭhāpetabba”nti cintetvā sakko devarājā yakkhasarūpaṃ
anya-e1102n:305_105: māpetvā bodhisattassa abhimukho avidūre attānaṃ dassesi.
anya-e1102n:305_108: cintetvā avidūre ṭhāne ṭhatvā pucchāmīti rakkhasena saddhiṃ sallapanto āha “sāmipuññadevarāja imasmiṃ
anya-e1102n:305_109: pana vanaghane vasanakadevarājā kiṃ nukho dhammaṃ jānāsī”ti,
anya-e1102n:305_114: tvaṃ mayhaṃ kīdisaṃ dhammakathikassa sakkāraṃ karissasī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:305_115: “Evaṃ sante mayhaṃ dhammaṃ kathetvā pacchā mayhaṃ sarīre maṃsaṃ khādissasī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:305_116: “Ahaṃ mahārāja chāto hutvā dhammaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkomī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:305_119: Puna so rakkhaso “nāhaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ sakkomī”ti.
anya-e1102n:305_120: Puna rājā “mayhaṃ dhammapaṭilābhañca tumhākaṃ maṃsapaṭilābhañca tumhe jānitvā mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desethā”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:305_121: Atha sakko devarājā “sādhu hothā”ti vatvā avidūre ṭhāne ubbedhena tigāvutamattaṃ mahantaṃ añjanapabbataṃ māpetvā evamāha…
anya-e1102n:305_122: “sace mahārāja imaṃ pabbatamuddhaniṃ ārūyha ākāsā uppatitvā tvaṃ mama mukhe patissasi,
anya-e1102n:305_124: evaṃ sante tuyhañca dhammappalābho mayhañca maṃsapaṭilābho bhavissatī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:305_125: Tassa kathaṃ sutvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā “anamatagge saṃsāre puriso hutvā adhammasamaṅgī hutvā adhammasseva
anya-e1102n:305_126: atthāya pāṇātipāto adinnādāno kāmesumicchācāro sūkariko orabbhiko sākuṇi ko coro paradāriko taṃ gahetvā
anya-e1102n:305_127: sīsacchinnānaṃ lohitaṃ catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakatopi bahutaraṃ mātāpituādīnampi manāpānaṃ atthāya rodantānaṃ
anya-e1102n:305_129: imaṃ pana sarīraṃ dhammassa atthāya vikkiṇāmi taṃ mahapphalañca manāpañcā”ti cintetvā “sādhu mārisa evaṃ
anya-e1102n:305_130: karomī”ti pabbataṃ ārūyha pabbatagge ṭhito “mama rajjena saddhiṃ mayhaṃ sajīvasarīraṃ saddhammassatthāya
anya-e1102n:305_131: dassāmī”ti somanasso hutvā “dhammaṃ kathethā”ti saddhammatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā ākāsato uppatitvā
anya-e1102n:305_133: Atha sakko devarājā sakattabhāvena sabbālaṅkārehi paṭimaṇḍito ativiya sotuṃ somanasso ākāsato patantaṃ
anya-e1102n:305_134: dibbaphassena parāmasanto urena paṭiggaṇhitvā devalokaṃ netvā paṇḍukambalasilāsane nisīdāpetvā mālāgandhādīhi
anya-e1102n:305_135: pūjetvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājassa dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha.
anya-e1102n:308_0: Evaṃ sakko dhammasoṇḍakamahārājassa dhammaṃ desetvā devalokasampattiṃ dassetvā devalokato ānetvā sakarajje
anya-e1102n:308_1: patiṭṭhāpetvā appamādena ovaditvā devalokameva agamāsi evaṃ saddhammasavanassāpi dullabhabhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e1102n:308_3: Ettha ca tīṇi parinibbānāni veditabbāni katamāni tīṇi parinibbānāni.
anya-e1102n:308_8: bhagavā hi bodhimaṇḍeyeva vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇapharasuṃ
anya-e1102n:308_14: saṅkhepato vā pañca kilesaabhisaṅkhārakhandhamaccudevaputtamāre asesato hatā vihatā anabhāvaṃkatā tasmā
anya-e1102n:308_15: sabbepi kilesā bodhimaṇḍeyeva nibbānaṃ nirodhaṃ gacchantīti kilesanibbānaṃ bodhimaṇḍeyeva hoti ettha
anya-e1102n:308_16: ca bodhīti arahattamaggaññāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ tathā hi sabbesampi buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakānaṃ arahattamaggakkhaṇeyeva
anya-e1102n:308_17: sabbepi kilesā asesaṃ nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchanti tepi buddhā ugghaṭitaviññūvibhajjitaññūneyyavasena
anya-e1102n:310_0: Tatiyo neyyo nāmena, bodhisatto tidhā mato.
anya-e1102n:313_0: Mato neyyo saddhādhiko nāma, bodhisattā ime tayo;
anya-e1102n:317_0: Aṭṭhame ca asaṅkhyeyye, kappe ca satasahasse;
anya-e1102n:320_0: Neyyo tu bodhisatto ca, soḷase asaṅkhyeyye.
anya-e1102n:323_0: Suttanipātaapadānaṭṭhakathāsu pana “buddhānaṃ ānanda heṭṭhimaparicchedena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca,
anya-e1102n:323_3: Eteca paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena veditabbāti vuttaṃ tesu paññādhiko cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca,
anya-e1102n:323_6: Tattha paññādhiko yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu saṃsarantopi paññābahullavasena sampannajjhāsaya sambhavato khippaññeva tassa sambodhi.
anya-e1102n:323_11: rājā passenadīkosalo yathā so hi sabbaññubuddhe dharamāneyeva agamanīyampi paradāraṃ gantuṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā
anya-e1102n:323_12: paraṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ āraddho nerayikānaṃ viravantānaṃ du- sa- na-
anya-e1102n:323_13: soti saddampi sutvā ativimūḷho sabbaññubuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṃ pucchitvā tassa vacanena
anya-e1102n:323_14: sabbajanānaṃ yaññatthāya dukkhaṃ uppādesi ko panavādo anuppanne buddhe,
anya-e1102n:323_15: tathā hi esa kassapabhagavato sāsanantaradhānena andhabhūte loke bārāṇasiyaṃ rājā hutvāpi nigrodharukkhadevatāya
anya-e1102n:323_16: yaññatthāya ekasatarājāno mahesīhi saddhiṃ māretuṃ āraddho.
anya-e1102n:323_18: tasmā tassa sambodhi atimandoti evaṃ paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena kālassāpi rassadīghabhāvo veditabboti.
anya-e1102n:323_20: Khandhaparinibbānaṃ pana kusinārāya upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare vesākhapuṇṇamadivase
anya-e1102n:323_22: mahāvipākacittena abyākatena carimakaṃ katvā katthaci bhave paṭisandhiviññāṇassa anantarapaccayo hutvā
anya-e1102n:323_23: kammataṇhākilesehi anupādāno sabbupadhipaṭinissaggo upādinnakakkhandhapariccāgo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:323_24: Vitthāro pana dīghanikāye mahāvagge mahāparinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ oloketabbo.
anya-e1102n:323_25: Tattha videsaṃ gacchanto puriso sabbaṃ ñātijanaṃ āliṅgetvā sīse cumbitvā gacchati viya bhagavāpi nibbānapuraṃ
anya-e1102n:323_26: pavisanto sabbepi catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattiyo anavasesaṃ samāpajjitvā yāva saññāvedayitaṃ,
anya-e1102n:323_27: tatopi vuṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena parinibbāyi.
anya-e1102n:323_28: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyī”ti vuttaṃ tattha dve samanantarā jhānasamanantarā,
anya-e1102n:323_30: Tattha jhānā vuṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ jhānasamanantaraṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:323_31: Jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā puna jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ paccavekkhaṇasamanantaraṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:323_32: Bhagavā pana jhānasamanantarā apari nibbāyittā paccavekkhaṇasamanantarameva parinibbāyīti veditabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:323_33: tenevāha “bhagavā pana jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena parinibbāyī”ti.
anya-e1102n:323_34: Ettha bhagavato parinibbānacittassa kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ kammaṃ vā hoti,
anya-e1102n:328_0: Imissāgāthāya “yaṃ yo muni anejo santi nibbānaṃ ārabbha kālaṃ akarī”ti yojetvā bhagavato parinibbānacittassa nibbānārammaṇanti tamayuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:328_1: paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutīnaṃ nibbānārammaṇassa anārahattā “nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa ārammaṇapaccayenapaccayo,
anya-e1102n:328_2: nibbānaṃ phalassa āvajjanāyā”ti paṭṭhānapāḷiyā javanaāvajjanānameva adhippetattā tasmā ettha “yaṃ yo
anya-e1102n:328_3: muni phalasamāpattiyā anejo anejasaṅkhāto taṇhārahito santiṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha ārammaṇaṃ katvā kālaṃ asītivassaparimāṇaṃ
anya-e1102n:328_6: “katthaci pana anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa yathopaṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpadhammādikameva cutipariyosānānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati, na kamma-
anya-e1102n:328_7: kammanimittādayo”ti vuttattā kammanittagatinimittāni arahato cuticittassa ārammaṇabhāvaṃ na gacchantīti
anya-e1102n:328_8: tampi ayuttameva ayañhetthattho katthaci pana bhave anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa arahato yathā yathā
anya-e1102n:328_9: yena yena pakārena upaṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpadhammādikameva cutipariyosānaṃ āvajjanajavanacittānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati,
anya-e1102n:328_11: Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhūtāni kammakammanimittagatinimittāni gocarabhāvaṃ na gacchantīti.
anya-e1102n:328_12: Cuticittassa pana paṭisandhicittena gahitaṃ atītārammaṇameva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati.
anya-e1102n:328_13: “Nāmarūpādikamevā ti ettha nāma”nti cittacetasikanibbānaṃ rūpanti aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e1102n:328_15: Nāmarūpā ca te dhammā ceti tathā.
anya-e1102n:328_16: Te ādi yesaṃ teti nāmarūpadhammādi tameva nāmarūpadhammādikaṃ.
anya-e1102n:328_18: tena nibbānampi arahato maraṇāsannakāle kriyajavanassapi ārammaṇabhāvo bhaveyyāti amhākaṃ khanti vīmaṃsitvā pana gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:328_19: Bhagavato nibbānacittassa pana tusitapurato cavitvā sirīmahāmāyāya kucchimhi vasitapaṭisandhicittena
anya-e1102n:328_20: gahitārammaṇameva ārammaṇaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ tañca kho gatinimittameva,
anya-e1102n:328_22: Yuttitopi āgamatopi gatinimittameva yujjati tathā hi tusitapureyeva setaketudevaputto hutvā dibbagaṇanāya cattāri sahassāni,
anya-e1102n:328_24: disvā suddhāvāse arahantabrahmunā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma devatāvisesehi ca.
anya-e1102n:331_1: kulaṃ mātarameva cā”ti vuttāni pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā tusitapurato cavitvā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva
anya-e1102n:331_4: Tadārammaṇāsannavīthito pubbabhāge ālokitāni kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena imāni pañca paṭisandhicittassa
anya-e1102n:331_5: gatinimittārammaṇabhāvena gocarabhāvaṃ gacchantīti amhākaṃ khanti tanninnatappoṇatappabbhāravasena bāhullappavattito
anya-e1102n:331_6: teneva abhidhammatthasaṅgahādīsu abhidhammattha vibhāvaniyaṃ “maraṇakāle yathārahaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ bhavantare
anya-e1102n:331_7: paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammaṃ vā taṃ kammakaraṇakāle rūpādikamupaladdhapubbamupakaraṇabhūtañca kammanimittaṃ
anya-e1102n:331_8: vā anantaramuppajjamānabhave upalabhitabbaṃ upabhogabhūtaṃ gatinimittaṃ vā kammabalena channaṃ dvārānamaññatarasmiṃ
anya-e1102n:331_10: tato paraṃ tameva tathopaṭṭhitamālambaṇaṃ ārabbha vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ parisuddhaṃ vā,
anya-e1102n:331_11: upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā upapajjitabbabhavānurūpaṃ tatthoṇataṃva cittasantānamabhiṇhaṃ pavattati bāhullena.
anya-e1102n:331_12: Tameva vā pana janakabhūtaṃ kammaṃ abhinavakaraṇavasena dvārappattaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:331_13: Paccāsannamaraṇassa pana tassa vīthicittāvasāne bhavaṅgakkhayevā cavanavasena paccuppannabhavapariyosānabhūtaṃ cuticittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e1102n:331_14: Tasmiṃ niruddhāvasāne tassānantarameva tathā gahitamālambaṇamārabbha savatthukamavatthukameva vā yathārahaṃ
anya-e1102n:331_15: avijjānusayaparikkhittena taṇhānusayamūlakena saṅkhārena janiyamānaṃ sampayuttehi pariggayhamānaṃ sahajātānamadhiṭṭhānabhāvena
anya-e1102n:331_16: pubbaṅgamabhūtaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ mānasamuppajjamānameva patiṭṭhāti bhavantare”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:331_17: Tattha “tatthoṇataṃva cittasantānamabhiṇhaṃ pavattati bāhullenā”ti iminā kammabalena upaṭṭhitaṃ gatinimittaṃ
anya-e1102n:331_19: sattāhato uttaripi uppajjate vāti dasseti tathā hi parisuddhaṃ vā upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ gatinimittaṃ cirakālampi tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n:331_20: ariyagālatissacoraghātakādayo viya tathā hi ariyagālatisso nāma upāsako sīhaḷadīpe attano bhariyāya sumanāya
anya-e1102n:331_21: saddhiṃ yāvajīvaṃ dānādi puññakammāni katvā āyūhapariyosāne ariyagālatissassa maraṇamañce nipannassa
anya-e1102n:331_22: chadevalokato rathaṃ ānetvā attano attano devalokaṃ vaṇṇesuṃ.
anya-e1102n:331_23: Upāsako devatānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tusitapurato āhaṭarathaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesarathe “gahetvā gacchathā”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:331_24: Sumanā pana attano sāmikassa vacanaṃ sutvā “kiṃ tissa maraṇāsanne vilāpaṃ akāsī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:331_25: Tisso attano bhariyāya kathaṃ sutvā āha…
anya-e1102n:331_27: devalokato devatā cha rathe ānesuṃ tāhi devatāhi saddhaṃ kathemī”ti.
anya-e1102n:331_28: Taṃ napassāmi kuhi”nti vutte pupphadāmaṃ āharāpetvā ākāse khipāpesi.
anya-e1102n:331_29: Sā taṃ pupphadāmaṃ rathasīse olambamānaṃ disvā gabbhaṃ pavisitvā sayane sayitvā nāsikavātaṃ sannirujjhitvā cavitvā pāturahosi.
anya-e1102n:331_33: Ubhopi rathe ṭhatvā sabbe olokentānaṃyeva tusitapuraṃ agamaṃsu.
anya-e1102n:331_34: Imasmiñhi vatthusmiṃ sāmikassa upaṭṭhitagatinimittaṃ bhariyāya pākaṭaṃ hutvā puretaratusitapure nibbattitvā
anya-e1102n:331_35: sāmikassa sāsanaṃ pesesi tena ariyagālatissassa cirakālaṃ gatinimittaṃ upaṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:331_36: Manussaloke hi cirakālaṃ tusitapure muhuttaṃva hoti.
anya-e1102n:331_37: Evaṃ parisuddhaṃ vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ gatinimittaṃ cirakālaṃ pavattati iminā nayena duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayadhammikaupsakādīnampi
anya-e1102n:331_39: Coraghātakassa pana mahāniraye vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ nerayaggijālādikaṃ sattāhaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e1102n:331_40: Sāvatthinagare kira pañcasatā corā bahinagare corakammaṃ karonti.
anya-e1102n:331_41: Athekadivasaṃ janapadapuriso tesaṃ abbhantaro hutvā corakammaṃ akāsi,
anya-e1102n:331_43: Rājā te disvā “tumhākaṃ antare ime sabbe māretuṃ samatthassa jīvitaṃ dammī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:331_44: Pañcasatā corā aññamaññaṃ sambandhā aññamaññaṃ sahāyakāti aññamaññaṃ māretuṃ na icchiṃsu,
anya-e1102n:331_45: janapadamanusso pana “ahaṃ māremī”ti vatvā sabbe māresi.
anya-e1102n:331_48: Rājā tassa mahallakoti vatvā aññassa coraghātaka kammaṃ dāpesi.
anya-e1102n:331_49: So coraghātakakammā apanīto aññatarassa santike nāsikavātaṃ uggaṇhitvā hatthapādakaṇṇanāsādīhi chinditabbānaṃ
anya-e1102n:331_50: ūrūthanakaṭṭhānaṃ bhindantamāretabbayuttānaṃ nāsikavātaṃ vissajjetvā māretabbaṃ mantaṃ labhi.
anya-e1102n:331_51: So rājānaṃ ārocetvā nāsikavātena coraghātakakammaṃ karontasseva tiṃsa vassāni atikkami.
anya-e1102n:331_52: So pacchā mahallako hutvā maraṇamañce nipajji “sattadivasena kālaṃ karissatī”ti.
anya-e1102n:331_54: So mahāniraye nibbatto viya mahāsaddaṃ katvā dukkhito hoti.
anya-e1102n:331_55: Tassa saddena bhītā manussā ubhatopasse gehaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:331_56: Tassa maraṇadivase sāriputtatthero dibbacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento etassa kālaṃ katvā mahāniraye nibbattamānaṃ
anya-e1102n:331_57: disvā tassa anukampaṃ paṭicca gehadvāre pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e1102n:331_59: Yāva tatiyaṃ vissajjamānopi vissajjāpetuṃ asakkonto theraṃ atirekena virocamānaṃ disvā cittaṃ pasādetvā pāyāsaṃ therassa dāpesi.
anya-e1102n:331_61: Coraghātako therassa dinnadānaṃ anussaritvā cavitvā sagge nibbatti,
anya-e1102n:331_64: Evaṃ upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā vipaccamāna kakammānurūpaṃ gatinimittampi sattāhaparamaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e1102n:331_66: Bhagavato pana parisuddhaṃ mettāpubbabhāgassa somanassa ñāṇasampayuttakusalassa kammassa vegena kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena
anya-e1102n:331_70: tathāpi manussaloke sattāhamatte kāle devatānaṃ pañcapubbanimittāni paññāyanti tañca kho puññavantānaṃyeva paññāyanti,
anya-e1102n:331_71: na sabbesaṃ manussaloke puññavantānaṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ viya taṃ disvā mahesakkhā devatā jānanti,
anya-e1102n:331_74: Mahesakkhā devatā taṃ pubbanimittaṃ disvā nandavanaṃ netvā “kālo devā”ti ādīhi yācanti.
anya-e1102n:331_75: Mahāsakko tattheva nandavanuyyāne kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena pañca viloketvā cavitvā tamārammaṇaṃ katvā
anya-e1102n:332_0: Tattha kālanti manussaloke ekūnatiṃsatime vasse vesākhapuṇṇamadivase buddho bhavissāmīti kālaṃ olokesi.
anya-e1102n:332_7: Tattha yasmiṃ kāle khattiyakulaṃ loke seṭṭhabhāvena “ayameva loke aggo”ti sammannati,
anya-e1102n:332_9: Yasmiṃ pana kāle brāhmaṇakulaṃ ayameva loke aggoti,
anya-e1102n:332_13: asambhinnakhattiyakulattā tasmā sakyarājakuleyeva bhavissāmīti kulaṃ olokesi.
anya-e1102n:332_14: Mātaranti mama mātaraṃ dasa māsāni satta ca divasāni ṭhassati,
anya-e1102n:332_15: etthantare mama mātuyā arogo bhavissatīti mātarampi olokesi.
anya-e1102n:332_17: Evaṃ yuttitopi āgamatopi bhagavato nibbānacittassa paṭasandhicittena gahitanimittameva ārammaṇaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:335_0: Dhātuparinibbānampi bodhimaṇḍeyeva bhavissati vuttañhetaṃ uparipaṇṇāsake “dhātuparinibbānaṃ anāgate bhavissati
anya-e1102n:335_1: sāsanassa hi osakkanakāle imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe dhātuyo sannipatitvā mahācetiyato nāgadīpe rājāyatanacetiyaṃ,
anya-e1102n:335_3: Nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti sāsapamattāpi dhātuyo antarā na nassissanti,
anya-e1102n:335_4: sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandhā viya ekagghanā hutvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjissanti,
anya-e1102n:335_6: Tato dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitvā ''ajja satthā parinibbāyati ajja sāsanaṃ osakkati pacchimadassanaṃ
anya-e1102n:335_7: idaṃ amhāka”nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṃ kāruññaṃ karissanti ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave
anya-e1102n:335_9: dhātusarīrato tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati.
anya-e1102n:335_10: Sāsapamattāyapi dhātuyā sati ekajālā bhavissati dhātūsu pariyādānaṃ gatāsu pacchijjissati.
anya-e1102n:335_11: Evaṃ mahantaṃ ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e1102n:335_14: Parinibbānakālato paṭṭhāya yāva sāsapamattā dhātu tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n:335_15: tāva buddhakālato pacchāti na veditabbaṃ dhātūsu hi ṭhitāsu buddhā ṭhitā va honti,
anya-e1102n:335_16: tasmā etthantare aññassa buddhassa uppatti nivāritāva hoti.
anya-e1102n:339_0: Yo karoti samaṃ pūjaṃ, phalaṃ tāsa samaṃ siyā’ti.
anya-e1102n:343_0: Idāni saṅgho ca dullabho loketi padassa vaṇṇanākkamo sampatto.
anya-e1102n:343_6: Tattha saṅkhepavasena sotāpattimaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yugaṃ,
anya-e1102n:343_9: arahattamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekanti cattāri purisayugāni honti.
anya-e1102n:343_10: Cattāro maggaṭṭhā cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭhapurisapuggalā honti.
anya-e1102n:343_12: tathā sakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamaggaṭṭhāpi pañca pañcāti vīsati maggaṭṭhapuggalā,
anya-e1102n:343_13: tathā phalaṭṭhāpi sotapattiphalaṭṭhādivasena pañca pañcāti vīsati phalaṭṭhāti cattālīsapuggalā honti.
anya-e1102n:343_14: Ettha ca maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā kathaṃ vīsatimaggaṭṭhā puggalā bhaveyyunti.
anya-e1102n:344_1: cattāropi maggaṭṭhā paṭhamajjhānikādivohāraṃ labhantā paccekaṃ pañcapañcadhā vibhajiyanti,
anya-e1102n:344_3: Tattha paṭhamajjhānādīsu yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasantassa vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā pavattā,
anya-e1102n:344_5: Yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ sammasantassa sā pavattā,
anya-e1102n:344_8: dutiyajjhānādīsu vā aññatarasadiso caturaṅgikādibhedo maggo bhaveyyā”ti evaṃ yogāvacarassa uppannajjhāsayo puggalajjhāsayo nāma.
anya-e1102n:344_9: Tattha yena paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti,
anya-e1102n:344_10: tassa so maggo paṭhamajjhānādi taṃ taṃ pādakajjhānasadiso hoti.
anya-e1102n:344_12: kevalaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ jhānaṃ sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti,
anya-e1102n:344_14: Yadā panayaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato aññaṃ sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti,
anya-e1102n:344_16: Evaṃ samathayānikassa puthujjanassa ariyānaṃ vā pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānapuggalajjhāsayavasena paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ
anya-e1102n:344_17: aññatarajhānasadisassa maggaṅgikassa pavattanato puggalabhedavasena vīsati maggaṭṭhā puggalā honti,
anya-e1102n:344_19: Aparampi sace pana puggalassa tathā vidho ajjhāsayo natthi,
anya-e1102n:344_20: anulomavasena heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajhānato vuṭṭhāya uparūparijhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo pādakajjhānamanapekkhitvā sammasitajjhānasadiso hoti.
anya-e1102n:344_21: Paṭilomavasena uparūparijhānato vuṭṭhāya heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sammasitajjhānamanapekkhitvā pādakajjhānasadiso hoti,
anya-e1102n:344_26: Kāmarūpārūpabhavesu adhigataphalā tayo sakadāgāminoti te sabbepi dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññaṃ,
anya-e1102n:344_29: sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññanti catunnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena catuvīsati,
anya-e1102n:344_42: cattāro maggaṭṭhāti catupaññāsa te sabbepi saddhādhurapaññādhurānaṃvasena dveguṇe hutvā aṭṭhasataṃ ariyapuggalā honti.
anya-e1102n:344_43: Te sabbepi “aṭṭhasataṃ vā”ti vitthāravasena uddiṭṭhā ariyapuggalā te saṅkhepato yugavasena sotāpatti
anya-e1102n:344_44: maggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yugantyādinā cattārova honti.
anya-e1102n:344_46: cattāri etāni yugāni hontī”ti ayaṃ pabhedomaggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhesu missakavasena labbhati jhānikavipassakapabhedo
anya-e1102n:344_47: pana phalaṭṭheyeva labbhati maggassa ekacittakkhatikattā maggaṭṭhesu na labbhati.
anya-e1102n:344_49: Tesu jhāniko puggalo tasmiṃ bhave arahattappatto parinibbāyati.
anya-e1102n:344_52: Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana nikantiyā sati puthujjanādayo yathāladdhajjhānassa bhūmibhūte suddhāvāsavajjite yattha
anya-e1102n:344_53: katthaci nibbattanti tathā kāmabhavepi kāmāvacarakammabalena “ijjhati hi bhikkhave sīlavato cetopaṇidhi
anya-e1102n:344_55: Anāgāmino pana kāmarāgassa sabbaso pahīnattā kāmabhavesu nikantiṃ na uppādentīti kāmalokavajjite yathāladdhassa
anya-e1102n:344_56: bhūmi bhūte yattha katthaci nibbattantī’ti vuttaṃ tathā hi anāgāmisseva kāmabhave nikantiyā pahīnattā
anya-e1102n:344_57: sotāpannasakadāgāmīnampi nikantiyā sati kāmabhave kāmāvacarakammabalena uppattibhāvo avāritova hotīti
anya-e1102n:344_59: so jhāniko nāmāti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vutta”nti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:344_63: Tattha eko manussaloke vā hotu chadevaloke vā,
anya-e1102n:344_65: ayaṃ ekabījī nāma eko manussaloke ekā paṭisandhi devaloke ekāti dvepaṭisandhiko vā,
anya-e1102n:344_66: evaṃ ticatupañcachaparamo hutvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyati,
anya-e1102n:344_68: Eko manussaloke sotāpanno hutvā devaloke ekā paṭisandhi tato punāgantvā manussaloke ekāti evaṃ manussadevalokamissakavasena
anya-e1102n:344_69: tattha cattāri idha tīṇityādinā tattha cha,
anya-e1102n:344_70: idha ekoti yāva sattapaṭisandhiko hutvā parinibbāyati,
anya-e1102n:344_72: Kevalaṃ pana manussaloke yeva satta devalokeyeva vā sattāti evaṃ amisso hutvā paṭisandhiko gahetabbo apare pana “ito satta,
anya-e1102n:344_73: tato satta saṃsāre vicarantī”ti vuttattā manussalokasattapaṭisandhidevaloka sattapaṭisandhivasena sattakkhattuparamaṃ vadanti.
anya-e1102n:344_74: Taṃ ayuttaṃ kasmā “kiñcāpi te honti bhusaṃpamattā,
anya-e1102n:344_75: na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamamādiyantī”ti pāḷiyā virodhattā.
anya-e1102n:344_76: Apica dvibhavaparicchinno sakadāgāmīpi dvikkhattuṃ manussalokaṃ āgato bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:344_78: idha ekanti vārassa labbhitabbato na panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:344_79: Sakiṃ imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī idha patvā idha parinibbāyī,
anya-e1102n:344_82: idha patvā tattha parinibbāyīti pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu pañcamako idha adhippeto.
anya-e1102n:344_83: Yadi evaṃ idha patvā idha parinibbāyīti ādayo cattāro kathaṃ sakadāgāmīnāmāti.
anya-e1102n:344_84: Te sakiṃ puna āgacchatīti vacanatthena sakadāgāmī nāma.
anya-e1102n:344_85: Kāmataṇhāya sabbaso pahīnattā imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ anāgacchatīti anāgāmī,
anya-e1102n:344_86: niccaṃ brahmalokeyeva paṭisandhi vasena āgacchatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e1102n:344_88: sukkhavipassakassa kathanti sopi jhānikova hutvā gacchati tassa hi maggantare sīhabyagghādīhi hatassāpi
anya-e1102n:344_89: lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā jhāniko hutvāva maraṇaṃ hoti ayaṃ pana rūpārūpabhavena ekakkhattuparamo nāma.
anya-e1102n:344_90: Sattakkhattuparamādayo ariyā rūpārūpalokesu anekakkhattupaṭisandhikāpi brahmalokasāmaññena ekapaṭisandhikā nāma honti.
anya-e1102n:344_91: Arahā pana pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvā dakkhiṇaṃ arahattā puna bhavā bhinibbattiyārahābhāvātyādinā vacanatthena arahā nāma.
anya-e1102n:344_95: Aparopi puthujjanasekkhasantāne jhāniko hutvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā maggaṃ uppādeti,
anya-e1102n:344_97: Sukkhavipassako pana kilesakkhayamattameva maggena saha anāgatajhānaṃ nāma natthi,
anya-e1102n:344_102: Tattha yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu yeneva iriyapathena samannāgato hutvā vipassanaṃ ārabhati,
anya-e1102n:344_103: teneva iriyāpathena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyati ayaṃ iriyāpathasamasīsī nāma.
anya-e1102n:344_104: Yo pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antoroge eva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā teneva rogena parinibbāyati ayaṃ rogasamasīsi nāma.
anya-e1102n:344_105: Yo pana terasasu sīsesu kilesasīsaṃ avijjaṃ arahattamaggo pariyādiyati,
anya-e1102n:344_108: Tattha terasa sīsāni katamāni terasa sīsāni.
anya-e1102n:344_122: Ettha ca avijjā pariyādāyakaṃ maggacittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e1102n:344_123: jīvitapariyādāyakaṃ cuticittaṃ avijjaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e1102n:344_132: arahattamagge sesakilesābhāvā cattārīti ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā
anya-e1102n:344_133: parinibbāyato imāya vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsa pariyādānampi samaṃ hoti nāma.
anya-e1102n:344_134: Arahattamagge ca pavattisīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pavattito vuṭṭhahanto maggo cutito uddhaṃ appavattikaraṇavasena yadipi pariyādiyati.
anya-e1102n:344_136: tāva pavattisabhāvato pavattisīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ pariyādiyati nāma.
anya-e1102n:344_137: Kilesapariyādānena maggacittena attano anantaraṃ viya nipphādetabbā paccavekkhaṇavārāva paripuṇṇā.
anya-e1102n:344_138: Paripuṇṇavasena pahīnakilese paccavekkhaṇato kilesapariyādānasseva vārāti vattabbataṃ arahanti,
anya-e1102n:344_139: teneva kilesasīsaṃ avijjāpariyādānañca pavattisīsaṃ jīvitindriyapariyādānañca samaṃ katvā imāya vārasamatāya
anya-e1102n:344_141: Saṃyuttaṭhakathāyaṃ pana yassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca,
anya-e1102n:344_143: Ettha ca pavattisīsaṃ kilesasīsanti dve sīsāni.
anya-e1102n:344_153: Tikhiṇena asinā sīse chindantepi hi eko vā dve vā paccavekkhaṇavārā avassaṃ uppajjantiyeva,
anya-e1102n:344_154: cittānaṃ pana lahuparivattitāya āsavakkhayo ca jīvitapariyādānañca ekakkhaṇe viya sañjāyatī’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:344_159: Kiñcāpi eko vā dve vā ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:344_161: Yāva ekaṃ vā dve vā tadārammaṇacittānīti heṭṭhimantena dve pavattantīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:344_163: aparipuṇṇaṃ pañchakkhattuṃ pavattiyā”ti iminā aṭṭhakathāṭīkāvacanena samasīsīnaṃ paccavekkhaṇāvasena
anya-e1102n:344_165: aparipuṇṇavasena pañcakkhattuṃ kriyajavanāni javantīti sanniṭṭhānametthāva gantabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:344_166: “Asammūḷho kālaṃ karotī”ti vuttattā ca viññāyati sattakkhattuṃ paripuṇṇavasena maraṇāsannakāle javanapavatti.
anya-e1102n:344_167: Evañca sati “mandappavattiyaṃ pana maraṇakālādīsu pañcavāramevā”ti ettha “mandappavattiya”nti visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ siyā.
anya-e1102n:344_170: Kāmāvacarajavanānañca aniyataparimāṇā balavakālepi parisampuṇṇabhāvā tathā hi “kāmāvacarajavanānibalavakāle sattakkhattuṃ chakkhattuṃ vā,
anya-e1102n:344_172: Bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu lahukappavattiyaṃ cattāri pañcavā paccavekkhaṇajavanacittāni bhavantī”ti
anya-e1102n:344_173: aniyamitappamāṇavasena uppattibhāvo āgato imasmiṃ samasīsiniddesavārepi maraṇāsannavīthicittassa visuṃ
anya-e1102n:344_174: alabbhanato paccavekkhaṇanteyeva bhavaṅgacittena parinibbānato paripuṇṇavasena satta javanacittāni pāṭikaṅkhitabbānīti
anya-e1102n:344_175: amhākaṃ khanti vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbo ito yuttataro vā pakāro labbhamāno gavesitabbo.
anya-e1102n:344_178: cattālīsampipuggalā aṭṭhasatampi purisapuggalāti sabbaṃ samodhānetvā imasmiṃ loke saṅghopi dullabhoti
anya-e1102n:344_179: veditabbo tathā hi ariyapuggalā atidullabhāva sāsanassa vijjamānakālepi idāni sotāpannassāpi avijjamānato
anya-e1102n:344_183: Kasmā buddhuppādakāleyeva labbhanato tathā hi anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhānaṃ satasahassādigaṇane uppajjamānepi
anya-e1102n:344_184: tesaṃ santike upasampadābhāvassa alabbhamānato paccekabuddhānañhi santike pabbajitānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ saraṇagamanakammaṭṭhānassāpi
anya-e1102n:344_186: Paccekabuddhā ca nāma mūgassa supinadassanaṃ viya attanā paṭiladdhasaccadhamme paresaṃ ācikkhituṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e1102n:344_187: tasmā te pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojetuṃ asamatthā “evaṃ te nivāsetabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:344_188: evaṃ te pārupitabba”nti ādinānayena abhisamācārikameva sikkhāpesuṃ tasmā buddhuppādakāleyeva sammutisaṅgho labbhati.
anya-e1102n:344_190: atha kho tasmiṃ uddissa appamattakassāpi katākārassa asaṅkhyeyyaphalāpi honti vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “bhavissanti
anya-e1102n:344_191: kho panānanda anāgatamaddhānaṃ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṃ uddissa
anya-e1102n:344_193: tadā pāhaṃ ānanda saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ appameyyaṃ vadāmi na tvevāhaṃ ānanda kenaci pariyāyena
anya-e1102n:344_194: saṅghagatā dakkhiṇā pāṭipuggalikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ mahapphalanti vadāmī”ti.
anya-e1102n:344_195: Tathā hi uparipaṇṇāsake dakkhiṇavibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ “kāsāvakaṇṭhānaṃ saṅghe dinne dakkhiṇāpi guṇāsaṅkhyāya asaṅkhyeyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:344_196: Saṅghagatadakkhiṇā hi saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa hoti.
anya-e1102n:344_197: Saṅghe pana cittīkāro dukkaro yo hi “saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dassāmī”ti deyyadhammaṃ paṭiyādetvā vihāraṃ
anya-e1102n:344_198: gantvā bhante saṅghaṃ uddissa ekaṃ theraṃ dethā’ti vadati,
anya-e1102n:344_199: atha saṅghato sāmaṇeraṃ labhitvā “sāmaṇero me laddho”ti aññathattaṃ āpajjati,
anya-e1102n:344_201: Mahātheraṃ labhitvā pi “mahāthero me laddho”ti somanassaṃ uppādentassāpi na hotiyeva.
anya-e1102n:344_203: Yo pana sāmaṇeraṃ upasampannaṃ vā daharaṃ vā theraṃ vā bālaṃ vā paṇḍitaṃ vā yaṃkiñci saṅghato labhitvā
anya-e1102n:344_204: nibbematiko hutvā “saṅghassa dammī”ti saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e1102n:344_206: Parasamuddavāsino kira evaṃ karonti tattha hi eko vihārassāmikuṭumbiko “saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dassāmī”ti
anya-e1102n:344_207: saṅghato uddisitvā “ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dethā”ti yācitvā so ekaṃ dussīlabhikkhuṃ labhitvā nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ opuñjāpetvā
anya-e1102n:344_208: āsanaṃ paññapetvā upari vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhadhūmapupphehi pūjetvā pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā buddhassa
anya-e1102n:344_209: nipaccakāraṃ karonto viya saṅghe cittīkārena deyyadhammaṃ adāsi so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ vihāraṃ jagganatthāya
anya-e1102n:344_210: “kudālakaṃ dethā”ti gharadvāraṃ āgato upāsako nisinnova kudālaṃ pādena khipitvā “gaṇhā”ti adāsi tamenaṃ
anya-e1102n:344_211: manussā āhaṃsu “tumhehi pātova etassa katasakkāro vattuṃ na sakkā,
anya-e1102n:344_217: sāriputtamoggalānādayo asītimahātherā sodhenti api ca therā ciraparinibbutā,
anya-e1102n:344_218: there ādiṃ katvā yāvajjatanā dharamānakhīṇāsavā sodhentiyeva,
anya-e1102n:344_219: tathā hi dāyakato paṭiggāhatopi mahapphalaṃ hoti dānaṃ.
anya-e1102n:344_220: Dāyakato vessantarajātakaṃ kathetabbaṃ vessantaro hi dussīlassa jūjakābrāhmaṇassa nayanasadise dve jālīkaṇhājine putte datvā pathaviṃ kampesi.
anya-e1102n:344_221: Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbha pavattacetanāya mahantabhāvena pathaviṃ kampesi.
anya-e1102n:344_223: Paṭiggāhakato pana sāriputtattherassa dinnacoraghātakavatthu kathetabbaṃ coraghātako nāma hi sāvatthiyaṃ
anya-e1102n:344_224: eko janapadapuriso pañcavīsati vassāni coraghātakakammaṃ katvā mahallakakālepi tiṃsa vassāni nāsikavāteneva
anya-e1102n:344_225: kaṇṇanāsādīni chinditvā coraghātakakammaṃ karontasseva pañcapaññāsa vassāni vītivattāni.
anya-e1102n:344_226: So maraṇa mañce nipannova attano kammabalena mahāniraye nibbatto viya mahāsaddaṃ katvā dukkhito hoti,
anya-e1102n:344_227: tassa saddena bhītā manussā ubhato passe gehaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:344_228: Tadā sāriputtatthero dibbacakkhu nā lokaṃ volokento taṃ disvā tassa anukampaṃ paṭicca tassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:344_229: So kujjhitvā tikkhattuṃ nāsikavātena vissajjamānopi vissajjituṃ asakkonto ativirocamānaṃ theraṃ disvā
anya-e1102n:344_230: ativiya pasīditvā attano atthāya sampāditaṃ pāyāsaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1102n:344_232: Coraghātako therassa dinnadānaṃ anussaritvā sagge nibbatti,
anya-e1102n:347_0: Natthi citte pasannamhi, appakā nāma dakkhiṇā.
anya-e1102n:350_2: Seyyathāpi makkhaligosālachasatthārādīnaṃ attano upāsakamicchādiṭṭhīhi pūjāvisesā vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā.
anya-e1102n:352_0: Na so saṅkhatadhammānaṃ, kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasi”nti.
anya-e1102n:353_1: Imāni tīṇi buddhadhammasaṅgharatanāni sādhūnaṃ ratijananatthena ratanāni nāma.
anya-e1102n:357_6: kasmā yasmā aviññāṇakaṃ suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādiratanaṃ saviññāṇakānaṃ hattiratanādīnaṃ alaṅkāratthāya upanīyati.
anya-e1102n:357_9: Kasmā yasmā tiracchānagataratanaṃ manussaratanassa opavayhaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:357_12: Kasmā yasmā itthiratanaṃ purisaratanassa paricārikattaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e1102n:357_13: Purisaratanampi duvidhaṃ agārikaratanaṃ anagārikaratanañca tattha anagārikaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati.
anya-e1102n:357_14: Kasmā yasmā agārikaratanesu aggo cakkavattīpi sīlādiguṇayuttaṃ anagārikaratanaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
anya-e1102n:357_15: upaṭṭhahitvā payirupāsitvā dibbamānussikā sampattiyo pāpuṇitvā ante nibbānasampattiṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e1102n:357_24: Sāriputtamoggalānasadisāpi hi anekasatā sāvakā paccekabuddhassa guṇānaṃ satabhāgampi na upanenti.
anya-e1102n:357_26: Kasmā guṇamahattatāya sakalampi jambudīpaṃ pallaṅke na pallaṅkaṃ ghaṭṭento nisinnā paccekasambuddhā ekassa
anya-e1102n:357_27: guṇānaṃ neva saṅkhyaṃ kalaṃ gaṇanabhāgaṃ upanenti,
anya-e1102n:357_28: vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “yāvatā bhikkhave sattā apadā vā…pe…
anya-e1102n:357_32: saṅgho ca dullabho loke”ti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ atthuddhāravasena sabbaso attho vuttoyeva hoti.
anya-e1102n:361_0: Idāni sappurisāti dullabhāti imassa saṃvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto tathā hi loke sappurisāpi atidullabhāyeva.
anya-e1102n:361_3: maraṇadhammā sattā maraṇato muccanti vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “mamañhi ānanda kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātiyā parimuccanti,
anya-e1102n:361_4: jarādhammā sattā jarāya muccantī”ti ādi vacanato pana sammāsambuddhoyeva sabbākārasampanno kalyāṇamitto nāma.
anya-e1102n:361_6: Tepi alabhantena ekantajahitaṃ sivaṭṭhikaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ labhitabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:364_1: Katamo paṇḍitapuggalo buddhapaccekabuddhā asīti ca mahāsāvakā aññe ca tathāgatassa sāvakā sunettamahāgovindavidhurasarabhaṅgamahosadhasutasomanimirājaayogharakumāraka
anya-e1102n:364_6: attano vacanakarānaṃ sabbabhayaupaddavūpasaggaviddhaṃsanasamatthā honti tathā hi tathāgataṃ āgamma asaṅkhyeyyā
anya-e1102n:364_7: aparimāṇā devamanussā āsavakkhayaṃ pattā brahmaloke patiṭṭhitā,
anya-e1102n:364_9: Sāriputtatthere cittaṃ pasādetvā catūhi ca paccayehi theraṃ upaṭṭhahitvā asīti kusalahassāni sagge nibbattāni,
anya-e1102n:364_10: tathā mahāmoggalānamahākassapapabhuti sunettassa satthuno sāvakā appekacce brahmaloke upapajjiṃsu,
anya-e1102n:367_0: Akittipaṇḍito sakkena devānamindena vare diyyamāne evamāha
anya-e1102n:368_0: “Dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena saha saṃvase;
anya-e1102n:370_0: Kiṃ nu te akaraṃ dhīro, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e1102n:372_0: Nayaṃ nayati medhāvī, adurāyaṃ na yuñjati;
anya-e1102n:373_0: Sanaro seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
anya-e1102n:374_0: Vinayaṃ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo”ti.
anya-e1102n:375_0: Apica tepi sappurise saṅgamma assutapubbampi ubhayalokahitāvahaṃ vācaṃ suyyateva, vuttampi cetaṃ.
anya-e1102n:376_0: “Subhāsitaṃ uttamamāhu santo, dhammaṃ bhaṇe nādhammaṃ taṃ dutiyaṃ;
anya-e1102n:377_0: Piyaṃ bhaṇe nāppiyaṃ taṃ tatiyaṃ, saccaṃ bhaṇe nālīkaṃ taṃ catuttha”nti ca.
anya-e1102n:380_2: yato tesampi upakārānussaraṇatā kataññutā sappurisehi pasaṃsanīyādinānappakāravisesādhigamahetūca honti vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā,
anya-e1102n:380_7: Apica vidhuramahosadhajātakādikālepi idhalokaparalokasampattiatthameva attano vacanakare sammā yojenti.
anya-e1102n:380_8: Anākulakammantādhiṭṭhānena kālaññutāya patirūpakāritāya analasatāya uṭṭhānavīriyasamatāya abyasaniyatāca
anya-e1102n:380_10: ete attano vā puttadārassa vā dāsakammakarānaṃ vā byattatāya evaṃ payojitā diṭṭheva dhamme dhanadhaññavitti paṭilābhahetū honti,
anya-e1102n:381_0: Patirūpakārīri dhuravā, uṭṭhānatā vindate dhananti ca;
anya-e1102n:386_0: Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca; Tiṇāni yo na maññati;
anya-e1102n:387_0: Sappurisakiccāni, so sukhaṃ na vihāyatī”ti ca.
anya-e1102n:390_1: Tabbigamena duppurisā bālajanā agavesantopi labbhanteva te bālā attānaṃ sevamāne parajane saṃsāradukkheyeva
anya-e1102n:390_2: osīdenti bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ na denti tathā hi pūraṇakassapādayo chasatthārā devadattakokālika-
anya-e1102n:390_3: modakatissa khaṇḍadeviyāputtasamuddadattaciñcamāṇavikādayo atītakāle ca dīghadukkhassa lābhāti ime aññe
anya-e1102n:390_4: ca evarūpā sattā bālā aggipadittamiva agāraṃ attanā duggahitena attānañca attano vacanakārake ca vināsenti
anya-e1102n:390_7: Rājā ajātasattu sāmaññaphalasuttantasavanakāle yadi pitaraṃ aghāteyya,
anya-e1102n:390_8: sotāpanno bhaveyya pitaraṃ ghātitattā maggaphalampi appatvā lohakumbhiyaṃ saṭṭhivassasahassāni paccitvā muccissati anāgatepi paccekabuddho bhavissati.
anya-e1102n:390_9: Kokālikopi sāriputtamoggalānatthere anapacāyitvā mahāniraye padumagaṇanāya paccanokāse nirayapadese padumaniraye…pe…
anya-e1102n:390_10: padumaṃ kho pana aññataro bhikkhu nirayaṃ kokāliko bhikkhu upapanno sāriputtamoggalānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:390_11: Tattha aññataro bhikkhūti nāmagottena apākaṭaṃ “kiṃ va dīghaṃ nukho bhante padume niraye āyuppamāṇa”nti
anya-e1102n:390_12: pañhaṃ pucchitvā nisinnaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ evamāha “dīghaṃ kho bhikkhu niraye āyuppamāṇaṃ,
anya-e1102n:390_13: taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātuṃ ettakāni vassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatānīti vā ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā
anya-e1102n:390_14: ettakāni vassasatasahassānī”ti vā sakkā pana bhante upamaṃ kātunti.
anya-e1102n:390_16: Seyyathāpi bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho hoti,
anya-e1102n:390_17: tato puriso vassasatassa vassasahassassa accayena ekamekaṃ tilaṃ uddhareyya,
anya-e1102n:390_18: khippataraṃ kho so bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya,
anya-e1102n:390_22: Vīsatikhāriko ti māgadhikena patthena cattāro patthā kosalaraṭṭhe eko pattho hoti.
anya-e1102n:390_29: Abbudo nirayoti abbudo nāma eko paccekanirayo natthi,
anya-e1102n:390_30: avīcimhi eva pana abbudagaṇanāya paccanokāso “abbudo nirayo”ti vutto.
anya-e1102n:390_32: Tattha vassagaṇanāpi evaṃ veditabbā yathāha “sataṃsatasahassāni koṭi hoti evaṃ sataṃsahassakoṭiyo pakoṭi nāma.
anya-e1102n:390_38: Esa nayo sabbattha ayañca gaṇanā aparicitānaṃ dukkarā”ti vuttaṃ taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātu’nti keci pana
anya-e1102n:390_39: tattha paridevanānattenapi kammakaraṇanānattenapi imāni nāmāni laddhānīti vadanti.
anya-e1102n:390_41: Yathā ca dīghavidassaāghātā ca buddhantaraṃ saṭṭhiyojanamattena attabhāvena uttāno patito mahāniraye paccati yathā ca,
anya-e1102n:390_42: tassa diṭṭhiabhirucitāni pañca kulasatāni tasseva sahabyataṃ uppannāni mahāniraye paccanti.
anya-e1102n:390_43: Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā “seyyathāpi bhikkhave naḷāgāraṃ vā tiṇāgāraṃ vā aggiphuṭṭho kūṭāgārāni dahati ullittāvalittāni
anya-e1102n:390_44: nivātāni phusitaggaḷāni pihita vātapānāni evameva kho bhikkhave yānikānici bhayāni uppajjanti,
anya-e1102n:390_50: Iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo appaṭibhayo paṇḍito saupaddavo bālo anupaddavo paṇḍito,
anya-e1102n:390_54: Chaḍḍanīyataṃ jigucchanīyatañca āpajjati viññūnaṃ vuttampi cetaṃ nāradajātake.
anya-e1102n:393_0: Akattipaṇḍitocāpi sakkena devānamindena vare diyyamāne evamāha
anya-e1102n:394_0: “Bālaṃ na passe na suṇe, na ca bālena saṃvase;
anya-e1102n:395_0: Bālenā’llāpasallāpaṃ, na kare na ca rocaye.
anya-e1102n:396_0: Kiṃnu te akaraṃ bālo, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e1102n:399_0: Dunnayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto pakuppati;
anya-e1102n:400_0: Vinayaṃ so na jānāti, sādhu tassa adassana”nti.
anya-e1102n:405_1: Tattha dullabhañca manussattanti manussabhāvopi dullabhoyeva manussassa dullabhabhāvo kāṇakacchapopamādīhi
anya-e1102n:405_2: veditabbo eko kira kassako gaṅgātīre tīṇi saṃvaccharāni kasitvā kiñcimattampi alabhitvā naṅgalaphālaṃ
anya-e1102n:405_3: dvedhā bhinditvā gaṅgāyaṃ khipi tena gaṅgānadiyā vāhena eko uddhaṃ eko heṭṭhāti evaṃ dve naṅgalaphālakā
anya-e1102n:405_4: gaṅgāyaṃ vuyhantā cirena eko uddhaṃ eko heṭṭhāti dve ekato hutvā pākatikā yujjanti tasmiṃ khaṇe vassasatavassasahassaccayena
anya-e1102n:405_5: ekavāraṃ ummujjamāno kāṇakacchapo ummujjamānakkhaṇe tassa gīvā dvinnaṃ naṅgalaphālānamantare hoti ayaṃ
anya-e1102n:405_6: kālo dullabhova evameva manussattabhāvopi dullabhoyeva tathāhi manussattabhāvaṃ alabhitvāva nirayapetaasurakāyatiracchānabhūmīsuyeva
anya-e1102n:405_7: saṃsaritvā sīsampi ukkhipituṃ alabhantā ekabuddhantarā dve buddhantarā tayo buddhantarā cattāro buddhantarā
anya-e1102n:405_9: tathā petaasurakāyatiracchānabhūmīsupi atikhuddakena attabhāvena tilabījasāsapabījassa catupañcachasattaaṭṭhakalabhāgamatteneva
anya-e1102n:405_10: aṅguliyā patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānamatteyeva bhūmipadese nisinnānaṃ atikhuddakasattānaṃ gaṇanapathampi vītivattā
anya-e1102n:405_11: te hi gaṇituṃ iddhimantapuggale ṭhapetvā añño ko nāma sakkhissati tehi mohandhabhāvena kaṇhasukkapakkhampi
anya-e1102n:405_12: ajānantā anekesu buddhasatesu vā buddhasahassesu vā uppajjamānesupi buddhotisaddaṃ asutvā vītivattā,
anya-e1102n:405_15: Buddhuppādakālepi sammādiṭṭhi hutvā kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇasampatti dullabhāva,
anya-e1102n:405_17: tasmimpi sati aṅgavikalabhāvena saddhammasavanassāpi dullabhattāti evamādippabhedā manussattabhāvādikā khaṇasampattiyo dullabhāti veditabbā.
anya-e1102n:405_18: Dullabhā khaṇasampattīti kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇasampatti dullabhāyeva tathā hi paccantavisaya arūpaasaññasattatiracchānapetanerayikakāle
anya-e1102n:405_19: vā majjhimadesepi cakkhādiaṅgavikalevā paripuṇṇaaṅgabhāvepi micchādiṭṭhibhūtā vā kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā
anya-e1102n:405_20: khaṇā na honti paccantavisaye hi pavattā janā pāṇātipātādidasaakusalakammapatheyeva ramanti abhiramanti,
anya-e1102n:405_23: Arūpinopi puggalā paratoghosavirahitattā sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhopi tesaṃ natthi,
anya-e1102n:405_25: Asaññasattatiracchānapetanerayikakālesu pana pageva pūritapāramīnaṃ sattānaṃ pavattanampi abbohārikaṃ,
anya-e1102n:405_27: sotavikalena dhammasavanatopi hāyati eḷamūgādibhāvena kusalasamādānā na honti.
anya-e1102n:405_29: sabbajanānaṃ nayanarasāyatanabhūtaṃ sabbaññubuddhampi disvā pasādasommena cakkhunā oloketabbampi na maññanti
anya-e1102n:405_30: manopadosavaseneva yugaggāhā hutvā yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu anekepi micchādiṭṭhino mahāniraye uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n:411_0: Evaṃ satthuparinibbānato vassasataccayena patiṭṭhite isinā kāritattā’ isinagara’nti laddhanāme dvattapādibhūpālānaṃ
anya-e1102n:411_1: nivāsaṭṭhānabhūte sīrikhettanagare erāvatiyā nadiyā pārimatīrabhūte pabbatasānumhi patiṭṭhitassa kañcanavaramahāthūpassa
anya-e1102n:411_2: dāyakassa satvivamahādhammarañño kāle sāsanassa dvisahassasatādhikaekatiṃsatime vasse sāsane paṭiladdhasaddhānaṃ
anya-e1102n:411_3: kulaputtānaṃ mahājānikaraṇavasena vimativinodaniyā vuttavacanaṃ saddayuttiatthayuttivasena sādhukaṃ avicinitvā
anya-e1102n:411_4: nadiyā udakukkhepaṃ akatvā upasampadā kammassa kāritattā sāsane parājayamāpanne kulaputte upārambhakaraṇavasena
anya-e1102n:412_0: Ettāvatā ca sirikhettanagaragocaragāmena satvivamahādhammarājagurubhūtena mahāveyyākaraṇena tipiṭakadharena’saddhammakovido’ti
anya-e1102n:412_1: pākaṭa nāmadheyyena mahātherena upajjhāyo hutvā paññādhipatīnaṃ nivāsabhūte pacchimajinacakkasāsanavare
anya-e1102n:412_3: rājagurunā tipiṭakanāgattherena ca ācariyo hutvā vejjakammajaṅghapesanakammādivasena anesanaṃ pahāya
anya-e1102n:412_4: sammā ājīvena visuddhājīvehi saṅghagaṇehi kārakasaṅghā hutvā sirikhettanagarassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge dīghapabbatasānumhi
anya-e1102n:412_5: erāvatiyā nadiyā tīre vālikapuḷine sīmāpekkhāya saha udakukkhepaṃ katvā pavattāya udakukkhepasīmāya dasadhā
anya-e1102n:412_6: byañjanavipattiṃ akatvā ṭhānārahena ñatticatutthena kammena upasampadāya vīsativassena sāgarabuddhīti
anya-e1102n:412_7: garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena bhikkhunā racito sāsanavipattihārako sīmavisodhanī nāma gantho samatto.
anya-e1102n:420_0: Evaṃ pāṇinaṃ sabbe, sīghaṃ sijjhantu saṅkappā.
anya-e1102n:422_0: Tāva tiṭṭhatu yaṃ gantho, sāsane hārayaṃ tamaṃ.
anya-e1102n:423_0: Uddhaṃ yāva bhavaggā ca, adho yāva avīcito;
anya-e1102n:426_0: Ciraṃ jīvatu no rājā, sāsanassa ujjotako.
